loans.name: Kaneez Fatima's Group

texts.en:
Kaneez fatima is 38 years old, married, and has six children. Five of them are studying while the remaining one stays at home. 

She is very skillful and does decorative embroidery. She is very creative minded and has the ability to do different kinds of embroidery according to her customer's choice. 

Her husband is a driver and provides transport services to  passengers. 

Kaneez has applied for a loan from Kiva partner Asasah for the further expansion of her embroidery business. With the loan investment, she will buy beads, thread, and clothes in bulk, which will allow her to make better quality embroidered clothes and increase her profits. 

She has been operating her business for many years and is confident that she will get more success in her business after the loan investment. 

In the photo, the lady raising her hand is Kaneez fatima.

loans.use: To buy colored thread, beads and clothes for her embroidery business

loans.name: Pauline Clémence

texts.fr: Agée de 40 ans, Pauline Clémence est mariée et est mère de six enfants, tous scolarisés. Pauline Clémence a un autre enfant à charge, en dehors de ses enfants. Pauline Clémence vit ensemble avec son mari et ses enfants. Le couple assure ensemble les diverses charges de la famille. Pauline Clémence a arrêté l'école au cours secondaire. Il y a près de vingt trois ans que Pauline Clémence mène comme activité la vente de charbon de bois dans son quartier ; ce qui lui permet de subvenir à ses besoins et subvenir aux besoins des enfants. Pauline Clémence s'approvisionne dans le nord du Bénin. Dans la quête de la satisfaction de sa clientèle et pour élever le niveau de son activité, Pauline Clémence sollicite un quatrième crédit auprès de ALIDé. Les trois premiers crédits ont été bien remboursés.
texts.en:
Pauline Clémence, 40 years old, is married and the mother of six children, who are in school. She has another child to support beside her own. Pauline Clémence lives together with her husband and children. The couple jointly ensure that the diverse family expenses are covered. 

Pauline Clémence dropped out of secondary school. For nearly 23 years, she has had a business selling charcoal in her district. It enables her to support herself and her children. Her supplies come from northern Benin. 

Seeking to satisfy her customers and to boost her business. Pauline Clémence is requesting a fourth loan from ALIDé. The first three loan were indeed repaid.

loans.use: to buy sacks of charcoal

loans.name: Clarisse Yabo

texts.fr: Clarisse Yabo est âgée de 29 ans et est mariée à un comptable du nom de Gaïtan. Le couple a trois enfants, tous scolarisés et à leur charge. Clarisse Yabo et son mari assurent ensemble les diverses charges de la famille. Clarisse Yabo a arrêté l'école au cours secondaire. Depuis environs huit ans, Clarisse Yabo mène comme activité la vente de vêtements et des vivres de façon secondaire dans son quartier ; ce qui lui permet de subvenir à ses besoins et d’assurer les charges familiales. Clarisse Yabo achète ses produits au Bénin. Dans le but d’augmenter le stock de ses produits et de mieux satisfaire la demande de sa clientèle, Clarisse Yabo sollicite pour la quatrième fois un crédit auprès de ALIDé. Les crédits précédents ont été bien remboursés.
texts.en: Clarisse Yabo is 29 and is married to an accountant named Gaïtan. They care for their 3 children, who all go to school. Clarisse Yabo and her husband both take care of the family financially. Clarisse Yabo quit school at the secondary level. For 8 years, she has been selling clothes and food, on the side, in her neighborhood, which has enabled her to provide for herself and her family. Clarisse Yabo buys these items in Benin. In order to increase the stock of these items and better meet the needs of her customers, Clarisse Yabo is applying for a fourth loan from ALIDÉ. Previous loans have been successfully paid back.

loans.use: to buy clothes and food.

loans.name: Malek

texts.en:
This borrower is from Iraq. He is 22 years old, single, and lives with five family members.

Malek is a blacksmith; in 2003 he opened his own workshop. He produces gates, grilles, railings, light fixtures, furniture, sculptures, tools, agricultural implements, decorative and religious items, cooking utensils, and weapons. He has sufficient experience in this field and a good reputation. He is well-known in the surrounding areas.

He decided to apply for a $3000 loan in order to expand his workshop and to add more inventory. He aims to gain more profits so he can improve his family’s quality of life.

loans.use: to expand his workshop and to add more inventory.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase more fufu bags (An African food made out of cassava) for her business.

loans.name: Perveen's Group

texts.en:
Perveen has requested a loan from Kiva partner Asasah for her nephew, who does embroidery on shoes. He has a very demanding business because his skills draw more admirers day by day. He gets the orders from different shoe selling factories and shops and he pastes beads as well as does embroidery on shoes.  

These kinds of shoes are very popular and have high demand in the market.
 
With the loan, he will buy beads, colored thread and laces in larger quantity that will allow him to fulfill larger orders on time and increase his profits.
 
Her husband is employed in a private organization. Perveen has no children, so she spends her time doing her household responsibilities.
 
She is hopeful that her nephew will be able to improve his business after investing the loan into it.
 
Note: In the photo, the lady raising her hand is Perveen.

loans.use: To buy embroidery materials.

loans.name: Yafea

texts.en:
This borrower is from Iraq. He is 65 years old, married and has three children.

Yafea has been an owner of a cafeteria since 2000. He offers a variety of drinks and sandwiches. He has sufficient experience in this field. He has a good reputation and he is well known in his area.

He is requesting a loan of $1200 to paint his cafeteria and to make an external ceiling. He is aiming to gain more profits so he can improve his family’s quality of life.

loans.use: to paint his cafeteria and to make an external ceiling.

loans.name: Houéfa Mondoukpè Prisca

texts.fr: Houéfa Mondoukpè Prisca est âgée de 26 ans et est mariée à un certain Karim. Le couple a deux enfants, tous scolarisés et à leur charge. Houéfa Mondoukpè Prisca et son mari assurent ensemble les diverses charges de la famille. Houéfa Mondoukpè Prisca vit ensemble avec son mari et ses enfants. Houéfa Mondoukpè Prisca a arrêté l'école au cours secondaire. Il y a une dizaine d'année, Houéfa Mondoukpè Prisca mène comme activité la vente de produits vivriers à son domicile ; ce qui lui permet de contribuer aux charges du ménage. Houéfa Mondoukpè Prisca s'approvisionne au Bénin. Ce quatrième crédit permettra certainement à Houéfa Mondoukpè Prisca de rehausser le niveau de son activité et de mieux répondre aux exigences de sa clientèle. Les trois crédits précédents ont été bien remboursés.
texts.en: Houéfa Mondoukpè Prisca is 26 ans and is married to a man named Karim. They care for their 2 children, who both go to school. Houéfa Mondoukpè Prisca and her husband both take care of the family financially. Houéfa Mondoukpè Prisca lives with her husband and her children. She quit school at the secondary level. Houéfa Mondoukpè Prisca has been selling food products at home for about 10 years, which has enabled her to contibute to household expenses. She buys these items in Benin. This fourth loan will most certainly help Houéfa Mondoukpè Prisca enhance her business so she can better meet the needs of her customers. Her first 3 loans have been successfully paid back.

loans.use: to buy food products.

loans.name: Jamal

texts.en:
Jamal is from Iraq. He is 48 years old, married, and has four children.

Jamal is a blacksmith; he opened his workshop in 2003. He produces all types of gates and windows. He has sufficient experience in this field, and he has a good reputation. He is well known in the surrounding area.

He is requesting a $3,000 loan in order to purchase a large electric generator for his workshop. He is aiming to gain more profits so he can improve his family’s quality of life.

loans.use: to purchase a large electric generator for his workshop.

loans.name: Makhbuba

texts.ru:
Махбубе 40 лет, одна воспитывает сына - школьника. В поисках источника дохода для своей семьи, в 2007 году Махбуба начала свой бизнес в торговле продуктами питания. Благодаря настойчивости  и упорному труду,  Махбуба начав со стартовой суммы всего лишь 500 сом (KGS), сумела развить свой бизнес  с ежемесячным доходом  в 15,000 сом (KGS).  
В целях дальнейшего развития своего бизнеса, Махбуба обратилась  в компанию «Бай – Тушум и Партнеры» за кредитом в сумме 50,000 сом (KGS) на расширение ассортимента.  Доходы от кредита Махбуба планирует вложить в  расширение торгового места, а в будущем – купить свой собственный дом.
texts.en: Makhbuba is 40 years old and is raising a school-age son by herself.  In search of a source of income for her family, she started her own business of selling food products in 2007.  Thanks to her persistence and hard work, Makhbuba was able to grow her business, which was started with a sum of only 500 som (KGS), to have a monthly income of 15,000 som (KGS).  In order to further develop her business, she requested a loan in the sum of 50,000 som (KGS) from the "Bai-Tushum and Partners" company to expand her product selection.  Makhbuba plans to invest the profit from the loan into expanding her retail space and purchasing her own house in the future.

loans.use: to broaden an assortment of goods

loans.name: Musa Emmanuel's Group

texts.en:
These are teachers of a primary school located in Kenema, a city in Eastern Sierra Leone. The school serves about 416 pupils and employs twenty-four teachers. In operation for thirteen years, the school receives support from the government to help cover its operating costs.

However, for many of the teachers here, life can be a struggle. Many teachers therefore engage in side projects and small businesses in order to supplement (or in some cases replace) their salaries, and these teachers are collectively seeking a loan of 6 million Sierra Leonean Leones from SMT and Kiva lenders.

Musa is the leader of this group of teachers. He is forty years old and has been in the teaching profession for forty years. He is married, and together they have five children - two in primary school, two in secondary school and one in college. Musa plans to use his portion of the funds to pay school and college fees for his children.

loans.use: to pay school and college fees for his children.

loans.name: Wafaa

texts.en:
Wafaa is a 43-year-old married woman, mother of one child. Wafaa opened her bakery five years ago where she is specialized in Saj Manakish, which is a dish made of flatbread covered with various toppings, commonly eaten in Lebanon and other nearby countries. The most common variety is manakish zaatar "Thyme". These types of breads are typically eaten for breakfast or lunch. What gives her Manakish a special taste is the thin Saj dough called saj bread which is a flat round bread baked on an upside down hot iron wok surface. This special baking method gives her production a special taste that everyone strives to reach.

Wafaa is a woman with the very good reputation of being a hard worker who seeks perfection. She is working on improving her shop to attract new customers. To please hers, she is applying for a loan from Kiva partner Al Majmoua in order to buy a refrigerator for her shop in addition to start selling soft drinks and chips in her shop.

She hopes that future loans will be invested in her shop's decoration and for customer satisfaction investments.

loans.use: To buy a refrigerator, soft drinks and chips to sell in her shop.

loans.name: Saldivar Poty Group

texts.es:
El Comité de Mujeres de nombre Saldivar Poty, se conformo en el año 2007, gracias a que una de las miembros, contactó con la asesora en una reunión semanal que la misma tenía en la zona, para enterarse de la forma de trabajo que tiene el Comité de Mujeres Emprendedoras y una vez asesorada acerca del Programa logró juntar a 18 mujeres quienes se encuentran trabajando muy a gusto ya en el ciclo número 15, en forma conjunta y solidaria dentro del programa.
Una de las miembros es la señora es la señora Nancy, quien tiene una modesta peluquería bien equipada. Ella nos comenta que gracias a este negocio ella ha podido salir adelante y ayudar a su familia. Ella se define como una mujer muy trabajadora, emprendedora y muy sacrificada. Una de sus metas es poder seguir creciendo y de esa forma seguir ayudando a su familia.
Ella solicita el crédito para la compra de tintes, gel, shampoo, enjuagues, spray y demás insumos necesarios para abastecer su negocio. Agradece a ala fundación y a kiva por la oportunidad que estas le dan.
texts.en:
The Saldivar Poty communal bank was formed in 2007 thanks to one of its members.  The member contacted the counselor at a weekly meeting that she had in the area.  She did this to find out about the type of work the Committee of Enterprising Women does.  Once she was advised about the program she managed to get 18 women together.  They can be found happily working together in their 15th cycle.  They work together within the program in a cooperative and supportive way.

Nancy is one of the members.  She has a modest and well-equipped beauty salon.  She tell us that thanks to this business she has been able to get ahead and help her family.  She is known as a very hard-working, enterprising, and self-sacrificing woman.  One of her goals is to be able to continue growing.  This way she will continue helping her family.

She is requesting the loan to buy hair coloring, gel, shampoo, rinses, hair spray, and the other supplies she needs to stock her business.  She is grateful to the Fundación and Kiva for the opportunity they are giving her.

loans.use: to buy hair coloring, gel, shampoo, rinses, hair spray, and the other supplies.

loans.name: Ousmane

texts.fr: L'emprunteur est un homme marié, père d deux enfants dont un fréquente l'école primaire.Il tient une cantine au marché et propose à ses clients des habits pour hommes et dames.Il entretient sa famille avec les revenus tirés de son commerce et parvient à subvenir à ses propres besoins. Pour augmenter son fonds de commerce, il sollicite auprès de UIMCEC un pret de 200000f afin d'acheter des vétements à l'occasion des fètes de fin d'année. Son ambition est d'acheter une voiture pour faciliter ses déplacements.
texts.en: The borrower is a married man and the father of 2 children, one of whom goes to primary school. He manages a small booth at the market where he sells clothes for men and women. He supports himself and his family thanks to the income generated by this business. In order to strengthen his business, he is applying for a 200 000f loan from UIMCEC so he can buy clothes for the holiday season. His ambition is to buy a car so he can be more mobile.

loans.use: to buy clothes

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy drinks and fabrics.

loans.name: Rebecca G.'s Group

texts.en:
These are teachers of a primary school based in Kenema city. This school was founded in 1954 by the Catholic Mission to improve education. Teachers of the school have come to SMT, a partner of Kiva.org in Makeni, Northern Sierra Leone, to seek a loan. 

This is the second loan that teachers of the school have benefited from SMT/Kiva lenders. They requested a loan of 6,000,000 SLL for the entire group. With the help of this second loan, these teachers are in a better position once again to buy or invest in something that their mere salaries cannot let them do.

Rebecca is the leader of the group. She is age fifty-five. She was born in Bonthe. She is a widow and has four children – two in secondary school and two in college. Rebecca has been in the teaching profession for twenty-eight years now. She has requested this loan in order to pay her son’s college fees.

loans.use: to pay her son’s college fees.

loans.name: Adele

texts.fr:
Cliente de 49 ans, mariée et mère de 4 enfants dont l'age varie entre 12 et 28 ans. Considérant les difficultés de son foyer pour joindre les deux bouts du mois , Il ya de 29 ans ,elle se lance dans la vente des vivres frais pour venir en aide a  son mari pour élever leurs enfants

Elle a deja bénéficié de plusieurs cycles de prêts, pour ce nouveau, elle va renforcer le stock en s'approvisionnant en vivres frais, tel que cartons de viande de bœuf, cartons de porcs , des queue de bœuf, des cotis de porcs
Tres ambitieuse, elle vend en moyenne 20 a 30 cartons de differents produits, ses benefices lui permettent de soutenir les etudes universitaires de  ses enfants, elle épargne toujours parce qu'elle a pour objectif d'acheter une chambre froide
texts.en:
This client is 49, married, and the mother of four children whose ages vary between 12 and 28. In view of the difficulty her household was having with making ends meet, she began 29 years ago to sell fresh foods in order to help her husband educate their children. 

She has already received several loans, and using this new one, she is going to add to her stock by buying fresh foods such as cartons of beef and pork, oxtails, and pork ribs. 

Very ambitious, she sells 20 to 30 cartons of various products on average. Her profit allows her to pay for the university studies of her children. She always puts aside savings because her goal is to acquire a cold storage facility.

loans.use: to buy cartons of beef and pork, tripe, and ox and pork tails.

loans.name: Kosay

texts.en:
This borrower is from Iraq. He is 22 years old, married and has two children. He lives with ten family members and three of them work.

Kosay has been an owner of a restaurant since 2005, where he offers a variety of delicious food. He has more than four years experience in this field and a good reputation. His restaurant is situated in a crowded area where there are a lot of customers passing by.

He is requesting a $2,700 loan in order to repair and fix his restaurant’s walls. He is aiming to gain more profits to offer him the opportunity to provide a better life for his family as a whole.

loans.use: to repair and fix his restaurant’s walls

loans.name: Yass

texts.en:
This borrower is from Iraq. He is 24 years old, married and has two children.

Yass has been an owner of a workshop for blacksmithing and repairing cars since 2008. He has more than three years experience in this field and has a good reputation. He is well known in the surrounding areas.

He decided to apply for a $2,400 loan in order to buy two hydraulic jacks. He is aiming to gain more profits so he can improve his family’s quality of life.

loans.use: in order to buy two hydraulic jacks

loans.name: Wendtigimda Group

texts.fr:
Mme W.ADELE est la représentante du groupe WENDTIGMDA. Elle est  mariée et mère de 06 enfants. Le plus âgé a 19ans et le moins âge 02ans. 03 va  à l’école. Elle a 03 personnes  en charge.

Elle vend des fruits et légumes  depuis 10ans. Elle s’approvisionne  au  marché de pissy en ville et dans les villages environnant. Ses clients sont  le voisinage.

Elle veut  s’acheter  03 de gombo, 01 plat de levure, 10 pastèques et ¼ de sac de patate douce.

 Mme utilise ses bénéfices pour améliorer  son activité. Elle ambitionne s’acheter une parcelle, assurer  le bien être des enfants pour un meilleur avenir.
texts.en: Mrs. W. Adele is the representative of the Wendtigimda group.  She is married and the mother of 6 children.  The oldest is 19 and the youngest is 2 years old.  Three of her children go to school.  She has three people in her care.  She has sold fruits and vegetables for ten years.  She stocks up at the market in the town of Pissy and in the surrounding villages.  Her clients are her neighbors.  She wants to buy herself three okras, one dish of yeast, ten watermelons, and a quarter bag of sweet potatoes. She will use her profits to improve her business.  She hopes to buy herself a piece of land, and to ensure the well-being of her children for a better future.

loans.use: to buy herself three okras, one dish of yeast, ten watermelons, and a quarter bag of sweet potatoes.

loans.name: Umarbek

texts.ru: Умарбеку 31 год, женат, воспитывает троих детей. Умарбек рано стал главным кормильцем своей семьи и  в качестве основного источника дохода начал заниматься животноводством. Благодаря упорству и настойчивости Умарбека, начатое с суммы в 15,000 сом (KGS) хозяйство на сегодня приносит около 10,000 сом (KGS) в месяц от продажи молочных  и мясных продуктов. В целях дальнейшего увеличения поголовья скота, Умарбек обратился в компанию «Бай - Тушум и Партнеры» за кредитом в сумме 32,000 сом (KGS) на покупку дополнительных голов скота. Доходы от кредита Умарбек планирует вложить в дальнейшее увеличение количества домашней скотины, чтобы иметь возможность в будущем оплатить обучение детей.
texts.en: Umarbek is 31 years old, married and is raising three children.  He became the primary provider for his family early on and became involved in animal husbandry as the main source of income.  Thanks to his persistence and tenacity, Umarbek's business, started with a sum of 15,000 som (KGS), currently yields about 10,000 som (KGS) per month from sales of dairy and meat products.  In order to further increase livestock headcount, he requested a loan in the sum of 32,000 som (KGS) from the "Bai-Tushum and Partners" company to purchase additional heads of livestock.  Umarbek plans to invest the profit from the loan into increasing quantities of domestic livestock further in order to have an ability to pay for his children's education in the future.

loans.use: to purchase livestock

loans.name: Viviane Christiane

texts.fr: Viviane Christiane est âgée de 29 ans et est mariée à un certain Herver. Le couple a un enfant, scolarisé et à leur charge. Viviane Christiane et son mari assurent ensemble les diverses charges de la famille. Viviane Christiane a arrêté l'école au cours secondaire. Pour faire face à ses différentes charges, Viviane Christiane mène comme activité la vente de piments et des cartes de recharges téléphoniques de façon secondaire. Viviane Christiane achète ses produits dans une région du Bénin. Ce quatrième crédit permettra certainement à Viviane Christiane de rehausser le niveau de son activité et de mieux répondre aux exigences de sa clientèle.
texts.en: Viviane Christiane is 29 and is married to a man named Herver. They have one dependent child, who goes to school. Viviane Christiane and her husband both take care of the family financially. Viviane Christiane quit school at the secondary level. To meet the financial needs of her family, she has been selling hot peppers and refill cards for prepaid phones. Viviane Christiane buys those items in a region of Benin. This fourth loan will most certainly help Viviane Christiane enhance her business so she can better meet the needs of her customers.

loans.use: to buy baskets of hot peppers and refill cards for prepaid phones.

loans.name: Toroitich

texts.en:
Toroitich is a 36-year-old man who is married to Purity, and they have three children who are 13, 10 and 6 years old. He is a livestock trader and his wife practices farming on their family farm. He has been in the livestock farming business for the last 4 years with an income of about Kenya shillings 10,000 every month. His wife also contributes to the family’s income with around 5,000 shillings every month.

This is his first loan with KADET LTD, and he would like to buy more cows and goats for raising and selling at a later date. He anticipates an increase in profits which he will plow back into the livestock business. 

He dreams of becoming a very rich person in future.

loans.use: To buy more cows and goats for resale at a later date.

loans.name: Maurice

texts.fr:
Client de 40 ans, marie et père de 3 enfants dont tous sont sur le banc de l'école, il a été bénéficiaire depuis bientôt plus d'une année ,il est parmi  l'un de nos meilleurs clients, il a élargi son activité , il a  fait des benefices énormes et a rembourse avec succès ses differents prêts.
Avec ce nouveau prêt,il va acheter des pantalons en jeans de differents couleurs, des polos, des t-shirts et des marinières  
Il est très connu dans le marche et dans son quartier , puisque cela fait bientôt 15 ans, qu'il est dans la meme activité.
Il a pour ambition d'ouvrir un magasin d'habits et tient a aller très loin avec Hope pour atteindre ses objectifs.
texts.en: A 40 year old man, married and the father of three children, who are all in school, this client has been a beneficiary for more than a year.  He is one of our best clients.  He has enlarged his business, has made enormous profits, and has successfully repaid his various loans.  With this new loan, he is going to buy denim pants in different colors, polos, t-shirts, and striped shirts.  He is very well-known at the market and in his neighborhood, since he has been in this business for nearly 15 years.  His ambition is to open a clothing shop and he hopes to go far with Hope to reach his objectives.

loans.use: to buy denim pants, polos, t-shirts, and striped shirts.

loans.name: Hortance

texts.fr: Hortance est âgée de 38 ans et est mariée à un mécanicien du nom de Mathias. Le couple a trois enfants, tous scolarisés, dont un est à leur charge. Hortance et son mari assurent ensemble les diverses charges de la famille. Pour subvenir à ses besoins et à ceux de sa famille, Hortance mène comme activité depuis dix ans environs, la vente de mèches et de produits de cheveux dans une ville du Bénin. Hortance s’approvisionne au Bénin. Dans le but de rehausser le niveau de son activité et d’accroître sa clientèle et son chiffre d’affaire, Hortance sollicite pour la deuxième fois un crédit auprès de ALIDé. Le crédit reçu antérieurement a été bien remboursé.
texts.en:
Hortance is 38 years old and married to a mechanic named Mathias. They have three children, all in school. One of the children is a dependent of theirs. Hortance and her husband jointly ensure that the diverse family expenses are covered. 

To support herself and her family, Hortance has had a business for ten years selling hair extensions and hair products in a city in Benin. Her supplies come from Benin. 

With the goal of boosting her business and increasing her customer base and her sales, Hortance is requesting a loan from ALIDé for a second time. The first loan previously received was indeed repaid.

loans.use: to buy hair extensions and hair products

loans.name: Karar

texts.en:
This borrower is 26-years-old, married and lives with five family members.

Karar has been the owner of a shop since 2010, selling spare parts for cars. He has a sufficient experience in this field and has a good reputation and he is well known in his area.

He decided to apply for a $1500 loan in order to make a sliding door and an external ceiling. He is aiming to gain more profits so he can improve his family’s quality of life.

loans.use: to make a sliding door and an external ceiling.

loans.name: Jean De Dieu Le Saint

texts.fr:
Client de 40 ans,marie et père d'un enfant  , a l'arrêt de ses etudes en classe de première , il se lance dans le commerce en 2000 pour subvenir a ses besoins.
Il est client de Hope depuis bientôt une année, très exemplaire , il a rembourse avec succès ses differents prêts et a fait des épargnes considérables.
Il a un bon témoignage de l'impact que  l'octroi des différents prêts ont apporte dans sa vie et a avec les benefices faites de son activité , il a amélioré les conditions de vie de sa famille
Avec ce nouveau prêt ,il va s'approvisionner en  achetant des chaussures , des baskets et des sacs de voyages.
Tres enthousiaste il a pour ambition de devenir grossiste des chaussures ,aller s'approvisionner a l'étranger et avec ses benefices ,il continue a prendre soin de sa famille et de la scolarité de son enfant
texts.en: A 40 year old man, married and the father of one child, this client stopped his studies in the sixth grade.  He started his business in 2000 in order to meet his needs.  He has been a very exemplary client of Hope for more than a year.  He has successfully paid back his loans and has made considerable savings. He has a good history of managing the different loans which he has held in his life, and with the profits he has made in his business, he has improved the living conditions of his family.  With this new loan, he is going to stock up by buying shoes, sneakers, and overnight bags.  Very enthusiastic, his ambition is to become a wholesaler of shoes and to go abroad to stock up.  With his profits he continues to take care of his family and the education of his children.

loans.use: to purchase sneakers, shoes, and overnight bags.

loans.name: Andréa

texts.fr: Andréa est âgée de 47 ans et est mariée à un certain Adrien. Le couple a six enfants, tous scolarisés, dont deux sont à leur charge. Andréa et son mari assurent ensemble les diverses charges de la famille. Andréa vit ensemble avec son mari et ses enfants. Pour subvenir à ses besoins et à ceux de sa famille, Andréa mène comme activité depuis vingt ans environs, la vente de tubercules d'ignames dans son quartier. Andréa s’approvisionne au nord du Bénin. Dans le but de rehausser le niveau de son activité et d’accroître sa clientèle et son chiffre d’affaire, Andréa sollicite pour la quatrième fois un crédit auprès de ALIDé. Les crédits reçus antérieurement ont été bien remboursés.
texts.en:
Andréa is 47 years old and married to a man named Adrien. They have six children, all in school. Two of the children are dependents. Andréa and her husband jointly ensure that the diverse family expenses are covered. She lives together with her husband and children. 

To meet her needs and those of her family, Andréa has had a business selling yam tubers for about twenty years in her district. Her supplies come from northern Benin. 

With the goal of boosting her business and increasing her customer base and her sale, Andréa is requesting a loan from ALIDé for a fourth time. The loans previously received have indeed been repaid.

loans.use: to buy yam tubers

loans.name: Eliab

texts.en:
Eliab, a 39-year-old hardworking man with four children living in Kasese, Uganda, has been in the transport business for ten years. His major hardships are price fluctuations in fuel and inflation, but his goal is to expand his business into new areas.

Eliab is requesting this loan to buy another motorcycle for his business. His personal goals are to educate his children and buy a car.

loans.use: to buy another motorcycle for his transport business.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy house-building materials like iron, corrugated zinc, bags of cement, nails, etc. for the construction of a house

loans.name: Anahit

texts.en:
Anahit is 60 years old, married, and has three adult children who are already married. Anahit worked at Ijevan High School as a teacher until she retired on a pension. In 2001 she and her husband organized their own business in a rented space. This business consists of food and mixed product sales. During these years, they built up their shop and bought furniture for their house. Anahit’s shop has a reputation in Ijevan for having the cheapest products for retail and wholesale purchasing.

Thanks to her first and second Kiva loans, Anahit increased her shop assortment, which has provided her with a good income. This permitted her and her husband to complete construction on their house and to add a story to their shop, which is situated in the yard of their house. Anahit and her husband are also managing a gift shop in the new addition.

Now Anahit is requesting a loan of 200,000 Armenian drams to buy New Year’s candy sets to resell. With future income, she intends to do interior repair on her house.

loans.use: to buy New Year’s candy sets to resell.

loans.name: Joyce

texts.en:
Joyce is a 38-year-old hardworking lady with five children living in Kasese, Uganda. Her personal goal is to educate her children. 

She has been running a retail shop for five years and her major hardship is price fluctuation. However, she has a goal of expanding her business into new areas. The purpose of the loan is to buy clothes for resale.

loans.use: to buy clothes for resale.

loans.name: Sanavbar

texts.ru: Санавбар жительница города Истаравшан. Возраст, 51 год. Замужем. Имеет троих детей. Она занимается торговлей фруктов. Этим видом деятельности занимается 15 лет. Кредит берет для закупа зимних фруктов.
texts.en: Sanavbar is a resident of the city of Istaravshan.  She is 51 years old, married and has three children.  She is involved in selling fruits.  Sanavbar has been in this business for 15 years.  She is requesting this loan for the purchase of winter fruits.

loans.use: to purchase winter fruits

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy birds for poultry keeping.

loans.name: Sabohat

texts.ru: Сабохат жительница города Турсунзаде. Ей 30 лет. Она разведена. У нее один ребенок. Сабохат более 15 лет занимается растениеводством. Она при доме имеет небольшой участок земли, где сеет пшеницу. Кредит берет для закупа семян и минеральных удобрений.
texts.en:
Sabohat is a resident of the city Tursun-zoda. She is 30 years old and divorced. She has one child. Sabohat has worked with crop growing for more than 15 years. She owns a small plot of land by her house, where she sows wheat. 

Sabohat takes a loan for the purchase of seeds and fertilizer.

loans.use: to purchase seeds and fertilizer

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy poultry birds.

loans.name: Rasmi

texts.en:
Rasmi, a 20-year-old man, is a university student specializing in Industrial Administration. His father is a worker with a low income and his brother is a Palestinian National Authority employee with a decent salary. Rasmi wants to take out a loan from FATEN to help him pay for his university fees so he can continue his studies. With the loan, Rasmi will be able to pay his university fees and continue his studies to graduation and a first degree, which will offer Rasmi better work and living conditions in the future. 
Rasmi is in the photograph.

loans.use: to pay university fees

loans.name: Hakim

texts.en:
Hakim is a twenty-one year-old married man with three children living in Kasese,Uganda. His personal goal is to educate his children. He has been running a retail business for ten years which he started with capital of UGX one hundred thousand and now has capital of over UGX two million. 

His major challenge is high fuel and transportation costs. However, he has a vision of expanding his business into new areas. The purpose of the loan is to buy spare parts for resale.

loans.use: to buy spare parts for resale.

loans.name: Doudedji Group

texts.fr: Le groupe DOUDEDJI est formé de trois personnes qui habitent dans le même quartier. La représentante de ce groupe, nommée Yenassin Charlotte, est celle dont la main est levée sur la photo. C’est la deuxième fois que ce groupe sollicite l’appui financier d’ALIDé en vue d’élever le niveau de leur activité. Yenassin Charlotte est mariée à un revendeur du nom de Boniface. Le couple a cinq enfants, tous scolarisés et à leur charge. Yenassin Charlotte et son mari assurent ensemble les diverses charges de la famille. Yenassin Charlotte a arrêté l'école au niveau primaire. Il y a un an que Yenassin Charlotte a commencé la vente d'articles de mercerie à son domicile. Yenassin Charlotte achète ses produits dans un marché du Bénin. Cette activité lui génère des revenus non négligeables l'aidant à faire face à ses diverses charges. Dans le but d’augmenter le stock de ses produits et de mieux répondre à la demande de sa clientèle, Yenassin Charlotte désire obtenir un deuxième crédit auprès de ALIDé, ensemble avec les autres membres du groupe DOUDEDJI. Le premier crédit a été bien remboursé.
texts.en: The Doudedji group is made up of three people who live in the same neighborhood.  The representative of the group, named Yenassin Charlotte, is the one with her hand raised in the photo.  This is the second time that the group has requested the financial assistance of ALIDé in order to raise their business levels.  Yenassin Charlotte is married to a retailer named Boniface.  The couple has five children who all are in school and in their care.  Yenassin Charlotte and her husband take care of the various needs of their family together.  Yenassin Charlotte quit school at the primary level.  Yenassin Charlotte began selling haberdashery items from her home a year ago.  Yenassin Charlotte buys her products in a market in Benin.  This business generates considerable revenues for her, helping her to meet the various needs of those in her care.  With the goal of increasing her stock of products and better responding to the needs of her clients, Yenassin Charlotte wants to obtain a second loan from ALIDé, together with the other members of Doudedji.  The first credit has been fully reimbursed.

loans.use: to purchase haberdashery items.

loans.name: Mahdi

texts.en:
Mahdi is a Palestinian single man.  He has an internet cafe which is the only source of income for him. It is located in a refugee camp where there is good customer movement, and it is a profitable project for him.

Mahdi wants to expand his cafe by purchasing an additional number of computers. That will bring more customers and so increase his income, so Mahdi will take a loan from FATEN to pay. When Mahdi gets the loan, he will be able to expand his cafe by getting an additional number of computers.  This will mean more customers and an increase in income, so he will create for himself better living conditions. Mahdi is photographed in the picture.

loans.use: to purchase additional computers for the internet cafe he has

loans.name: Hidoyat

texts.ru: Хидоят жительница города Истаравшан. Она замужем. Ей 48 лет. У нее трое детей. Она имеет среднее образование. Хидоят арендует торговую точку на рынке, где продает сухофрукты. Этим видом деятельности занимается восемь лет. Кредит берет для увеличения ассортимента своего товара.
texts.en:
Hidoyat is a resident of the city Istaravshan. She is married and 48 years old. She has three children. She has a high school education. Hidoyat rents a sales point at the market, where she sells dried fruit. She has been engaged in this activity for eight years. 

Hidoyat takes a loan to increase the range of goods.

loans.use: to purchase dried fruit to increase the range of goods

loans.name: Steven M.'s Group

texts.en:
These are teachers of a primary school in Kenema city. Teachers of this noble institution have come to SMT, a partner of Kiva.org in Makeni, Northern Sierra Leone to seek a loan of SLL 9,300,000 for the entire group. With the help of this loan, this group of teachers will be able to improve on their standard of living. 

Forty-two-year-old Steven is the leader of this group of teachers. Steven was born in Segbwema, in Eastern Sierra Leone. He is married and has seven children, five of whom are in school. Steven is a teacher and has been in the teaching profession for thirty-eight years now.  He has requested this loan in order to buy house building materials – bags of cements, iron corrugated zinc, nails, etc., for the construction for a house. 

School staff from this institution, like many other schools staff within SMT’s operational areas, comes to SMT to apply for loans. With the help of these loans, they can accomplish some certain tasks that they would otherwise have not being able to accomplish with their mere salaries alone. But with the help of this loan, some can pay school fees for their children; others can use the loan to buy pieces of furniture, a plot of land, house-building materials, or invest in business. At the end of each month, these teachers can repay the loan out of their monthly salaries. The institution’s bursar is directly responsible for deducting the repayment and pays SMT on their behalf.

loans.use: to buy house building materials – bags of cements, iron corrugated zinc, nails, etc., for the construction of a house.

loans.name: Khady

texts.fr:
Khady est  une femme mariée de 52 ans qui vit dans une des localités du Sénégal. Elle s’active dans le secteur du commerce plus précisément  dans la vente de tissus tels que thioub, wax. Elle a une expérience d’un an dans son activité qu’elle a choisi par nécessité dans le but de se procurer une source de revenus. L’aspect le plus intéressant   de son activité reste la satisfaction des besoins de sa clientèle qui est très diversifiée. Elle est  membre d’un guichet de l’U-IMCEC  qui est localisée dan sa zone d’habitation depuis quelques années. Elle sollicite un crédit de 400 000 frs prévu pour le financement de son voyage dans un pays limitrophe  du Sénégal.
 Son objectif est d’aller s’approvisionner en tissus, maximiser ses bénéfices et mieux satisfaire ses besoins.
texts.en: Khady is a married woman, 52 years old, who lives in a town in Senegal. She is active in the business sector, more precisely in the selling of fabrics such as thioub (dyed cloth) and wax (colorful West African cloth). She has a year of experience in her business, which she chose out of necessity with the aim of earning a source of revenue. The most interesting aspect of her business is still found in meeting the needs of her very diverse customer base. For a few years, she has been a member of U-IMCEC branch office located in a residential area. She is requesting a loan of 400,000 francs for financing a trip to a country neighboring Senegal. Her goal is to go and stock up on fabrics, to maximize her profits, and to support herself better.

loans.use: to finance a trip to buy fabrics

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy house building materials – bags of cements, iron corrugated zinc, nails, etc., for the construction of a house.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase foodstuffs and flour for baking and selling pies

loans.name: Vladimir

texts.ru:
Владимир с женой и двумя детьми живет в Ивано-Франковске. Владимир изготавливает изделия из дерева и ДСП. Он арендует столярный цех в своем городе и там изготавливает полученные заказы. У Владимира есть свои постоянные клиенты, он всегда ручается за качество предоставляемых им услуг. В столярном бизнесе он работает уже 4 года. На данный момент чистая прибыль составляет около 5 500 гривен. 

Кредит в размере 20 000 гривен Владимир планирует вложить в закупку материалов и завершение одного из заказов. Этот бизнес является главным источником дохода для семьи заемщика. Владимиру нравится заниматься этим делом. Раньше он таксовал и работал руководителем СТО, но потом решил начать свое дело. Теперь Владимир утверждает, что только к этому у него и лежит душа. 
Пометка: история на русском языке
texts.en: Vladimir, his wife and two children live in Ivano-Frankivsk.  He manufactures goods from wood and particle board.  He leases a carpentry factory in his town, where he manufactures his received orders.  Vladimir has his own regular customers, and he always vouches for the quality of the services that he offers.  He has been working in the carpentry business for four years.  Currently, his net profit is about 5,500 hryvnia.  Vladimir plans to invest the 20,000 hryvnia loan into a purchase of materials and completion of one of his orders.  This business is the primary source of income for the borrower's family.  Vladimir loves his business.  Previously, he worked as a taxi driver and was a manager at a service station, but then decided to start his own business.  Now Vladimir claims that he was only meant for this business.

loans.use: to purchase materials for work and complete one of the orders

loans.name: C 7988 Dufatanye Group

texts.en:
Assoumpta is 33 years old and has three children between the ages of 3 and 7 years old. She owns an agriculture business selling beans, potatoes, rice, etc. Her business is open from 7 am until 6 pm every day except for the weekend. She is the leader of this group, which is called 7988 DUFATANYE in the local language, and she is raising up her hand. 

Assoumpta has requested a loan from Kiva lenders via Vision Finance Company in order to expand her agriculture business by buying fertilizer to grow her products, such as beans, potatoes, rice, etc., to sell. She will save any profit for her future and she will be able to buy another field to cultivate.

loans.use: to expand her agriculture business by purchasing fertilizer to grow her products to sell.

loans.name: Rokkhaya

texts.fr: Rokhaya est âgée de 39 ans et vit au Sénégal. Elle s’active dans le commerce de tissus et le secteur de la coiffure. Elle a choisi ses activités  par nécessité dans le but d’acquérir une source de revenus. Ce qui lui plait c’est sa capacité de satisfaire sa clientèle. Elle  est sociétaire d’un des guichets de l’U-IMCEC depuis octobre 2011. Elle sollicite un crédit de 200 000 frs prévu pour le financement d’un voyage  vers  un pays limitrophe du Sénégal en vue de s’approvisionner en tissus et produits pour cheveux. Son financement lui permettra d’accroitre ses bénéfices, de satisfaire  ses besoins personnels et aussi d’aider sa famille.
texts.en: Rokkhaya is 39 years old and lives in Senegal.  She sells fabrics and also works in the field of hairdressing.  She has chosen these professional activities out of necessity, in order to get a source of income.  She enjoys being able to satisfy her customers.  She has been a member of the local UIMCEC branch since October 2011.  She is requesting a loan in the amount of 200,000 CFA francs.  This loan will help her finance a trip to one of Senegal's neighboring countries, where she will stock up on fabrics and hair products.  This loan will also allow her to increase her profits, to support herself and to help her family.

loans.use: To finance a trip that will allow her to stock up on fabrics and other women's products.

loans.name: Galina

texts.ru:
Галина живет и работает в селе Великая Знаменка. У нее есть муж и двое взрослых дочерей. Галина занимается торговлей автозапчастями для сельхозтехники. Ее муж активно помогает ей в этом бизнесе, так как сам отлично разбирается в технике. В этой сфере они работают уже 11 лет. 

Галина планирует вложить средства, полученные от КИВА в покупку земельного участка под магазин. Галина уже договорилась с сельсоветом о покупке земли и планирует завершить сделку до нового года, пока не изменились законы. Участок, который Галина хотела бы выкупить, находится в центре Знаменки, прямо напротив рынка – вокруг сосредоточены практически все магазины в селе. Там Галина с мужем планируют продолжать торговать автозапчастями для фермерской техники, однако также хотели бы построить рядом еще и небольшой ларек для торговли продуктами питания. Галина очень надеется, что сделка состоится, и земля все-таки будет принадлежать им, тогда не придется платить большую аренду, и никто не сможет забрать у них этот участок или вытеснить их. 
Пометка: история на русском языке
texts.en: Galina lives and works in the Velikaya Znamenka village. She has a husband and two adult daughters.  Galina is involved in selling spare parts for agricultural machinery.  Her husband actively helps her with this business because he knows machinery very well.  They have been working in this field for 11 years.  Galina plans to invest money, received from Kiva, into a purchase of a land plot for a store.  She has already reached an agreement with the village council to purchase the land and plans to complete this transaction prior to the New Year's, while the laws remain unchanged.  The land, that Galina wants to purchase, is located in the center of Znamenka, right across from the market, with practically all village stores surrounding it.  There, Galina and her husband plan to continue selling auto parts for farm machinery, but also want to build a small kiosk nearby to sell food products.  Galina hopes that this deal will happen, and that the land will belong to them because then they would not longer have to pay for a large lease, and no one would be able to take away their land or force them out.

loans.use: to purchase land for a store

loans.name: Sergei

texts.ru:
Сергей женат. Вместе с женой они живут в селе Малая Александровка. Сергей занимается огородничеством. На арендованном участке земли в 2 га он выращивает ранние овощи: 70 000 кустов помидор, 70 000 кустов капусты,100 000 лука, 40 000 баклажанов, 100 000 свеклы, от 2 тонн картофеля. В сельском хозяйстве не первый год, занимается в этой сфере бизнеса уже 4 год. В хозяйство вложено около 50 000 гривен.  

Сергей планирует использовать кредит КИВА в 15 000 гривен для того, чтобы приобрести семена, пленку, удобрения для нового сельскохозяйственного сезона и отремонтировать теплицы, обеспечив необходимые условия для выращивания качественного раннего урожая овощейы . 
Пометка: история на русском языке
texts.en: Sergei is married.  He lives with his wife in the Malaya Alexandrovka village.  Sergei is involved in farming.  He leases a two-hectare plot of land and grows early vegetables, such as 70,000 tomato plants, 70,000 cabbage plants, 100,000 onions, 40,000 eggplants, 100,000 beats, and from two tons of potatoes.  This is not his first year in agriculture, as he has been in this field for the fourth year already.  He has about 50,000 hryvnia invested in his business.  Sergei plans to use the 15,000 hryvnia Kiva loan to purchase seeds, plastic, fertilizers for the new agricultural season, and to repair greenhouses; thus, providing the necessary conditions for growing a quality early vegetable harvest.

loans.use: to purchase seeds, plastic, fertilizers for the new agricultural season, and to repair greenhouses

loans.name: Andree Josephine

texts.fr:
Cliente de 51 ans, celibataire avec 8 enfants dont l'age varie entre 12 et 28 ans dont 5 enfants sont encore sur le banc de l'école.Il ya bientôt 30 ans  elle se lance dans la vente des produits divers quand elle arrête  ses etudes en classe de troisième par manque de moyens.
Elle a deja beneficiee de plusieurs prêts de Hope, et elle a remboursée avec succès ses differents prêts, a l'heure actuelle l'impact est très visible dans sa vie, ses enfants ont une vie meilleure, puisqu'ils ont au moins 3 repas par jour, ces deux enfants derniers fréquentent maintenant l'école privée, elle a grandement élargi son commerce.
Avec ce nouveau prêt, elle va acheter des vêtements pour garçons, des robes pour filles des jouets et poupées pour enfants de tous ages.
Pour l'avenir , elle compte ouvrir une boutique pour vendre des habits; des jouets et tout articles pour enfants
texts.en: A 51 year old, the client is single with 8 children, who vary in age between 12 and 28 years old.  Five of the children are still in school.  Nearly 30 years ago, she began selling various products when she quit school in ninth grade due to a lack of means.  She has already benefited from several loans from Hope, and has successfully paid back her various loans.  At this time, their impact on her life is very clear, as her children have a better life, given that they all get at least three meals a day, the two youngest children now go to a private school, and she has greatly increased her business.  With this new loan, she is going to buy boys' clothing, girls' dresses, and toys and dolls for children of all ages.  For the future, she expects to open a boutique to sell clothing, toys and items for children.

loans.use: to purchase dresses, boy's clothing, and children's toys.

loans.name: Lucie Yvette

texts.fr:
Cliente de 42 ans, celibataire avec 3 enfants dont l'age varie 5 et 16 ans, elle a commence avec la vente de poissons de mer en 2001.
Elle est cliente de Hope depuis plusieurs cycles ,elle a fait des remboursements avec beaucoup de succès et a des épargnes énormes et cela lui a permit d'aller a ce nouveau cycle pour elargir son activité.

Elle a acheté des cartons de poissons de mer comme la morue, les cartons de soles,cartons de chinchards, qu'elle vend en détail sur des étalages dans le plus grand  marche  de la ville.
Elle a pour ambition d'ouvrir une boucherie en tant que femme seule, elle s'occupe valablement de la scolarité de ses enfants et avec ses bénéfices elle a améliorée les conditions de vie de sa famille.
texts.en:
A 42-year-old client who is unmarried with three children, she started selling ocean fish in 2001. She has been a client of HOPE for several loan cycles. She has made payments very successfully and has enormous savings. This enables her to pursue this new loan cycle to expand her business. 

She has purchased boxes of fish, such as cod, sole, and horse mackerel that she displays and sells retail at the largest market in town. 

Her ambition is to open a butcher shop. 

As a single woman, she is taking care of her children's school costs in a satisfactory manner. And with her profits, she has improved her family's living conditions.

loans.use: to buy ocean fish to sell

loans.name: Vitaliy

texts.ru:
Виталий с семьей живет в городе Хуст, Западная Украина. Городок это небольшой, многие занимаются мелким предпринимательством, так как это становится единственной возможностью выжить для тех, кто не уехал заграницу на заработки. Виталий арендует торговую точку на одном из местных рынков, а также торгует по селам, занимаясь выездной торговлей обувью в небольшой торговой палатке. У Виталия есть своя клиентская база, в бизнесе он уже 3 года. Виталий привозит недорогой товар, с удовольствием вкладывает в свое дело и время, и силы. На данный момент в товаре имеет 40 000 гривен. 

Виталий планирует вложить кредит в 20 000 гривен в приобретение дополнительного количества зимнего ассортимента обуви, тем самым пополнив оборотные средства на своей торговой точке. 
Пометка: история на русском языке
texts.en:
Vitaliy and his family live in the city of Khoost, Western Ukraine. The town is small, many people are engaged in small businesses as this is the only way to survive for those who did not go abroad to earn money. Vitaliy rents a store on one of the local markets and also sells in the villages doing on-site sales of footwear in small stalls. Vitaliy has a customer base and has been in the business for three years. Vitaliy brings inexpensive goods and invests his time and efforts in the business with pleasure. At the moment he has 40,000 hryvna in his inventory.

Vitaliy plans to invest a loan of 20,000 hryvna in the purchase of additional winter variety of footwear thereby adding to working capital at his outlet.

loans.use: to purchase additional number of winter variety of footwear.

loans.name: Alexei

texts.ru:
Алексей с женой и двумя дочерьми живет в Гладковке. Она занимается сельским хозяйством, выращивая разные сельхоз культуры. На 50 сотках выращиваем ранние овощи: 4 000 огурцов, 4 000 кустов помидор, около 5 тонн картофеля. Фермерством занимается уже 7 лет. Чистая средняя прибыль составляет 5 600 гривен. 

Алексею необходим кредит в размере 20 000 гривен для того, чтобы закупить семена, удобрения, полиэтиленовую пленку, дрова и материалы для ремонта теплиц, а также установить отопления в теплицах. Приобретение необходимых материалов для содержания теплиц и проведение отопления существенно повысит качество выращиваемой продукции, способствуя получению хорошей прибыли. 
Пометка: история на русском языке
texts.en:
Alexei lives with his wife and two daughters in Gladkovka. He works as a farmer and makes a living by cultivating various crops. He owns 5,000 square meters of land where he grows the following vegetables: 4,000 cucumbers, 4,000 tomato plants and approximately 5 tonnes of potatoes. He's been a farmer for about seven years and his current average profit is 5,600 grivnas. 

Alexei needs a loan of 20,000 grivnas in order to purchase seeds, fertilizers, polythene foil, wood and materials required for greenhouse repair and heating. 
Fixing up and installing adequate heating within the greenhouses will fundamentally increase the quality of his products, which will result in increased revenues.

loans.use: to purchase seeds, fertilizers, polythene foil, wood and materials required for greenhouse repair and heating.

loans.name: Abu Al-Fadl

texts.en:
Abu Al Fadl is 36 years old, married and the father of seven children, most of whom are in primary school. In his childhood, he could not go to school because nobody was there to support him.
 
Abu Al Fadl is a food distributor to small groceries. He purchases food and other simple goods from big producers and distributes to small groceries in Sana'a using a tricycle to carry goods. This idea came to him earlier when he was working with a merchant in a big store who supported him to start the business with simple products. This business is the main and the only source supporting him and his big family. 

Abu Al-Fadl took a loan of 80,000 YER from AMB in order to purchase more goods to cover the demand of his clients/groceries since this will bring more profit to him and his family's conditions will be improved accordingly. 

Abu Al-Fadl hopes to improve his business by building capital and buying a car instead of the tricycle so that he will be able to distribute goods more easily and reach more groceries.

loans.use: to purchase goods from producers to distribute to small groceries.

loans.name: Vadim

texts.ru:
Вадим – женат, у него есть взрослый сын. Вадим с семьей живет в Приветном и занимается огородничеством. На 110 сотках земли он выращивает ранние овощи: 10 000 кустов помидор, 5 000 кабачков, 50 000 перцов, 70 000 кустов капусты. Фермерским бизнесом Вадим занимается уже на протяжении 15 лет. В хозяйство у него вложено около 100 000 гривен. Чистая прибыль – около 6 000 гривен. 

Вадим планирует полученный от КИВА кредит в 15 000 гривен в закупку семян, пленки, минеральных удобрений, а также в строительство дополнительный теплицы. Полученные от выручки средства позволят Вадиму содержать семью, обеспечивая их всем необходимым. 
Пометка: история на русском языке
texts.en:
Vadim is married and has a grown son.   Vadim and his family live in Privetnoye where he is a market gardener.  On 2.7 acres he grows early vegetables including: 10,000 tomato plants, 5,000 squashes, 50,000 peppers, and 70,000 cabbages. Vadim has already been in the farming business for 15 years.  There are about 100,000 UAH invested in his farm. The net profit is about 6,000 UAH. 

Vadim is planning to use the 15,000 UAH loan he receives from Kiva for bulk purchases of seed, plastic film, mineral fertilizers, as well as to build an additional greenhouse.  The income earned by the loan proceeds will enable Vadim to support his family and provide them with all the necessities.  

Note: story is in Russian

loans.use: to buy seed, plastic film, mineral fertilizers, and to build an additional greenhouse.

loans.name: Rimaa

texts.en:
Rimaa, a 36-year-old housewife, lives with her husband who is an employee at the Ministry of Work, in addition to their three kids. Rimaa has an incredible talent for preparing food and she makes lots of kinds of pickles from different vegetables such as cucumbers, olives, thyme, eggplants and she even makes cheese, preparing the foods at home and selling them to her neighbors, friends, and relatives.

As her products have proven to be delicious and of really good quality, demand has increased in such a way that she can't serve the customers at her home due to their big numbers and her being unable to display all her products.

Therefore, Rimaa would love to get the loan so she can rent a store and make it her own independent place where she can display her products and be able to sell her products to all her clients.

loans.use: to rent a store where she can display her products.

loans.name: Isaie

texts.fr:
Isaie fait le commerce des aliments des poules. Il a 29 ans, célibataire et sans enfant, ni autre personne en charge. Il a étudié jusqu'au niveau de licence.
C'est son troisiène cycle de crédit avec ACB Ltd. Il veut utiliser le crédit sollicité pour augmenter le capital de son commerce, ceci lui permettra d'avoir un stock des aliments des poules suffisent et sera capable de satisfaire la demande de sa clientèle.
Isaie veut devenir dans le futur un eleveur des poules qualifié avec une grande poulailler.
Avec le profit, Isaie pretend améliorer la condition de vie de sa famille.
texts.en:
Isaie does commerce in chicken feed. He is 29 years old, unmarried, and without children or others to support. He studied to the level of university student. 

This loan cycle is his third one with ACB Ltd. He wants to use the requested loan to increase his business capital. This will enable him to have a stock of chicken feed sufficient to meet the demands of his customer base. 

In the future, Isaie wants to be a skilled chicken farmer with a major chicken farm. With the profits, Isaie aspires to improve his family's living conditions.

loans.use: to buy chicken feed

loans.name: Bassima

texts.en:
Bassima is a 36-year-old married woman and the mother of five beautiful children. Bassima has sold laundry detergent for the past six years. Bassima is helping her husband in covering their needs.

Through a requested loan from Kiva partner Al Majmoua, Bassima will be capable of increasing her stock and increasing her profit. Bassima will also be capable of fixing her house ceiling especially in this cold weather for her children's safety. Bassima hopes to open a grocery store in the future.

loans.use: to increase her business capital through increasing her stock.

loans.name: Kitilit

texts.en:
Kitilit is 32-years-old, married to Maxine and they are blessed with three children. He has been operating a tailoring shop for the last 4 years where he mends fabric into new clothes for his clients and gets a monthly income of Kenya shillings 10,000. 

He is applying for his first loan with KADET LTD and he plans to use the funds to purchase more stocks of fabric and thread for his tailoring business. He plans to us the profits to expand this business so that he can be use the profits to save for his children’s education. 

His dreams is to open a large clothing store and employ many more tailors to make clothes which he will sell in bulk.

loans.use: to purchase more stock of fabric and threads for his tailoring shop.

loans.name: Susanna

texts.en: Susanna lives with her husband and two children. She trades in meat from a rented booth in the city market. To meet her clients' demands for different kinds of meat during the New Year's season, Susanna plans to increase her variety of products. Increasing the sales will help Susanna to make savings and invest in the business in the future.

loans.use: to buy meat to sell

loans.name: Elizabeth

texts.en:
Elizabeth is 37-years-old, married to Benson and she has two children. She has been buying and selling goats for the last 4 years and gets a monthly income of 10,000 Kenya shillings per month. 

This is her first loan with KADET and she will use the funds to purchase more goats for resale in future. Her photo was taken at the place of meeting with another group member and thus she is highlighted in a clothing shop. She hopes to use the anticipated profits to repay the loan and add more goats for rearing. 

Her dream is to increase the profits of the business.

loans.use: buy Goats for resale.

loans.name: Elijah

texts.en:
Elijah is 51-years-old, married to Leah and they have 8 children. He has been operating a livestock trading business where he buys, rears and sells cows for the last 9 years. He earns a monthly income of Kes 2,000.

This marks his second borrowing from KADET LTD and he plans to use the funds to buy more stock of cows which he will later sell at a profit. With the anticipated profits he plans to save for expansion of his business and save towards the education of his children. 

He hopes to improve the standard of living for his entire family.

loans.use: to buy cows for resale.

loans.name: Kipkoech

texts.en:
Kipkoech is 29-years of age, married to Caroline and they have two children. He has been operating a retail shop for the last 3 years and earns a monthly income of Kes 1,500. 

He is requesting a second loan from KADET of Kes 15,000. He plans to use this loan amount to add more stock of diminishing items like detergents, soft drinks and cooking fats and to use the anticipated profits to accumulate savings to expand his shop. 

He hopes to use his business as a foundation to open a big supermarket.

loans.use: to purchase more stock.

loans.name: Willy

texts.en:
Willy is 60-years-old, married to Everlyne and they have 6 children. He has been rearing and selling chickens for the last year with a monthly income of Kes 1,000. 

He is applying for his second loan with KADET LTD after repaying the previous loan well and on time. He plans to use the loan to purchase more chickens, both layers for eggs and broilers (best for chicken meat), to later sell at a profit. The anticipated profits will be used to pay school fees for his children.

His dreams are to improve the living standard of his family and venture into wholesale egg sales to other retailers.

loans.use: to purchase poultry for sale.

loans.name: Mercedes

texts.es:
La socia se sigue dedicando al negocio de venta de productos comestibles,ella tiene una pequeña tienda de abarrotes,ella vende arroz,azucar,leche,aceite y golosinas,ella vende desde las 8:00 a.m hasta las 7:00 p.m,por medio de este negocio la socia saca adelante,el sueño de la socia es tener un local mas amplio.La socia solicita el credito para comprar arroz,azucar,leche y golosinas al por mayor.

La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Mercedes continues working in selling groceries.  She has a small grocery store, where she sells rice, sugar, milk, oil and sweets. Mercedes works from 8:00 am to 7:00 pm.  Through this business, Mercedes is making progress.  Her dream is to have an expanded store.  Mercedes is requesting the loan to buy rice, sugar, milk and candy at wholesale.

Mercedes is happy with the loan and agrees to comply with the payments of her quota.

loans.use: to buy rice, sugar, milk and candy at wholesale.

loans.name: Chepkuto

texts.en:
Chepkuto is 50 years of age, married to Jennifer, and they are blessed with six children. He has been operating a restaurant business for the last five years with a monthly income of Kes 8,000.

This is his first loan with KADET and he will use it to purchase more cooking fat and baking flour for cooking in his restaurant as well as purchasing some solar kits which he will use for lighting, radio and charging phones in his restaurant business. He will thus be able to operate until late because of the solar lighting which is cheaper for him.

His dream is to have a more prosperous family and grow his business to a major restaurant chain.

loans.use: To purchase cooking fat, baking flour and a solar kit to power his restaurant.

loans.name: Winnie

texts.en:
Winnie is 25 years old, married to Samuel, and they are blessed with one child. She has been operating a beauty salon for past two years and gets a monthly profit of 2,000 Kenya shillings per month.

She is requesting her first a loan of Kes 10,000 which she plans to use in expand her salon by buying a blow dryer and steamer thereby having the tools to be able to cater for high-end market clients. 

Her dream is to be able to cater for her family needs.

loans.use: To expand her salon  business by buying another blow dryer and steamer.

loans.name: Luz Elena De Fatima

texts.es: A sus 61 años, la señora Luz Elena se dedica a la confección de prendas de vestir a terceros, su experiencia es de más de 35 años en este sector e inicia su propio taller gracias a su padre quién le obsequió su primera máquina de confección. Actualmente, la señora Luz Elena desea sacar su propia línea de pijamas y seguir apoyando económicamente para los gastos de la vivienda y el estudio del último de sus 3 hijos; para lo cual necesita de la compra de insumos de telas e hilos para iniciar su nueva línea con la cual sueña poder incrementar su clientela, posicionar su marca y mejorar su calidad de vida.
texts.en:
61 years old, Luz Elena makes a living creating garments of clothing for third parties. She has more than 35 years of experience in this business and opened her own shop thanks to her father, who gave her her first sewing machine. 

Right now, Luz Elena wants to start her own line of pajamas and continue helping financially with the costs of living and the schooling of the youngest of her three children. She needs to purchase supplies like fabric and thread to begin her new line, with which she hopes to be able to increase her customer base, create her brand, and improve her quality of life.

loans.use: to purchase supplies like fabric and thread.

loans.name: Dame

texts.fr: L'emprunteur est un jeune qui a arrété ses études à l'école primaire avant de se lancer dans le commerce de produits alimentaires qu'il pratique depuis maintenant 10 ans.Il vit avec ses deux parents et ses frères qu'il entretient avec les revenus de son commerce.Afin de renforcer sa boutique, il sollicite un pret de 25000f pour acheter du riz, de l'huile, du sucre , du savon.Son ambition est de devenir grossite.
texts.en: This loan seeker is a young man who ended his studies after primary school, in order to start selling food products for a living. He has now worked in this trade for 10 years. He lives with his parents and siblings, and looks after them with the money he makes from the business. To boost his business he is seeking a 25,000 F loan in order to purchase rice, oil, sugar, and soap. His goal is to become a wholesaler.

loans.use: to purchase rice, oil, sugar and soap

loans.name: Irma

texts.es:
Irma nació en la ciudad del Sicuani de la provincia de Canchis y tiene 29 años edad, ella tiene una relación de unión libre de la cual tiene dos hijos. Actualmente, Irma vive en la hermosa ciudad del Cusco, Perú.    
 
Irma se dedica a la elaboración de muebles de madera como por ejemplo carpetas, sillas, mesas y otras cosas más,  Ya son varios años que se dedica a este negocio y le va muy bien.  Irma requiere el préstamo para comprar materiales como por ejemplo madera, cola de carpintero, clavos y otras cosas que se necesitan para la elaboración de muebles.

Irma es nueva integrante del banco comunal “Pillao”. Este  grupo está conformado con 13 socios que viven  en la provincia de Cusco del distrito de San Jerónimo.
texts.en:
Irma was born in the city of Sicuani in the province of Canchis. She is 29 years old. She lives in a common-law marriage, from which she has two children. Currently, Irma lives in the beautiful city of Cusco, Peru.

Irma makes wood furniture such as desks, chairs, tables, and other items. She has already been doing this work for several years, and it's going very well for her. Irma needs the loan to buy materials such as wood, carpenter's glue, nails, and other items needed to make furniture.

Irma is a new member of the "Pillao" communal bank. This group is made up of 13 members who live in the province of Cusco in the district of San Jerónimo.

loans.use: to purchase materials such as wood, carpenter's glue, nails, and other items needed to make furniture.

loans.name: Dania Esperanza

texts.es: Dania Esperanza es una emprendedora que ha cumplido su sueño de tener su propio negocio y poder salir adelante. Este inicia por la necesidad de generar ingresos a la familia que junto a su esposo que la apoya han luchado por seguir sus sueños. Dania Esperanza está solicitando crédito para invertir en el negocio en la compra de ropa de hombre, para damas, niños, sandalia, short, entre otros productos que mas demanda sus clientes.
texts.en: Dania Esperanza is an entrepreneur who has achieved her dream of having her own business and being able to get ahead. This began due to the need to generate income for the family for which, next to her husband who supports her, they have fought to follow their dreams. Dania Esperanza is requesting a loan to invest in the business buying men's, women's, and children's clothing, sandals, and shorts, among other products that her clients most request.

loans.use: to buy men's, women's, and children's clothing, sandals, and shorts, among other products.

loans.name: Mame

texts.fr: L'emprunteuse est une femme qui exerce dans le commerce de poissons frais, de poisson fumé et séché depuis plus de 10 ans.Elle est mariée et mère d'une fille.Après trois années seulement, elle était parvenu à gagner un marché d'approvisionnement en poisson d'une usine implantée dans la capitale.Malheureusement, celle ci tombe en faillite et elle se tourne vers la vente de poissons séché et fumé à travers les marchés hebdommadaires de l'intérieur du pays.Elle soutient par ses revenus son mari dans les dépenses d'entretien de la famille et parvient aussi à subvenir à certains de ses besoins propres. Pour renforcer son fonds de commerce, elle sollicite un pret de 15000f afin d'acheter du poisson fumé et séché. Son ambition est de construire sa propre maison.
texts.en: She has been in the business of selling fresh, smoked and dried fish for the past 10 years. She is married and has one daughter. After three years, she started supplying fish for a factory in the capital. Unfortunately, the factory went out of business and she decided to sell smoked and dried fish at the weekly markets throughout the country. With her profits, she helps her husband with the family's expenses and can even take care of some of her own needs. To strengthen her business, she is requesting a loan of 15,000 cfa francs to purchase smoked and dried fish. Her goal is to build her own home.

loans.use: to purchase smoked and dried fish.

loans.name: Awa

texts.fr: L'emprunteuse est une femme mariée, mère de 11 enfants dont les deux travaillent, l'un comme pecheur et l'autre comme chauffeur.Elle exerce un commerce en gros de charbon de bois.Elle revend son produit en détail auprès des boutiquiers de sa localité.Son activité lui permet d'entretenir sa famille et de subvenir à ses propres besoins.Elle a déja remboursé deux crédits de 100000f chacun à l'UIMCEC. En cette période très favorable à son commerce,elle sollicite un troisième pret de 100000f pour acheter 35 sacs de charbon. Son ambition est d'achetre un véhicule pour son fils chauffeur qui n'en dispose pas.
texts.en: She is married and the mother of eleven children. Two of them work, one as a fisherman and the other as a driver. She has a wholesale business of selling charcoal to retail stores in various villages. The business allows her to take care of her family and meet her own needs. She has already repaid two loans of 100,000 cfa francs to UIMCEC.  As business is good, she is requesting a third loan of 100,000 cfa francs to buy 35 bags of charcoal. Her goal is to buy a car for her son who is a driver, but doesn't have a car.

loans.use: to purchase 35 bags of charcoal.

loans.name: Modou

texts.fr: L'emprunteur est un homme marié, père de 10 enfants dont les 4 sont des élèves.Il a une grande expérience de son activité qu'il exerce depuis plus de 50 ans.Il a appris aux cotés de son père qui lui a cédé son atelier avant son décés.Aujourd'hui, il a formé plus de 10 personnes qui gère tous leurs propres ateliers de menuiserie métallique à travers les grandes villes de la région.Son activité lui procure des revenus qui lui permettent de prendre en charge sa famille et de subvenir à ses propres besoins. Afin de renforcer d'avantage ses capacités de production, il sollicite un pret de 100000 f auprès de l'UIMCEC pour acheter des produits de nettoyage de ses machines (mercure, agipson)et des pièces détachées(pignons, bobine...).Son ambition est de moderniser son équipement par l'acquisition d'une machine cable 77.
texts.en:
This lender is a married man, a father of 10 children, 4 of whom are trainees. He has a large experience in his activity, which he has been conducting for more than 50 years. He learned from his father who handed down his workshop before he died. To this day, he has trained more than 10 people, each of whom manages their own metal workshop in the various big cities of the region. 
His business generates sufficient income to allow him to cover the family's living expenses and to take care of his own needs. In order to increase his production capacity, he is seeking a loan of 100,000f with UIMCEC in order to purchase cleaning products for his machines (mercure, and agipson) and spare parts (cogs and gearwheels.....) His ambition is to modernise his equipment with the acquisition of a 'cable 77' machine.

loans.use: to purchase cleaning products for his machines (mercure and agipson), and spare parts (cogs and gearwheels)

loans.name: Abdoulaye

texts.fr: L'emprunteur est un ancien chauffeur de véhicule de transport de touristes.Il est à la retraite depuis un an et vit chez lui avec son épouse et ses 8 enfants.Tous ses enfants sont à l'école , les 3 sont des étudiantes à l'université.Actuellement, il exerce un élevage de poulets de chair et fait du maraichage dans son champs de 2 ha de surface.Il arrive, avec ses acivités, à prendre en charge les besoins de sa famille.Afin de  réaliser une nouvelle opération, il sollicite auprès de UIMCEC un pret de 200000f pour acheter 100 poussins, de l'aliment et des produits vétérinaires. Son ambition est d'agrandir son élevage.
texts.en: This lender is a former driver of tourist vehicles. He has been retired for a year and lives together with his wife and their 8 children. All the children are at school, 3 of them are students at university. Currently, he has a chicken rearing farm and also a market garden in his 2 hectare field. With these activities, he manages to cover the family's living expenses. In order to start a new operation, he is seeking a loan of 200,000f from UIMCEC to buy 100 chicks, feed and veterinary products. His ambition is to grow his farm.

loans.use: to buy 100 chicks, feed and veterinary products

loans.name: Zenon Basilio

texts.es:
Zenon nació en la ciudad del Arequipa y tiene 32 años edad, él es soltero y no tiene hijos aun. Actualmente, Zenon vive en la hermosa ciudad del Cusco donde realiza sus actividades económicas.    
 
Zenon se dedica a la elaboración de estructura metálicas como por ejemplo puertas, ventanas otras cosas más.  Ya son dos años que se dedica a este negocio y le va muy bien.  Zenon requiere el préstamo para comprar materiales como por ejemplo fierros, soldadura y otras cosas. 

Zenon es integrante del banco comunal “Pillao”. Este  grupo está conformado con 13 socios que viven  en la provincia de Cusco del distrito de San Jerónimo.
texts.en:
Zenon was born in the city of Arequipa and is 32 years old. He is single and does not yet have children. Zenon currently lives in the beautiful city of Cusco where he works.

Zenon works making metal structures such as doors, windows and other items. He has been working in this business for the past two years and he is doing well. Zenon needs this loan to purchase materials such as tools, welding items, etc.

He is a member of the Pillao Communal Bank which is comprised of 13 members living in the Province of Cusco and the District of San Jerónimo.
