loans.use: to buy materials such as tools, welding items, etc.

loans.name: Oumar

texts.fr: L'emprunteur est un homme marié, père de deux filles, toutes deux èléves au prescolaires.Il gère une auto - école dans sa localité.Il forme ses clients à la conduite auto et les assiste pour l'obtention du permis de conduire.Il fait en meme temps des prestations de service pour tout document administratif relatif au transport.Il exerce dans ce sectetur depuis près de 20 ans.Afin d'améliorer sse capacités de prestation, il sollicite un pret de 500000f pour acheter un moteur et réviser son véhicule.Son ambition est d'ouvrir d'autres auto- école dans sa région.
texts.en: This lender is a married man, father of two pre-school girls. He runs a driving school in his local area. He teaches his students to drive, and assists them in obtaining a driving licence. At the same time, he offers his services for all administrative documents relating to transport. He has done this for almost 20 years. In order to increase his availability, he is seeking a loan of 500,000f to purchase an engine and to service his car. His goal is to open other driving schools in his region.

loans.use: to purchase an engine and to service his car

loans.name: Ingrid

texts.es: Ingrid de 39 años de edad vive al sur occidente de la ciudad, con su cónyuge y sus 3 hijos en las edades de 7 a 11 años. Allí en la casa de sus padres se dedica a la venta de carnes frías y también vende productos de dulcería. Su negocio nació con el capital que le dio su cónyuge, quien trabaja en una empresa, y con este dinero logró hacer su primera clientela y aumentarla a través de su gestión empresarial.  Ingrid vende los productos diariamente, pero hay épocas en las cuales se incrementan sus ventas y es cuando su capital de trabajo, se torna insuficiente para responder a la gran demanda de su  clientela. En la actualidad se acerca la temporada de mayor movimiento comercial y ella necesita tener dinero en efectivo para comprar en mayor volumen, ganar descuentos y responder a su clientela; esta es justamente la razón por la cual acude a su credikiva, primer financiamiento que hace a la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo con el que comprará carnes frías como pavos rellenos y también para comprar ingredientes y elaborar  las deliciosas natillas para celebrar la navidad, que sus clientes le han encargado. Con su credikiva logrará comprar de contado y en un mayor volumen obteniendo descuestos especiales que trasladará a sus clientes en una temporada de un gran despliegue comercial que favorece el mercado de Ingrid.
texts.en: Ingrid, 39-years-old, lives to the southwest of the city with her spouse and three children who are between the ages of 7 and 11. There in her parent's home she makes a living selling cold meats and candy products. Her business was born with the capital her spouse gave her, who works in a company, and with this money she achieved her first customers and increasing them by means of her business management. Ingrid sells her products daily, but there are times during which her sales increase. This is when her work capital becomes insufficient to respond to her customer's great demand. Currently the season of greater commercial movement is nearing and she needs to have money in cash to buy things in greater volume, get discounts, and respond to her customers. This is precisely the reason for which she is turning to her Kiva loan, the first funding that she has made at the Mario Santo Domingo Foundation. With this she will buy cold meats like stuffed turkeys and also buy ingredients and make delicious custards to celebrate Christmas, with which her customers have entrusted her. With her Kiva loan she will be able to pay in cash and in a greater volume, obtaining special discounts that will move her customers during a season of great commercial deployment that favors her market.

loans.use: to buy cold meats like stuffed turkeys and also buy ingredients and make delicious custards.

loans.name: Marouba

texts.fr: L'emprunteur est un homme qui vit avec sa femme et son fils agé de quatre ans.Il tient une cantine de vente de matériel informatique et d'accéssoirs de téléphoniques depuis trois ans.Auparavant, il a été carreleur mais suite à une longue maladie qui lui a valu deux opérations, il a été obligé de changer de travail.Aujour d'hui, il sollicite un pret de 200000f pour acheter 1 unité central et des accéssoirs de téléphone. Son ambition est d'élargir son commerce.
texts.en: This lender is a man living with his wife and four year old son. He has had a business selling IT products and telephone accessories for three years.  Previously, he was a tiler; however he was obliged to change careers following a long illness and two operations. Today, he is seeking a loan of 200,000f to purchase a central switchboard and telephone accessories. His ambition is to grow his business.

loans.use: to buy a central switchboard and telephone accessories.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To purchase a solar kit.

loans.name: Jérome

texts.fr: L'emprunteur est un jeune pharmacien vétérinaire, célibataire sans enfants.Il tient une pharmacie vétérinaire.Il exrece dans cette activité depuis 2005  après une formation de deux ans.Il vit avec ses deux parents, ses frères et soeurs.Son commerce lui assure des bénéfices qui l'aident à prendre en charge les besoins de sa famille ainsi que ses propres besoins.Il sollicite un pret de 200000f pour acheter des antibiotiques, des antiparasitaires, des vaccins et des vitamines.Son ambition est d'agrandir sa pharmacie.
texts.en: He is a young veterinary pharmacist who is single and does not have children. He manages a veterinary pharmacy. He has been in business since 2005 after two years of training. He lives with his parents and siblings.  His business generates enough profits so he can help his family with daily expenses as well as meet his own needs. He is requesting a loan of 200,000 cfa francs to purchase antibiotics, antiparasitics, vaccines and vitamins. His goal is to grow the pharmacy.

loans.use: to buy antibiotics, antiparasitics, vaccines and vitamins.

loans.name: Thierno

texts.fr: L'emprunteur est un homme marié qui vend de la paille d'arachide, un fourrage très privé par les éleveurs pour l'alimentation des leurs bètes.Il est père de 4 enfants dont l'un fréquente l'école primaire.Son activité s'avère très rentable et lui procure des revenus qui lui permettent de prendre en charge les frais d'entretien de sa famille.Afin d'augmenter son fonds de commerce, il sollicite un pret de 400000f afin d'acheter 200 sacs de paille d'arachide. Son ambition est de renforcer son commerce.
texts.en: He is married and sells peanut plant stalks, a very special by-product which farmers use to feed their livestock. He has four children with one attending school at this time. The business has turned out to be very profitable and the profits have allowed him take care of his family. In order to increase his capital, he is requesting a loan of 400,000 cfa francs to purchase 200 sacks of peanut plant stalks. His goal is to strengthen and grow the business.

loans.use: to buy 200 sacks of peanut plant stalks.

loans.name: Genoveva

texts.es:
Genoveva nació en la ciudad del Cusco en el distrito de Santiago y tiene 50 años edad, ella tiene una relación de unión libre de la cual tiene cuatro hijos. Actualmente, Genoveva vive en la histórica ciudad del Cusco donde realiza sus actividades económicas.    
 
Genoveva se dedica a la crianza de animales menores como por ejemplo cuyes y gallinas.  Ya son varios años que se dedica a este negocio y le va muy bien.  Genoveva requiere el préstamo para comprar más cuyes y gallinas.  

Genoveva es integrante del banco comunal “Pillao”. Este  grupo está conformado con 13 socios que viven  en la provincia de Cusco del distrito de San Jerónimo.
texts.en:
Genoveva was born in the city of Cusco, district of Santiago, and is 50 years old. She is in a free union which has produced 4 children. At present, she lives in the historic city of Cusco where she carries out her economic activities.

Genoveva raises small livestock such as, for example, guinea pigs and hens. She has been in this business for several years and it is going well. She needs a loan to buy more guinea pigs and hens.

Genoveva belongs to the "Pillao" Communal Bank. This group is composed of 13 members, most of whom live in Cusco province, San Jeronimo district.

loans.use: to buy more guinea pigs and hens.

loans.name: Mamour

texts.fr: L'emprunteur est un jeune célibataire dont les deux parents sont décédés.Il vit avec ses frères et soeurs. Il commercant ambulant dans les différntes marchés de sa localité. Il s'approvisionne en vetements dans la capitale et à l'aide d'un sac en plastique transparent , transporte sa marchandise à travers la ville pour la proposer aux passants. Ce travail très difficile lui rapporte quelques bénéfices qui lui permettent de se prendre en charge et de subvenir à certains besoins de ses frères ety soeurs.Auparavant, il a été successivement pecheur et conducteur de charette de tarnsport de marchandises.Afin d'augmenter ses revenus, il sollicite un pret de 100 000f pour acheter des jeans, des tee - shirt et des tissus. Son plus grand reve est d'ouvrir une boutique au marché central et de se fixer définitivement.
texts.en: This lender is a young single man whose parents are both deceased. He lives with his brothers and sisters. He is a roving salesman in the different markets in his area. He purchases clothes for sale in the capital city, and transports the goods in a clear plastic bag throughout the town in order to offer them to passers-by. This difficult work generates a small income which allows him to cover his living expenses and to assist his brothers and sisters with theirs. In the past, he has been a fisherman and a delivery driver. In order to grow his income, he is seeking a loan of 100,000f to buy jeans, T-shirts and cloths. His biggest dream is to open a shop in the central market and to have a fixed location.

loans.use: to buy jeans, T-shirts and cloths

loans.name: Luisa

texts.es: La socia continua con su negocio de agricultura y de la crianza, compra y venta animales menores como cuyes y gallinas, la socia desea comprar en esta ocasión 20 cuyes y 4 pares de gallinas, la socia también invierte su credito en la compra de semillas de  verduras como cebollas china, también comprara 20 cuyes y 4 pares de gallina que hace un total de 8 gallinas, la socia es una mujer muy trabjadora y desea a futuro terminar de construir su vivienda y tambien que le vaya muy bien con la venta de sus productos especialmente de la cebolla china. La socia solicita el prestamo para invertir en la compra de semillas para sembrar cebolla china.
texts.en: This borrower is continuing with her business of farming as well as raising and selling small animals such as guinea pigs and chickens. On this occasion, she would like to buy 20 guinea pigs and 4 pairs of chickens. She will also invest her loan in buying seeds for vegetables such as green onions. She will also buy 20 guinea pigs and 4 pairs of chickens, making a total of 8 chickens. The borrower is a very hard-working woman, and in the future she would like to finish constructing her house. She also hopes the sales of her products will go very well, especially the green onions. The borrower is requesting the loan to invest in buying seeds to plant green onions.

loans.use: to invest in buying small animals and seeds to plant onions.

loans.name: Mary Joy

texts.en:
Mary Joy is 35 years old and married. She has six children, with three in school. Mary Joy works very hard to provide for them.

Mary Joy runs a business buying and selling scrap materials in the Philippines. Mary Joy has been in this business for 10 years.

She requested a PHP 12,000 loan through NWTF to buy more scrap materials to sell.

In the future, Mary Joy would like to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: To buy more scrap materials to sell.

loans.name: Lucena

texts.en:
Lucena works hard to support her family. She is married and has a junk shop business in the Philippines. She has been in this business for 11 years now, and also earns additional income from farming vegetables and raising livestock.

Lucena requested a PHP 10,000 loan through NWTF to buy more recycled materials to sell.

Lucena would like to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to buy more recycled materials to sell.

loans.name: Cheikh

texts.fr: L'emprunteur est un ferrailleur qui exerce cette activité depuis 3 ans. Il traite le fer, le cuivreet l'aliminium puis le revend auprès des usines de la capitale.iL Eest marié et père de 3 enfants qu'il entretient avec les revenus de son activité.Pour renforcer son fonds de commerce, il sollicite un pret de 300000f auprès de l'UIMCEC afin d'acheter du fer, du cuivre et de l'aluminium.Son ambition est d'élargir son activité.
texts.en: The borrower is a scrap metal merchant who has been in business for 3 years. He processes iron, copper and aluminum then resells them to factories in the capital. He is married and a father of three children. He is able to take care of his family with the profits of his business. In order to strengthen the business, he is requesting a loan of 300,000 cfa francs from UIMCEC to buy iron, copper and aluminum. His goal is to grow the business.

loans.use: to purchase iron, copper and aluminum.

loans.name: Maurecia

texts.en:
Maurecia, 46, is married and has three children, two of them in school. She is a very hard working entrepreneur. 

Maurecia has a food-vending business in the Philippines. She has been in this business for five years. Maurecia requested a PHP 14,000 loan through NWTF to purchase additional ingredients for her business.

In the future, Maurecia would like to save enough money so she can send her children to college.

loans.use: To purchase additional ingredients for her business.

loans.name: Merlina

texts.en:
Merlina works hard to support her family. Merlina is single and has a food-vending business in the Philippines. Merlina has been in this business for 10 years now, and she also earns additional income from selling fruits and vegetables.

Merlina requested a PHP 14,000 loan through NWTF to buy more chicken and ingredients for her food business.

In the future, Merlina would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy more chicken and ingredients for her food business.

loans.name: Placida

texts.en:
Placida is 59 years old and has seven children. She is married and has one child who is in school.

Placida is in the agricultural business raising pigs in the Philippines. Placida requested a PHP 12,000 loan through NWTF to buy feed and vitamins for her pigs.

Placida has been raising pigs for 10 years now and has borrowed 4 times in the past from NWTF to sustain it.

In the future, Placida would like to save enough money to build a grocery store in a public market.

loans.use: to buy feed and vitamins for her pigs

loans.name: Melinda

texts.en:
Melinda works hard to support her family. Melinda is married and has a salon business in the Philippines.

Melinda requested a 22,000 PHP loan through NWTF to buy additional equipment for her salon. Melinda has been in this business for 10 years now.

In the future, Melinda would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy additional equipment for her salon

loans.name: Araceli

texts.en:
Araceli is 50 years old and married with 4 children.

Araceli works hard to provide for her family. She runs a sari-sari (convenience) store in the Philippines and requested a 12,000 PHP loan through NWTF to purchase more stock to sell.

Araceli has borrowed and repaid 3 loans from NWTF before this loan. She has been running the sari-sari store for 27 years and also earns an income from food vending.

Araceli aspires to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase more stock to sell

loans.name: Diosa

texts.es: Diosa de 18 años el una emprendedora natural, que inició su negocio de la mano de su madre quien lo inició en la sala de su casa y posteriormente enseñó a su hija para que lo administrara y generara sus propios ingresos. Diosa hoy tiene una sala de belleza, donde ofrece servicios de mejoramiento de la imagen personal y profesional en las líneas femenina, masculina e infantil. Su meta es estudiar cosmetología y está preparándose con sus ahorros para lograrlo y ofrecer una larga cola de productos afines en su salón. En la actualidad está aplicando a su credikiva, primer financiamiento que hace a la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, con el cual comprará un aire acondicionado, y realizará adecuaciones a su local para ofrecer condiciones confortables a sus clientes e iniciar el proceso de fidelización y mercadeo de su futura oferta de servicios. El éxito de su inversión actual es que la hará en un momento de gran movimiento comercial, en el que usualmente las ventas se incrementan y su capital de trabajo también, por efecto de las fiestas de navidad y año nuevo, donde las familias quieren esperar unidos y bien elegantes al niño Dios y a su nuevo año 2012.
texts.en: Diosa, 18 years old, is a natural entrepreneur. She began her business with the help of her mother, who began it in the living room of her home and subsequently taught her daughter so that she would administer and generate her own income. Today Diosa has a beauty salon where she offers services to females, males, or children to better one's personal and professional image. Her goal is to study cosmetology. She is preparing herself to achieve this and offer a large line of similar products in her salon with her savings. Currently she is applying for a Kiva loan, her first funding that she is requesting from the Mario Santo Domingo Foundation, with which she will buy an air conditioner and carry out renovations to her salon in order to offer comfortable conditions to her customers and begin the loyalty and marketing process of her future service offers. The success of her current investment is that she will make it in a moment of great commercial movement, during which sales usually increase and her work capital will too due to the Christmas holidays and New Year, when families want to wait together elegantly for the child of God and the New Year 2012.

loans.use: will buy an air conditioner and will carry out renovations to her salon to offer comfortable conditions to her customers.

loans.name: Luz Marina

texts.es: La señora Luz Marina a sus 57 años de edad se dedica en sus ratos libres a la confección de prendas de vestir sobre medida a sus familiares, amigos y conocidos, esto debido a que trabaja como auxiliar de limpieza y aseo en una empresa del aeropuerto del municipio de Rionegro ubicado al oriente de Antioquia. La actividad de la confección la realiza desde hace más de 30 años, con la cual a podido mejorar sus ingresos y calidad de vida de su esposo y tres hijos. Con el ánimo confeccionar nuevas prendas de vestir femeninas para ofrecer a sus clientes y que le permitan mejorar su negocio el cual ha tenido dificultades económicas en los últimos meses, la señora Luz Marina necesita de la compra de insumos de tela e hilos con los cuales pueda sacar adelante su sueño y continuar apoyando económicamente a su familia.
texts.en: Luz Marina, 57 years old, makes a living tailoring over-measured clothing of family, friends, and other people she knows in her spare time. This is due to her working as a cleaning and tidiness assistant for a company of the airport of the municipality of Rionegro located to the east of Antioquia. She has been tailoring clothing for more than 30 years, due to which she has been able to increase her earnings and the quality of life of her husband and three children. With the aim of tailoring new female clothing to offer to her customers which allows her to better her business which has gone through economic difficulties in the last months, Luz Marina needs to buy cloth and thread supplies with which she can get her dream off the ground and continue financially supporting her family.

loans.use: to buy cloth and thread supplies.

loans.name: Virginia

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “Villa Rayanniyoc” el cual pertenece al poblado de Rayanniyoc situado en la provincia de Pisac, departamento Cusco.

La socia Virginia;  tiene 48 años de edad, la socia es casada y tiene 4 hijos de los cuales esta con el hijo de 18 años de edad; la socia tiene su negocio de compra y venta de cereales la socia vende productos como trawi, quinua, trigo, la socia también se dedica la  crianza de animales menores, la socia tiene cuyes, gallinas, chanchos, ovejas y ganados, la socia en esta ocasión desea invertir el prestamo en la compra de tarwi, trigo y otros cereale spara venderlos en Cusco. La socia solicita el prestamo para invertir en la compra de cereales como trigo, tarwi.

La socia se compromete a cumplir con el pago de las cuotas en el tiempo establecido segun el cronograma y agradece a los que hacen posible este prestamo.
texts.en:
This member belongs to “Villa Rayanniyoc” Community Bank in Rayanniyoc town, Pisac province, department of Cusco.

Virginia is a 48 year-old married woman. She has four children and lives with one of them, aged 18. She has a business for selling and buying cereals such as trawi, quinoa and wheat. She also raises small animals such as guinea pigs, hens, pigs, sheep and cows. Virginia wants to invest this loan in the purchase of tarwi, wheat and other cereals for selling them in Cusco. 

She promises to make her repayments on time according to schedule and is thankful to her loaners.

loans.use: purchasing cereals such as wheat and tarwi.

loans.name: Mirna Isabel

texts.es:
Mirna, se ha decidido por un nuevo préstamo, porque quiere surtir el chalet, ya que en esta temporada las ventas aumentan y quiere aprovechar para una mejor capacidad frente a la demanda, su compra será en gaseosas, panes, jugos, boquitas, galletas. 
Ella ha tenido un efecto positivo con su préstamo anterior, pues sus clientes están satisfechos por el servicio que brinda, así como sus ganancias familiares han sido mejor.
texts.en:
Mirna has decided to take out a new loan because she wants to stalk her snack shop since during this season sales go up and she wants to take advantage of this by being better supplied for the demand.  She will buy soft drinks, bread, juices, snacks, and cookies.

Her first loan had a positive effect; her clients are satisfied with the service she provides them with and her family's earnings have improved.

loans.use: to buy soft drinks, bread, juices, snacks, and cookies

loans.name: Vilma

texts.es:
Vilma nació en la ciudad de Cusco de la provincia del Cusco y tiene 37 años edad, ella es casada y fruto de esta hermosa relación tiene tres hijos.  Actualmente, Vilma vive en la histórica ciudad del Cusco donde realiza sus actividades económicas.    
 
Vilma se dedica a la venta de productos de primera necesidad, ella tiene una pequeña tienda  en su domicilio desde muy temprano la podemos encontrar vendiendo sus productos a sus clientes.  Ya son varios años que se dedica a este negocio y le va muy bien.  Vilma requiere el préstamo para comprar más sacos de arroz, sacos de azúcar, sacos de fideos, harina, huevos, leche, aceite, pan y otras cosas más.   

Vilma es integrante del banco comunal “Pillao”. Este  grupo está conformado con 13 socios que viven  en la provincia de Cusco del distrito de San Jerónimo.
texts.en:
Vilma was born in the city of Cusco, Cusco Province. She is 37 years old, married, and fruit of this wonderful relationship are their three children. At the moment, Vilma lives in the historic city of Cusco where she sells groceries.

She sell groceries and her store is located inside her home. Early in the morning, one can find Vilma selling her products to her clients. She has been working in this business for various years now. Vilma is requesting the loan to buy more sacks of rice, sacks of sugar, sacks of noodles, flour, eggs, milk, oil, bread, etc.

Vilma is a member of the communal bank "Pillao." This group is formed of 13 members who live in the Cusco province, San Jerónimo district

loans.use: buy more sacks of rice, sacks of sugar, sacks of noodles, flour, eggs, milk, oil, bread, etc.

loans.name: Miguel

texts.es:
El señor Miguel y su esposa tienen cinco hijos de mediana edad que están estudiando, se dedican desde hace diez y seis años  a la venta de fritos, jugos, dulces. Actualmente necesitan invertir para vendar mercancía de temporada que es elotes preparados, tamales y tacos, pero no cuentan con el dinero necesario para la inversión. Solicitan el préstamo para comprar la mercancía y seguir generando ingresos para su familia lo necesario. 
Es un matrimonio emprendedor y luchita que  buscan de todo para que sus hijos tengan una mejor y buena calidad de vida  y brindarles un fututo mejor.
texts.en:
Miguel and his wife have 5 middle age children who are students. He has been working for 16 years in the sales of fried food, juices and sweets. 

Currently he needs to buy seasonal merchandise as the corn is ready, and tamales and tacos, but he does not have the money he needs to do this. 

He is asking for a loan in order to buy merchandise and to continue earning the necessary income for his family.

He and his wife, Luchita, are entrepreneurs together searching everywhere so that their children might have a better quality of life and to provide them with a better future.

loans.use: to buy merchandise to sell during the winter months

loans.name: Luz Mary

texts.es: La señora Luz Mary a sus 51 años de edad se dedica a la venta de ropa femenina, su negocio surgió desde hace cuatro años de la necesidad de generar su propios ingresos luego de quedarse sin empleo y sin el apoyo de su cónyuge del cual se separó hace varios años, quedando sola con la obligación de su hogar y dos hijos. Actualmente, la señora Luz Mary necesita de la compra de jeans, camisetas y ropa interior femenina con lo cual pueda generar el inventario necesario para suplir la demanda de sus clientes, mejorar sus ventas y así la calidad de vida de su familia. A futuro, la señora Luz Mary sueña con tener su propio almacén de venta de ropa y ver a sus dos hijos como profesionales.
texts.en:
Ms. Luz Mary at her 51 years of age sells women's clothing. Her business started up four years ago out of the need to generate her own income after becoming unemployed and without her spouse's support, from whom she separated a number of years ago, ending up alone with the responsibility of her home and two children. 

Currently Ms. Luz Mary needs to purchase jeans, T shirts and women's underwear with which she may generate the necessary inventory to supply the demands of her customers, improve sales and thus her family's quality of life. 

In the future Ms. Luz Mary dreams of having her own clothing store and of seeing her two children become professionals.

loans.use: to purchase women's clothing items.

loans.name: Sugheis

texts.es: Sugheis  de 36 años de edad es una mujer muy emprendedora que genera sus ingresos familiares a partir de dos negocios,  por un lado se dedica a  la venta de mercancías variada,  como vestidos femeninos, ropa de dormitorios, perfumes, cosméticos, los que distribuye de cliente a cliente de acuerdo con el pedido que estos le hagan; ella vende a crédito y recupera su inversión, semanalmente, quincenalmente o mensualmente basado en lo que pacte con sus clientes. El otro negocio es el alquiler de lavadoras, cuyas clientelas son principalmente las amas de casa, que disminuyen  su carga de trabajo doméstico,  mediante la utilización de estas máquinas, que lo hacen mas efectivo su trabajo. Su negocio como comerciante lo inició hace 3 años ; como su deseo de superación empresarial es permanente, su capital de trabajo se torna insuficiente, especialmente en las épocas de mayor movimiento comercial, como las de fin de año. Esta es la razón por la cual acude a su credikiva, primer financiamiento que hace a la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo con el cual comprará,  mercancías como vestidos elegantes y calzado, para responderle a sus clientes los pedidos, y que estos estén elegantemente vestidos, esperando la navidad y el nuevo año 2012.
texts.en: Thirty-six-year-old Sugheis is a very enterprising woman who generates income for her family from two businesses.  On the one hand, she sells various merchandise, such as women's dresses, sleepwear, perfumes, and cosmetics, which she delivers to each customer according to what she has ordered from her.  She sells on credit and gets back her investment weekly, biweekly, or monthly depending on the agreement with her customer.  Her other business is renting washing machines.  Her customers are mainly housewives who cut down on their household workload by using these machines, which make their work more efficient.  She started working as a merchant three years ago.  As she wants to continually improve her businesses, her working capital is no longer sufficient, especially during times when her businesses' turnover increases, such as the end of the year.  This is why she has sought out a Kiva loan through her first financing experience with Fundación Mario Santo Domingo.  With it, she will buy merchandise, such as elegant dresses and shoes, to fill her customers' orders and make sure they are well dressed for Christmas and New Year's 2012.

loans.use: to buy merchandise such as elegant dresses and shoes

loans.name: Juana

texts.es: La socia continua con su negocio anterior de la compra y venta de cereales y lana de alpaca, verduras, la socia tiene sus terrenos de cultivo de maíz y ganaderia y en esta ocasión la socia requiere el prestamo para la compra de semillas de verduras, cuyes y ovejas, la socia tiene pensado comprar semillas para sembrar y comprar ovejas, comprar cuyes como 20.
texts.en: Juana continues with her earlier business, buying and selling cereals, alpaca wool, and vegetables. She has her own fields for cultivating corn and raising sheep and, on this occasion, she needs a loan to buy vegetable seeds, guinea pigs and sheep. Juana is also considering buying green pea seeds to sow and buying more sheep, plus buying around 20 guinea pigs.

loans.use: buy supplies for her farming and sheep-raising business.

loans.name: Jose Elias

texts.es:
José, está solicitando nuevamente un préstamo para la compra de mercadería para el negocio, comprara panes, tortillas, carnes, pollo, gaseosas, jugos, condimentos, tomates y otros productos para la elaboración de comida rápida, su intención es mantenerse en el negocio y mejorar sus ventas.
Él considera que a través de estos préstamos su condición económica ha cambiado, que ahora cuanta con una mejor solvencia frente a sus obligaciones.
texts.en: José is once again requesting a loan for the purchase of merchandise for the business. He will buy bread, tortillas, meat, chicken, soft drinks, condiments, tomatoes and other products for making fast food. His intention is to remain in business and improve his sales. He believes that his economic condition has changed as a result of these loans, and that he is more solvent than he was in the face of his obligations.

loans.use: to purchase bread, tortillas, meat, chicken, soft drinks, condiments and tomatoes.

loans.name: Blanca Cecilia

texts.es:
Blanca, quiere seguir invirtiendo en su negocio, ya que quiere darle continuidad al mejoramiento del negocio, ella invertirá en plátanos, papas,aceite, entre otros productos que sean necesarios para la producción en su negocio.
Ella está contenta por este apoyo que recibe, ya que le han permitido tener más capacidad y mejores condiciones con su familia.
texts.en:
Blanca wants to go on investing in her business, wishing to give it continuity and improving the business. She wants to buy bananas, potatoes, oil and other supplies she needs in order to prepare the food for her business.

She is happy with the help that she receives. It has permitted her to have more capacity and to improve the quality of life for her family.

loans.use: to buy supplies such as bananas, potatoes and oil

loans.name: Hellen

texts.es: Hellen de 35 años de edad es un a mujer casada que tiene 3 hijos en las edades de 5 a 10 años, con quienes vive al sur occidente de la ciudad, donde tiene un negocio mediante el cual vende mercancía variada, como ropa femenina y masculina, calzado y accesorios, desde hace 5 años, cuando con el fin de apoyar el bienestar de su hogar, decidió poner en marcha su idea emprendedora, con la que hoy ha logrado su objetivo. Hellen vende a sus clientes mercancías varias, mediante un sistema de crédito distribuido en cuotas, que oscilan entre semanal y mensual,  de acuerdo al plan de pago, que negocia previamente con ellos. Sus principales clientes se encuentran en los alrededores de su barrio y también son empleados de diversas empresas. El sueño  de Hellen, es convertir su negocio en una gran distribuidora de productos,  donde la gente encuentre todo lo que necesita y ella poder vender al por mayor,  a personas  que distribuyen día a día, como lo hace ella hoy. En la actualidad, planea aprovechar la temporada de fiestas de final del año, para aumentar sus ventas y generar mucho mas ingreso, porque sus clientes han hecho pedidos a los cuales desea responder y no tiene el suficiente capital de trabajo para hacerlo. Esta es la razón por la cual acude a su credikiva, primer financiamiento que hace a ala Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, con el cual comprará adornos navideños, vestidos elegantes, juguetes y calzado, para responder a las solicitudes de sus clientes y darse el gusto de verlos felices y bien elegantes recibiendo el nuevo 2012.
texts.en:
Hellen is 35 years old. She is a married woman and has 3 children who are between 5 and 10 years old. They live southwest of the city where she has a business selling varied merchandise, such as clothing for women and men, shoes and accessories. She decided five years ago, in order to help with the financial welfare of her home, to launch her entrepreneurial plan, which she has successfully done. 

Hellen sells general merchandise to her customers, through a credit system whereby they make payments, ranging from weekly or monthly, according to the payment agreement that she negotiates with them before the sale. Her main customers live around the neighborhood and also are employed by various companies.

Hellen’s dream is to turn her business into a large distributor of products where people find whatever they need and she can sell it at wholesale, for people to resale every day, as she is doing today.

At this time she plans to take advantage of the holiday season at the end of the year to increase her sales and to earn much more income, because her customers have made requests to which she wants to respond but she does not have enough cash flow to do it. This is the reason for which she is asking for a Kiva loan, her first financial funding under the wing of Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, in order to buy Christmas decorations, party dresses, games and shoes in order to respond to the needs of her clients and give herself the pleasure of seeing them happy and very elegant when receiving the 2012 New Year.

loans.use: to buy Christmas decorations, party dresses, toys, and shoes

loans.name: Griselda Maricela

texts.es:
Griselda, para seguir dándole mayor fortalecimiento al negocio, está solicitando nuevamente un préstamo, para invertirlo en frutas, verduras, mariscos, y materiales para la elaboración de las pupusas, ella hará una pequeña inversión a cada rubro, haciendo mejoras para que todo sea productivo.
Ella considera que ha logrado mejorar ya que ha puesto un negocio en el mercado, con un puesto fijo y con clientela bien definida, hasta el momento su familia se ha mantenido, apoyándole y con la confianza en sus negocios.
texts.en: Griselda, in order to continue strengthening her business, is applying for a new loan to invest in fruits, vegetables, seafood, and ingredients to prepare pupusas. She will make a small investment in each item, making improvements so that everything will be profitable. She feels that she has succeeded in improving her business, since she has set up a business in the market, with a fixed location and a clearly defined clientele. Up to now her family has supported her, helping her and having confidence in her business.

loans.use: to buy fruit, vegetables, seafood, and ingredients for pupusas.

loans.name: Maria Yamileth

texts.es:
María, está solicitando otro préstamo, por el buen servicio y la necesidad que en estos momentos se representa, pues quiere comprar maíz, leña y otros materiales para la ejecución de su negocio como el gas, teniendo mayor seguridad en la producción para este mes de diciembre.
Ella considera que sus ventas han mejorado y que clientes está satisfecho con su servicio, esto le ha permitido tener mayores ingresos para cubrir las necesidades de su hogar.
texts.en:
María is requesting another loan because of the good service and the need that she currently has.  She wants to purchase corn, firewood and other materials, like gas, to keep her business going.  Then she can be sure to have better production in this month of December.
María  feels that her sales have improved and that her customers are satisfied with her service.  This has allowed her to have an increased income and cover her household expenses.

loans.use: to purchase corn and firewood to make and sell tortillas.

loans.name: Maria Luisa

texts.es:
María, está solicitando un nuevo préstamo ya que necesita realizar una nueva inversión a su negocio, comprará ropa de temporada como Blusas, short, vestidos y pantalones para mantener mayor disponibilidad a los clientes, esto le ayudará para mejorar las ventas y ganar nuevos clientes.
Ella considera que el inventario de su negocio ha mejorado a través de la buena administración de los préstamos, ya que le permite mantener las prendas de vestir que son más demandadas en el mercado.
texts.en:
María is asking for a new loan because she needs to make a new investment in her business.  She will buy seasonal clothing, such as tops, shorts, dresses, and pants, to have more available to her customers.  This will help her improve her sales and attract new customers.  

She believes her business' inventory has improved through good management of her loans, as it allows her to stock the clothing items that are most in-demand in the market.

loans.use: to buy tops, shorts, dresses, and pants

loans.name: Karen Elena

texts.es: Karen vive al sur occidente de la ciudad con su cónyuge y su hijo de 10 años de edad. Allí se dedica a ala venta de mercancías varias, negocio que inició desde el año 2001, con un pequeño capital, con el cual compró accesorios y perfumes, a lo que gradualmente ha ido agregando otras mercancías, como ropa, juguetes, y también infraestructura como vitrinas, que comenzó a surtir poco a poco. Su meta es incrementar los inventarios, especialmente en el mes de Diciembre, época en la cual, tradicionalmente rotan rápidamente sus mercancías, mediante compras de contado, aunque también continúa ofreciendo crédito a sus mejores clientes. Su mayor desafío es tener el capital de trabajo suficiente, para responderle de manera oportuna a sus clientes, esta es la razón por la cual acude a su credikiva, primer financiamiento que hace a la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, con el que planea comprar juguetería, que está encargada por sus clientes, y que finalmente despertarán la alegría de los niños al recibir al niño Dios el 24 de Diciembre a las 12 P.M., y a ella le darán la satisfacción de generar ingresos y ver felicidad en sus hermosos rostros.
texts.en: Karen lives in the southwest of the city with her partner and her ten-year-old son.  She sells various merchandise there at the business she opened in 2001 with a small original investment she used to buy accessories and perfumes.  She has been gradually adding other merchandise, such as clothing and toys, as well as infrastructure, such as display cases, which she has filled little by little.  Her goal is to increase her inventory, especially in the month of December because it is usually the time when her merchandise turns over quickly through cash purchases, though she still offers her best clients credit.  Her greatest challenge is having enough working capital to respond to her customers on time.  This is why she is taking out a Kiva loan through her first financing experience with Fundación Mario Santo Domingo.  She plans to buy toys that her customers have ordered that will delight the children waiting to welcome the Child Jesus on December 24th at 12 a.m. and that will give her the satisfaction of earning money and seeing the happiness on their beautiful faces.

loans.use: to buy toys

loans.name: Patricia Arely

texts.es:
Patricia, se ha decidido por solicitar un nuevo préstamo, ya que su clientela y demanda ha aumentado por eso debe comprar más mercadería para brindar un buen servicio, comprará queso, crema, requesón, y los demás productos lácteos que necesita.
Ella ha tenido un efecto positivo con la inversión del préstamo anterior con la que ha mejorado sus inventarios y las ventas han aumentado.
texts.en:
Patricia has decided to apply for a new loan, since her clientele and demand have increased. That's why she must buy more merchandise, in order to provide a good service. 

She will buy cheese, cream, cottage cheese, and the other dairy products that she needs. She has seen a positive effect from the investment of her previous loan, which allowed her to improve her inventories and increase sales.

loans.use: To buy cheese, cream, and cottage cheese to sell.

loans.name: María Edilma

texts.es: A sus 63 años, la señora Maria Edilma se dedica desde su propia casa a la confección de prendas de vestir sobre medida y arreglos de modistería. Esta labor la realiza desde hace 20 años y le ha permitido desde entonces generar los ingresos necesarios para el sostenimiento de sus 5 hijos, su madre y un hermano. Con el ánimo de confeccionar productos de lencería hogar para ofrecer a sus clientes y poder mejorar sus ventas, la señora Maria Edilma necesita de la compra de insumos tales como telas, hilos y moldes que le permitan producir su línea hogar y así tener los recursos necesarios para cuidar a su madre y hermano quienes se encuentran delicados de salud y cumplir su sueño de tener un cultivo de frutas y animales para la venta.
texts.en:
At her 63 years of age Maria Edilma makes made-to-order clothing and does alterations from her own house.  She has been doing this work for 20 years, and it has allowed her to generate the needed income to support her five children, her mother, and a brother.

In order to make household linen products to offer to her customers, and to be able to improve her sales, Maria Edilama needs to buy supplies like fabric, needles, and patterns.  These supplies will allow her to produce her line of household linens.  That way she will have the resources needed to take care of her mother and brother, who are in delicate health.  She will also be able to fulfill her dream of having fruit crops and animals to sell.

loans.use: to buy supplies like fabric, needles, and patterns.

loans.name: Magnoudewa

texts.fr:
Magnoudewa est une femme âgée de 44 ans. Elle est veuve. Elle a trois enfants, dont un à l’école. Le premier a 28 ans et le dernier a 15 ans.
Magnoudewa travaille comme couturière et revendeuse depuis 1991. Elle coud des habits, vend des céréales, des légumes et du charbon de bois pour tous clients à domicile. Elle achète les produits à Lomé. Elle travaille seule. Au moment, sa difficulté est la concurrence sur le marché.
Magnoudewa a requis son quatrième crédit de WAGES afin d’acheter des ignames, du charbon de bois et des légumes. Elle veut réinvestir dans l’activité.
Dans les prochaines années, Magnoudewa voudrait agrandir la taille de son activité. Elle dit qu’avec les profits, elle prévoit d’assurer un avenir heureux à sa famille.
texts.en:
Magnoudewa is a 44-year-old woman. She is a widow. She has three children with one in school. The oldest is 28 and the youngest is 15.
Magnoudewa has worked as a seamstress and retailer since 1991. She makes clothes, sells grains, vegetables and charcoal to people at their homes. She purchases her products in Lome and works alone. At this time, her biggest challenge is competition.
Magnoudewa has requested her fourth loan from WAGES to purchase yams, charcoal and other vegetables. She wants to reinvest in her business.
In the future, Magnoudewa would like to broaden the scope of her business. With her profits, she wants to ensure a happy future for her family.

loans.use: to purchase bags of charcoal, grains and vegetables.

loans.name: Marlene Del Carmen

texts.es:
Marlene, se ha decidido a solicitar un nuevo préstamo, para comprar maíz, leña, gas y otros materiales para mejorar su negocio de pupusas, ya que ahora sus clientes han aumentado por lo mismo quiere mantener la suficiente mercadería y materiales para atender la demanda.
Ella considera que ha tenido un efecto positivo con el préstamo anterior, su negocio ha mejorado, sus clientes han aumentado, las ganancias y las ventas hoy en día son mucho mejor.
texts.en: Marlene decided to request a new loan to buy corn, firewood, gas and other materials to improve her pupusa [Salvadoran stuffed masa flat bread] business as her clientele has increased.  For this reason she wants to stock sufficient merchandise and materials to meet the demand.  She thinks that the previous loan had a positive effect as her clientele and income have increased and her sales are much better now.

loans.use: 'purchase corn, firewood and gas.

loans.name: Fizatou

texts.fr:
Fizatou est une femme âgée de 36 ans. Elle est mariée å un chauffeur. Elle a 3 enfants qui vont tous à l’école. Le premier a dix ans et le dernier a six ans.
Fizatou travaille comme revendeuse depuis 2000. Elle vend des pagnes pour tous clients de façon ambulante. Elle achète les produits à Lomé. Elle travaille seule. Au moment, elle n’a las de difficultés.
Fizatou a requis son troisième crédit de WAGES afin d’acheter des pagnes. Elle veut réinvestir dans l’activité.
Dans les prochaines années, Fizatou voudrait agrandir son activité en ouvrant une boutique. Elle dit qu’avec les profits, elle prévoit d’assurer le bien être de sa famille.
texts.en:
Fizatou is a 36 year-old woman. She is married to a driver. She has three children who all attend school. The oldest is 10 and the youngest is 6.
Fizatou has worked has a retailer since 2000. She sells pagnes (colorful West African cloth) to customers at their homes. She buys her products in Lome. She works alone and doesn't have any major challenges at this time.
Fizatou has requested her third loan from WAGES to buy pagnes. She wants to reinvest in the business.
In the coming years, Fizatou would like to grow the business and open a small shop. She intends to ensure the well-being of her family with the profits from her business.

loans.use: to purchase pagnes (colorful West African cloth).

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase corn, [cooked pork ground to a paste consistency], oil, and soft drinks.

loans.name: Rokhaya

texts.fr: Madame Rokhaya est âgée de 48 ans. Elle habite au Sénégal et est mère de 2 enfants âgés  de 8 et 11 ans.  Elle est vendeuse d’habits, de draps et autres articles divers depuis plus de 10 ans. Ce sont les difficultés de la vie qui l’ont poussé à choisir son activité. Ce qui l’intéresse  le plus c’est l’aspect lucratif de l’activité. Elle est sociétaire du guichet de l’U-IMCEC de sa zone d’habitation depuis octobre 2007. Elle sollicite un crédit de 100 000 frs prévu pour l’achat de draps,  chemises ,torchons destinés a la vente. Ce financement lui permettra d’accroitre ses  bénéfices et d’améliorer la situation sociale de sa famille.
texts.en: Rokhaya is 48 years old. She lives in Senegal and is the mother of two children, aged 8 and 11. She has been a reseller of clothing, fabrics and other various items for the past 10 years. The challenges of life drove her to choose this business. The profitability of the business interests her most. She has been a member of U-IMCEC in her area since October 2007. She is requesting a loan of 100,000 cfa francs to buy fabric, shirts, and towels for resale. The loan will help her to increase her profits and improve the well-being of her family.

loans.use: to purchase fabric and clothing for resale.

loans.name: Lucia Del Carmen

texts.es: Lucía, quiere ampliar el inventario de su negocio a través de un nuevo préstamo, invirtiendo lo en cereales y frijol, arroz, aceite, huevos a fortalecer el negocio. Considera que estos préstamos le han ayudado a crecer en el inventario y a tener una mejor respuesta ante las necesidades de los clientes. Su condición familiar ha mejorado ya que están siendo beneficiados de las ganancias del mismo negocio.
texts.en: Lucía wishes to expand her business inventory with a new loan.  She will purchase cereal, beans, rice, oil, and eggs to strengthen her business.  She believes that these loans have helped her to increase inventory in order to better respond to her customers needs.  Her family situation has improved since they have benefited from the profits of her business.

loans.use: to purchase cereal, beans, rice, oil, and eggs.

loans.name: Mouroukpé Elise

texts.fr:
Mouroukpé est une femme âgé(e) 26 ans. Elle est mariée à un  mécanicien avec 03 enfants en charge.
Mouroukpé travaille comme revendeuse de pagnes, des bijoux,(boucles d'oreilles,chaines) et de sacs depuis 2003. Elle achète à Cotonou et au Grand marché de Lomé et vend à ses clients dans un quartier de la place.
Mouroukpé a requis son premier crédit de WAGES afin d’acheter des pagnes et bijoux pour répondre à la demande de la population en cette période de fête de fin d’année.
Dans les prochaines années, Mouroukpé voudrait agrandir son activité.
texts.en: Mouroukpé is a 26-year-old woman. She is married to a mechanic and financially supports three children.  Mouroukpé has been working as a reseller of "pagnes" (colorful West African fabrics), jewelery and bags since 2003. She sells to customers in a local neighborhood after buying her merchandise in Cotonou and at the Grand Market in Lomé. Mouroukpé has requested her first loan from WAGES in order to buy some "pagnes" (colorful West African fabrics) and jewelry, to meet the demand of the local population during the Holiday Season. In the coming years, Mouroukpé would like to expand her business.

loans.use: To buy "pagnes" (colorful West African fabrics), jewelery and bags.

loans.name: Edis Alberto

texts.es:
Edis, quiere invertir en una nueva compra para mejorar su condición, comprará un motor para bombeo, y como no cuenta con la cantidad necesaria de dinero solicita este nuevo préstamo para que le ayude a cubrir el gasto y contar con esta nueva herramienta que le permitirá hacer más fácil su trabajo.
El ha tenido mejores cosechas por la compra de los insumos agrícolas que fueron obtenidos a través del préstamo anterior, mejorando sus siembras y la producción para alimentar a su familia.
texts.en:
Edis wishes to invest in a new purchase to improve his living conditions.  He will buy a new pump.  As he does not have the money he needs, he is requesting this new loan to help him cover the expense and have a new tool that will make his job easier.
He purchased farm inputs with the previous loan, and this has enabled him to produce a better harvest, and improve sowing and production to feed his family.

loans.use: to supplement the purchase of a pump.

loans.name: Adriana Patricia

texts.es: La señora Adriana Patricia a sus 27 años, se dedica a la venta de prendas de vestir para dama y accesorios desde hace aproximadamente 1 año buscando ingresos para apoyar económicamente a sus padres y conseguir su propio sustento. Debido a que sus clientes se retrazan en sus pagos, actualmente la señora Adriana no cuenta con un inventario de mercancía muy amplio para ofrecer en la temporada de fin de año, por lo cual necesita de la compra de mercancía con la cual pueda recuperar sus ventas, mejorar su calidad de vida y la de sus padres y cumplir su sueño de tener su propio almacén en el parque del municipio de Cocorná ubicado al Oriente de Antioquia.
texts.en: Señora Adriana Patricia, age 27, has been engaged in the sale of women’s clothing and accessories for approximately one year, looking for income to support her parents and herself.   Currently, since her customers are late with their payments, Señora Adriana doesn’t have a very large inventory to offer for the end of year season.  This is why she needs to purchase merchandise with which she can restore her sales, improve the quality of life for herself and her parents, and fulfill her dream of having her own shop in the municipal park of Cocorná located in Oriente de Antioquia.

loans.use: to purchase women's clothing and accessories.

loans.name: Celestina

texts.es:
Celestina, sigue con sus venta de disco de cd en musica y peliculas de forma ambulante, con mas de cuatro años en su comercio, el cual hay dias bueno y dias regulares, tambien vende refrescos, en donde se ayuda para sacar la ganancia del dia. Para ella, la mejora a su vivienda es su objetivo, junto con su esposo quien labora como albañil. Sus hijos estan casados.
Con este nuevo, financiamiento, comenzara hacer la mejora a su cuarto, al poder levantarlo de concreto, dando mejor solidez y seguridad a su vivienda. En donde comprara materiales de construccion y comenzar la obra.
texts.en:
Celestina continues with her sales of music CDs and movie DVDs selling on foot, with more than four years in this business. There are good days and so-so days. She also sells soft drinks which helps her daily income. For her and for her husband, who is a bricklayer, improving the housing is their goal. Her children are married.

With this new loan she will begin to make improvements to a room, mounting the concrete, making her housing thicker and more secure. She will buy construction materials and begin work.

loans.use: to buy construction materials such as blocks, sand, and cement in order to begin work mounting the concrete

loans.name: Nacira

texts.es: Nacira  residente en el corregimiento de Campeche, ubicado en el departamento del Atlántico, es una mujer muy trabajadora que ha apoyado el bienestar de su hogar con sus propios  ingresos provenientes de su trabajo forzado.  Ella tiene 3 hijos, hoy en las edades de 21 a 24 años y vive con su hija, su yerno y sus dos nietos.  Nacira se desempeña en varias actividades entre ellas la venta de mercancías, la elaboración de pasteles y de mochilas.  Las ventas de mercancías y mochilas,  las realiza entre sus vecinos y en algunos corregimientos cercanos, los pasteles los envía a Piojo, otro municipio del Departamento del Atlántico, de donde es oriunda y tiene un gran número de familiares allí residenciados, que forman parte de su clientela.  En su negocio,  Nacira con sus ventas cubre sus gastos operativos y familiares, su hija,  quien le colabora en todas las actividades que realiza, es su mayor apoyo, y a ambas  se les nota el interés por lograr el crecimiento de sus negocios y el desarrollo de su familia. En la actualidad está aplicando a su primer credikiva, también primer financiamiento que hace a la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, con el cual comprará mercancía principalmente, porque tiene muchos pedidos para la navidad y la noche buena y quiere complacer a sus clientes, respondiéndole de manera oportuna, así como ellos se lo merecen. Con el credikiva comprará ropa elegante, calzado, accesorios y regalos navideños, con los que impactará su mercado en una temporada de mayor rotación de dinero y muy comercial y esto hará de la inversión todo un éxito.
texts.en:
Nacira lives in the department division of Campeche, in Atlántico department.   She is a hardworking woman who has supported her family's welfare with her own income coming from her hard work.  She has 3 children, 21-24 and she lives with her daughter, her son-in-law and her two grandchildren.  Nacira has various businesses such as selling merchandise, making cakes and backpacks.  She sells the merchandise and backpacks to her neighbors and in some nearby neighborhoods, and she sends the cakes to Piojo, her native town in Atlántico department where she has many relatives residing and they make up part of her customer base.  The sales cover her operating and family expenses in the business.   Her daughter works with her in all of the businesses and she is her biggest help, and you can see the interest both of them have in the business so that it will grow.  They are also very interested in the development of their family.

 She is applying for her first loan with Kiva, and it will be the first financing that she has had with the Mario Santo Domingo Foundation as well.  She will use it principally to buy merchandise because she has many orders for Christmas and Christmas eve, and she wants to please her customers by reponding in the way they deserve.  She will use the loan to buy dressy clothing, shoes, accessories and Christmas presents which will be important for her business in a season of high activity.

loans.use: to buy dressy clothes, shoes, accessories and Christmas presents

loans.name: Nelly Yesenia

texts.es:
Nelly, se ha decidido por un nuevo préstamo ya que quiere aprovechar la temporada de diciembre para mejorar su negocio comprando nueva mercadería de celulares nuevos, carcasas, recargas, accesorios para celulares ya que esto le permitirá tener surtido el negocio para atender las demandas de los clientes.
Ella considera que las circunstancias familiares han mejorado, que su condición económica es más solvente en la actualidad.
texts.en: Nelly is applying for a new loan because she wants to benefit from the holiday season in order to improve her business by purchasing new merchandise: new cell phones, cases, rechargers, and cell phone accessories.  This will permit her to stock the business in order to serve the demands of her customers.  She believes her family circumstances have improved since her economic condition is currently more solvent.

loans.use: to purchase  new cell phones, cases, rechargers, and cell phone accessories.

loans.name: Mirna Ruth

texts.es: Mirna, por la necesidad de mejorar  la vivienda está solicitando un prestamo, ya que quiere realizarle unos trabajos a la casa y comprará cemento para repellarla en unas partes que aun faltan y pintura para darle una mejor apariencia y vistosidad. Ella con estos préstamos ha mejorado su condición de vida,su vivienda poco a poco se va transformando, ha solventado las compras más necesarias para tener una mejor condición y ofrecérselo también a su familia.
texts.en: Mirna is requesting a loan due to the need to better her home. Since she wants to carry out some work on her home she will buy cement to plaster it in some parts where it is still missing and paint to give it a better appearance and brightness. With these loans she has bettered her condition of life and her home is transforming little by little. She has settled for the most necessary purchases in order to have a better life and offer it to her family.

loans.use: to buy cement and paint for her home.

loans.name: Luis Angel

texts.es: Luis de 19 años vive en al sur occidente de la ciudad, donde se dedica al alquiler de lavadoras, como su actividad generadora de ingresos, la que inició hace 3 años cuando terminó de estudiar el bachillerato; el empezó trabajó en la distribución de bolsas plásticas, en las tiendas del sector y producto de este trabajo, hace un año compró lavadoras y empezó a ofrecer el servicio a sus vecinos y amas de casa que habitan en  sectores aledaños. Hoy en día cuenta con 8 lavadoras, pues logró ampliar su infraestructura, producto de un trabajo ordenado y con mucha disciplina. Su necesidad personal, de crecimiento empresarial es inmensa y esta es la razón por la cual se acerca a la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, porque requiere un capital de trabajo adicional para invertir en 4 lavadoras más, y lograr mayor eficiencia y eficacia en sus servicios. Su inversión planea ser exitosa porque ha logrado el reconocimiento de la comunidad por su buena atención y cada día su clientela crece y muchas veces se va sin obtener el servicio, porque sus maquinas se encuentran ocupadas, con su credikiva logrará superar esta debilidad empresarial. Su sueño es continuar sus estudios en el tema de mercadeo y esto es uno de sus mayores desafíos tambien.
texts.en: Luis, 19 years old, lives in the southwestern part of the city. Here he makes a living renting washing machines as his income-generating activity. He began this 3 years ago when he earned his high school diploma. He began to work in the distribution of plastic bags in the stores of the area. As a result of this job he bought washing machines one year ago and began to offer their service to his neighbors and housewives that live in the neighboring areas. Now he has eight washing machines and has thus achieved growing his infrastructure. This is a result of organized work and much discipline. His personal need to grow his business is great and this is the reason for which he came to the Mario Santo Domingo Foundation, as he needs an additional work capital to invest in four more washing machines and achieve better efficiency and effectiveness in his services. His investment plans to be successful because his machines are being used. With his Kiva loan he will achieve overcoming this business weakness. His dream is to continue his studies in marketing and this is also one of his greatest challenges.

loans.use: to buy 4 more washing machines.

loans.name: Akoua

texts.fr:
Akoua est une femme âgée de 49 ans. Elle est veuve. Elle a 2 enfants.
Akoua travaille comme revendeuse depuis 1991. Elle vend des œufs pour tous clients à domicile. Elle achète les produits à Lomé, Vogan et Djagble. Elle travaille seule. Au moment, n’a pas de difficultés.
Akoua a requis son 1er crédit de WAGES afin d’acheter des œufs. Elle veut réinvestir dans l’activité.
Dans les prochaines années, Akoua voudrait ouvrir une boutique. Elle dit qu’avec les profits, elle prévoit de prendre soin de sa famille.
texts.en:
Akoua is a 49-year-old woman. She is a widow. She has two children.

Akoua has been working as a vendor since 1991. From her home, she sells eggs to a wide array of customers. She buys the products in Lomé, Vogan and Djagble. She works by herself. At the moment, she has no problems.

Akoua is asking for her first loan through WAGES in order to buy eggs. She wants to reinvest in her business.

In the coming years, Akoua would like to open a shop. She says that with the profits, she plans to take care of her family.

loans.use: to buy eggs

loans.name: Kodjo Messan

texts.fr:
Kodjo est un homme âgé de 23 ans. Il est célibataire sans enfant.
Kodjo travaille comme revendeur depuis 2009. Il est gérant d’une cafétéria et sert tous les  types de clients. Il achète les produits au grand marché de Lomé. Il est aidé par une personne. Au moment, sa difficulté principale est l’insuffisance d’argent pour acheter ses condiments.
Kodjo a requis son 1er crédit de WAGES afin d’acheter des condiments pour son cafétériat. Il veut réinvestir dans l’activité.
Dans les prochaines années, Kodjo voudrait augmenter la taille de son activité. Il dit qu’avec les profits, il prévoit de se marier.
texts.en:
Kodjo is a 23-year-old unmarried man with no children.  He has worked as a reseller since 2009, and he runs a cafeteria serving all kinds of customers.  He buys his products in the market in Lomé, and has one helper.  At the moment his biggest obstacle is a lack of money to buy condiments.  

Kodjo has requested his first loan through WAGES in order to buy condiments for his cafeteria.  He would like to reinvest in his business.  In the next few years, Kodjo would like to enlarge his business.  He says that with the profits, he plans to marry.

loans.use: to buy products for his cafeteria.

loans.name: Paulina

texts.es: La socia Pualina, continua con su negocio de compra y venta de tarwi, la socia compra al por mayor y lo hace remojar y despues lo vende; la socia en esta ocasión desea invertir el prestamo en la compra de tarwi al por mayor para continuar con su negocio y de este modo seguir prosperando para a futuro viiver tranquila de sus ahorros. La socia solicita el prestamo para invertir en la compra de tarwi.
texts.en: Paulina continues working as a tarwi [lupin] merchant; she buys it at wholesale, soaks it and then resells it.  On this occasion she wants to use the loan to buy tarwi at wholesale to continue with her business and thus continue to make progress so that in the future she can live comfortably off her savings.  She requests the loan to buy tarwi.

loans.use: to buy tarwi [lupin].

loans.name: Tula

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “SEÑOR DE CCOYLLORTY CACHIMAYO”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cachimayo, perteneciente a la provincia de Anta y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Tula; ella tiene 37 años de edad y es casada y tiene 3 hijos; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de venta de accesorios y baterías para celulares, ella trabaja en forma ambulatoria desde las 8:00 a.m hasta las 6:00 p.m, por medio de este negocio la socia saca adelante a sus hijos, el sueño de la socia es tener un local donde pueda vender accesorios y baterías para celulares. La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar accesorios y baterías para celulares.

La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
This borrower belongs to the “SEÑOR DE CCOYLLORTY CACHIMAYO” communal bank. The communal bank is located in the Cachimayo district which belongs to the Anta province in the department of Cusco.

Señora Tula is the borrower; she is 37 years old and married with 3 children. She alternates her daily activities with her business of selling cellphone accessories and batteries. She works as a traveling vendor from 8:00 a.m. until 6:00 p.m. By means of this business, Tula takes care of her children. Her dream is to have a store where she can sell cellphone accessories and batteries. She requested this loan to purchase accessories and batteries for cellphones.

She is happy about the loan and commits to make her repayments.

loans.use: to purchase cellphone accessories and batteries.

loans.name: Cristian

texts.es: Cristian de 42 años de edad tiene su propio negocio donde ofrece servicios de internet y telecomunicaciones , el cual inició dese el año 2009 con sus propios ahorros y con préstamos informales de carácter oneroso, que poco a poco ha logrado pagar. Con el dinero de su actividad,  compró una computadora, posteriormente una fotocopiadora y adicionó servicios de telefonía celular. El crecimiento de su negocio es su máximo sueño, pues desde los 17 años, cuando se fracturó la médula y quedó discapacitado se ha aferrado a generar sus propios ingresos. Él es un ejemplo de superación pues todos los días se levanta a trabajar fortalecido y lleno de mucha energía. Su expectativa de crecimiento es inmensa por eso se acercó a la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, para solicitar un credikiva, primer financiamiento que hace a esta organización, con el cual renovará los equipos de cómputos, para ofrecer a sus clientes un servicio mas efectivo en un ambiente confortable,  como el que crea Cristian, en su conversación con los clientes cuando los atiende.
texts.en: Cristian, 42, has his own business offering internet services and telecommunications.  He started this business in 2009 with his own savings and with an informal loan of an onerous nature, that he very gradually has been able to pay back.  With money from his business he bought a computer, and later added a photocopier and cellular phone services.  His greatest dream is to see his business grow, as ever since he broke his leg and became disabled 17 years ago, he has held on to the desire to generate his own income.  He is an example of someone who has been able to overcome adversity by getting up every day to work full of energy.  He expects his business to grow a lot, and for this reason he approached the Fundacion Mario Santo Domingo to request a Kiva loan, the first financing that he has done with this organization.  With this loan, he will upgrade his computer equipment.  Cristian believes, based on his conversations with his customers, that this will allow him to provide more effective service in a comfortable environment

loans.use: to buy computer equipment

loans.name: Cristian Camilo

texts.es: Cristian Camilo es un jóven de 19 años que busca obtener sus ingresos a través de la confección de prendas de vestir a terceros. La actividad la aprendió dando apoyo por temporada a la revisión y acabado de prendas. Gracias a sus ahorros compró su primera máquina plana y la fileteadota con lo cual pudo iniciar su negocio. Ahora, busca comprar una máquina recubridora con la cual pueda ofrecer el servicio completo de confección a todos sus clientes, quienes por no tener este servicio optan por realizar sus trabajos con otras personas. Cristian Camilo sueña, que con el progreso de su negocio, pueda producir su propia línea de camisetas.
texts.en: Critian Camilo is a young man of nineteen who is looking to obtain income by making clothing for third parties.  He learned this trade by doing seasonal work on alterations and garment finishing. Thanks to his savings, he bought his first sewing machine and overlock machine and was able to start his business.  Now, he is looking to buy a coverstitch sewing machine so that he can offer full service tailoring to his customers.  (Since he does not offer this service, customers are opting to do business elsewhere).  Cristian Camilo dreams that, with the progress of his business, he can produce his own line of shirts.

loans.use: to buy a coverstitch machine.

loans.name: José Fredy

texts.es:
El señor José tiene 32 años de edad, es casado con una hija.

Él es profesor desde hace 2 años en un Instituto, antes él realizaba trabajos de electricista y actividades agrícolas. Pero José fue ahorrando para seguir estudiando y logro graduarse de profesor en electricidad y es en eso que trabaja actualmente.

José esta solicitando un préstamo a Fundación Campo, para comprar un panel solar, ya que en su casa no hay energía eléctrica y él necesita la luz para realizar sus trabajos en la casa, por eso él solicita el préstamo y parte del valor del panel solar ya lo tiene él. De esta manera José realizara su planificación y trabajos en la noche en su casa y mejorara la calidad de vida de su hija.

José desea tener luz en su casa e instalar un taller de electrónica, ya que eso es lo que le gusta a él y por problemas económicos no ha podido lograrlo, pero él se siente confiado que va a salir adelante poco a poco.
texts.en:
Mr. José is 32, married and has a daughter.

He has been a teacher at the high school for two years.  Before that he worked as an electrician and in agriculture.  But José was able to save enough to continue his studies and become a teacher in the field of electricity, being this his current job.

José is requesting a loan through the Fundación Campo to buy a solar panel since his house does not have electricity.  He needs it to be able to work in his house, so he is requesting the loan and will pay for part of the panel with money he has.  This will allow José to do his planning and work at night at home, while improving his daughter's lifestyle.

José wants to install an electricity workshop since it is what he enjoys most.  Due to economic problems he has not been able to do so, but feels he will be able to get ahead little by little.

loans.use: To buy a solar panel.

loans.name: Xiomara Emperatriz

texts.es:
La señora Xiomara tiene 29 años de edad, es madre soltera de un hijo.

Ella vive con sus padres y sus hermanos, se dedica a realizar los oficios domésticos en su casa y ha realizar actividades agrícolas junto con su papá. Xiomara siempre ha ayudado a sus padres, y ella quiere iniciar con el negocio de crianza de cerdos para venderlos, puesto que en la zona donde vive llegan personas a buscar los cerdos de todo tamaño para comprarlos y destazarlos.

Xiomara solicita el préstamo para comprar 6 cerdos para empezar con el negocio y los comprara en una granja de la zona donde vive. Así ella iniciara su negocio y ganara dinero para continuar apoyando a sus padres y además será una mujer independiente que desarrollara sus habilidades y cuando forme una familia ya tendrá como llevar el pan de cada día a su hogar. Ella desea continuar trabajando muy fuerte, ser feliz junto a sus seres queridos y construir una casa propia y que su negocio vaya creciendo, para ganarse el pan de cada día.
texts.en:
Xiomara is 29 years old and she is a single mother with one son.

She lives with her parents and siblings. She makes a living doing the domestic chores in the house and carrying out agricultural activities together with her father. Xiomara has always helped her parents, and she wants to set herself up in the business of raising pigs for resale, as in the area where she lives people come looking for pigs of all sizes to buy and butcher.

Xiomara is requesting this loan in order to buy 6 pigs to start her business and she will buy them in a local farm. In this way she will set up her business and will earn money to continue supporting her parents. She will also become an independent woman who will develop skills and when she forms a family she will have a way of providing for them. She wishes to continue working hard, to be happy together with her loved ones, to build her own house and that her business grows in order to earn her daily bread.

loans.use: to buy 6 pigs and fatten them up for resale.

loans.name: Saly Bambara Group

texts.fr:
Ce Banc Villageois est créé le 26 décembre 2011, lors de son inauguration. Il est composé de 50 femmes issues toutes de la même localité. C'est leur première expérience avec CAURIE. Et leur solidarité de groupe consiste une garantie pour leurs crédits.

Madame Fatou située à gauche  de la photo habillé en uniforme rouge bordeaux  est responsable du Banc Villageois. Elle est âgée de 54  ans. Elle est mariée  et mère de  7enfants

Elle développe une activité de vente de tissu dans son quartier Elle dispose d une bonne expérience dans ce domaine d'activité pour l'avoir pratiqué depuis plusieurs années. 

Son nouveau crédit de 50000 avec CAURIE lui permettra de financer son activité en achetant des tissus et du lait de toilette.

Elle a comme objectif de prendre en charge les besoins scolaires et sanitaires de ses enfants.
texts.en:
This Banc Villageois was created and inaugurated on December 26th 2011. It is composed of 50 women who are all from the same area. This is their first experience with CAURIE. And the solidarity of their group is a guarantee for their loans.
Fatou, on the left side of the picture, wearing a pink attire, is the representative for the Banc Villageois. She is 54, married, and a mother of 7.
She is starting a fabrics selling business in her neighborhood. She has been working in this field for a few years, which gives her a good experience.
This new 50,000 loan with CAURIE will enable her to finance her business by buying fabrics and lotion.
Her goal is to take care of her children's school fees and medical expenses.

loans.use: to buy fabrics and lotion to be resold.

loans.name: Christopher Francisco

texts.es: Christopher Francisco es un emprendedor exitoso que lucha día a día  por salir adelante con su negocio,  generando su propio ingreso. Christopher tiene 11 años de experiencia en costura muchos de  sus diseños son vendidos en los diferentes mercados de la localidad, además lo visitan muchas  empresas para la elaboración de los  uniformes, mochilas, gorras entre otros productos que le solicitan. Christopher Francisco está solicitando crédito para poder comprar tela de todo tipo, zipper, botones, hilo, entre otros productos para el negocio.
texts.en:
Christopher Francisco is a successful entrepreneur who struggles daily to advance his business, generating his own income. Christoper has 11 years experience in the tailor trade. Many of his designs are sold in different local markets, and in addition, he visits many enterprises to elaborate uniforms, backpacks, and gloves, among other products ordered from him.

Christopher Francisco is requesting a loan to be able to buy cloth of all types, zippers, buttons, and thread, among other supplies for his business.

loans.use: to buy cloth of all types, zippers, buttons, and thread, among other sewing supplies.

loans.name: Carmen

texts.es:
Carmen nació en la ciudad de Quillabamba  de la provincia de La Convención y tiene 42 años edad, ella es casada y fruto de esta hermosa relación tiene tres hijos.  Actualmente, Carmen vive en la histórica ciudad del Cusco donde realiza sus actividades económicas.    
 
Carmen se dedica a la elaboración de ladrillos y telas, ella tiene un pequeño taller en su domicilio y la podemos encontrar fabricando sus productos en su taller desde muy temprano.  Ya son varios años que se dedica a este negocio y le va muy bien.  Carmen requiere el préstamo para comprar herramientas, plásticos y combustible (para hacer secar los ladrillos y las tejas). 

Carmen es integrante del banco comunal “Pillao”. Este  grupo está conformado con 13 socios que viven  en la provincia de Cusco del distrito de San Jerónimo.
texts.en:
Carmen was born in the city of Quillabamba in the La Convención province.  She is 42 years old, married and has three children with her husband.  Carmen lives in the historic city of Cusco where she works.  
 
Carmen makes bricks and tiles for a living.  She has a small shop in her house and things are going well for her.  Carmen is requesting a loan to buy tools, plastics and fuel (to dry the bricks and tiles).  

Carmen is a member of the communal bank "Pillao".  This group is made up of 13 members that live in the province of Cusco and the San Jerónimo district.

loans.use: purchase tools, plastics and fuel to fire her bricks and tiles.

loans.name: Bladimiro

texts.es:
Bladimiro nació en la ciudad de Sicuani de la provincia del Canchis del departamento del Cusco y tiene 25 años de edad, ella tiene una relación de unión libre de la tiene dos hijos.  Actualmente, Bladimiro vive en la histórica ciudad del Cusco donde realiza sus actividades económicas.    
 
Bladimiro se dedica a brindar servicio de taxi y también se dedica a la crianza de animales menores como cuyes y gallinas. Ya son varios años que se dedica a crianza de animales menores y le va muy bien.  Bladimiro requiere el préstamo para el mantenimiento del carro y para comprar algunos cuyes. 

Bladimiro es integrante del banco comunal “Pillao”. Este  grupo está conformado con 13 socios que viven  en la provincia de Cusco del distrito de San Jerónimo.
texts.en:
Bladimiro was born in the city of Sicuani, in the province of Canchis, department of Cusco. He is 25 years old. He has a common-law wife with whom he has two children. Currently, Bladimiro lives in the historic city of Cusco, where he pursues his economic activities.
