Bladimiro's work is providing taxi services, and he also raises small animals such as guinea pigs and chickens. He has raised small animals for several years, and it is going very well for him. Bladimiro needs the loan to carry out maintenance on his car and to buy some guinea pigs.

Bladimiro is a member of the “Pillao” communal bank. The group is made up of 13 members who live in the province of Cusco, in the district of San Jerónimo.

loans.use: to carry out maintenance on his car and to buy some guinea pigs.

loans.name: David Alonso

texts.es: El señor David Alonso a los 43 años de edad se dedica a la fabricación y reparación de muebles en madera, con lo que consigue el sustento propio y el de su hija de 16 años quien esta a su cargo puesto que se encuentra separado de la madre. Debido a la inestabilidad del sector y los altibajos de sus ingresos, el señor David Alonso se vió en la necesidad de capacitarse en mantenimiento y reparación de lavadoras como actividad alterna que le permite generar otros ingresos. Para cumplir con la producción de un lote de botiquines, requiere de la compra de la materia prima e implementos de trabajo, que le permitan cumplir el sueño de que su negocio crezca y se consolide en el sector.
texts.en:
David Alonso, 43 years old, makes and repairs wooden furniture. In this manner, he supports himself and his 16-year-old daughter, who is in his charge because she is separated from her mother. Due to the instability of the sector and his income fluctuations, David Alonso has been forced to obtain training in the maintenance and repair of washing machines as an alternative activity, permitting him to generate additional income.

To fill an order for medicine cabinets, he needs to buy primary materials and work tools, which will permit him to realize his dream of seeing his business grow and consolidating his position in the sector.

loans.use: to buy primary materials and work tools for his various trades.

loans.name: Espiga Y Luna Group

texts.es: La señora Graciela Silvia es nueva integrante del grupo ella solicito su prestamo para comprar blusas, faldas y pantalones de dama, el resto de las integrantes siguen en su actividad que vienen desempeñando. La joven  Miriam Karina tiene 19 años de edad, ella es soltera tiene 2 hermanos  un hermano y un hermana, ella vende ropa americana y perfumes de Jafra, ella solicito su préstamo para comprar pacas de ropa y perfumes para surtir sus pedidos, ella inicio su negocio hace un año, una amiga la invito y con un dinero que tenia ahorrado que su mama le dio, compro la paca de ropa, ella sale a vender la ropa en los tianguis más cercanos de su comunidad su hermana le ayuda a vender la ropa, su negocio es importante porque gana, se distrae y conoce diferentes lugares, ella utiliza las ganancia para volver a surtirse de ropa y para la comida, ella está contenta con el préstamo que va a recibir  va a surtir su negocio de diferentes modelos de ropa para que su clientes encuentren lo que buscan. Sus sueños y esperanzas son construir su casa para sus hermanos y ella. Las integrantes del grupo les agradecen a Kiva y a Fundación Realidad sus préstamos, gracias a ustedes nuestros negocios crecen y las familias viven mejor.
texts.en: Graciela Silvia is a new member of the group.  She is requesting her loan to purchase women’s blouses, skirts, and pants.  The rest of the members are still engaged in their activities.  Young Miriam Karina is 19 years old.  She is unmarried and has one brother and one sister.  She sells American clothing and Jafra perfumes.  She is requesting her loan to purchase bundles of clothing and perfume to fill her orders.  She started her business one year ago.  At a friend’s invitation, she bought a bundle of clothing with the money given to her by her mother that she had saved, and went out to sell it at the open-air markets closest to her community.  Her sister helped her sell the clothing.  Her business is important because she earns money, enjoys herself, and gets to know different places.  She uses her profits to re-stock her inventory of clothing and to buy food.  She is happy with the loan she is receiving.  She is going to stock her business with various styles of clothing so that her customers find what they are looking for.  She dreams and hopes of building a house for herself and her siblings.  The members of the group are grateful to Kiva and Fundación Realidad.  "Thanks to your loans, our businesses are growing and our families live better".

loans.use: to purchase bundles of clothing and Jafra perfume.

loans.name: Aleyda Maryinee

texts.es:
Doña Aleyda comercializa la venta de ropa de segunda mano, cosmeticos y juguetes, el cincuenta por ciento encargado por sus clientes y las otras venta las hace ambulante y parte en su casa, cuenta con el apoyo de su esposo, quien tiene su propio taxi y lo trabaja, sus hijos terminaron el curso escolar.
Hoy con esta nueva inversion sera para la compra de paca y sandalias, y seguir teniendo la variedad en sus ventas. siendo de gran sastifacion poder apoyar  y aportar con los gastos personales de sus tres hijos, asi como poder cubrir gastos basicos de luz y agua. Todo esto gracias al crecimiento de sus ventas, y gracias a la institucion por dar la oportunidad atravez de su finnaciamientos.
texts.en:
Aleyda sells second-hand clothing, as well as cosmetics and toys. Fifty percent of her sales are in response to customer orders, and she makes the other sales as a mobile vendor or from her home. She has the support of her husband, who is a taxi driver with his own vehicle. Her children have finished school. 

Now, with the loan she will invest in buying clothing by the pack and sandals, so she can continue to offer variety in her sales. It will be a great satisfaction to her to be able to contribute to supporting the personal expenses of her three children, as well as covering basic expenses such as water and electricity. All of this is thanks to the growth in her sales, and thanks to the institution for giving her this opportunity through the loans.

loans.use: to buy clothing by the pack and sandals so she can expand her sales.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase three cattle, one milk cow and fodder

loans.name: Eunice

texts.en:
Contributing to her family’s vending business, Eunice found herself happiest. Before owning her business, Jems Italian Ice, Eunice worked as a chemist in a research institution. She also added, now that she is married, she could not go home after a hectic day of work and expect to have some alone time. Then one day a friend, who was selling Italian Ice in Atlanta, suggested Eunice do the same. After she found it was profitable, she said she “went in it full force.”

The small business, composed of family and friends, began when she lost her passion and felt the need to exit the corporate world. Eunice’s family worked festivals for five years now as she helped them annually. As she recalls, working festivals gave them an opportunity to have conversations with 1000s of people. What attracted her the most to festivals were mainly the “loving people and atmosphere.” Eunice was raised doing community work and decided to do this and serve people in the community while having fun selling Italian Ice.

Eunice will use the loan money to purchase a large trailer for storage and transportation to save money on renting trailers. As a traveling vendor, Eunice noted that in order to participate in 2012 festivals, which normally begin in March, she needs to register in December. From here, she needs to begin booking hotels and planning trips. 

She told of how Italian ice differs from traditional ice cream. Italian ice has “fresher ingredients and is made with finer ice so it almost melts in mouth,” she said. She juggles eight flavors that change according to what customers like.

It would have taken a year and a half to collect the amount of money needed. The loan from ACCION Texas allowed her to skip that process and dive into applying for festivals and ordering supplies. She can now attend large festivals instead of many smaller ones. For more information on Eunice, Jems Italian Ice and nutritional information, visit the website: www.jemsitalianice.com.

loans.use: To purchase a trailer for storage and transportation.

loans.name: Latifa

texts.en:
Latifa is 59 years old and married with three children. She sells furniture in the central market and has more than 20 years of experience in this field. Latifa sells home furniture. This is very popular for dowry products among brides and newly married families.
 
Latifa tries to keep up with demand and always purchases different styles of furniture. Her monthly profit is 50 AZN. Her husband helps her to sell furniture.

Latifa needs to invest more capital in her business to purchase more furniture and diversify her products.  For this purpose, she applied for a loan of 1,800 AZN.  This will be her third loan and she has a good credit history.

loans.use: to purchase more furniture and diversify products

loans.name: Yaniris Patricia

texts.es: Yaniris de 29 años de edad desde hace 4 años, cuando necesitaba generar ingresos para auto sostenerse y pagar sus estudios universitarios, decidió emprender su aventura de negocios, en el municipio donde habita;  así fue como acudió a una amiga quien le vendía mercancía a un precio, en el cual ella ganaba esta  y por supuesto también Yaniris. Poco a poco fue adquiriendo su propia clientela, y con sus ganancias acumuló un capital de trabajo que gradualmente fue invirtiendo y con ello su negocio ha ido creciendo. En la actualidad sus metas de superación de ingresos, son muy importantes para lograr cada día mayor bienestar y esta es la razón por la cual acude a un credikiva, primer financiamiento que hace a la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, con el  comprará pantalones y suéteres artesanales, productos de los que tiene muchos pedidos, por parte de sus clientes mas rentables.  Su sueño es poder acondicionar mejor su infraestructura de negocios, para brindarles un ambiente confortable a sus compradores y generar puestos de trabajo mediante el crecimiento de él.  En el barrio donde habita con sus familias, está compuesta por gente trabajadora de negocios independientes y en empresas de transporte de carga rápida, que en su mayoría se encuentran muy cerca a su negocio y que son sus clientes reales y que potencialmente puede desarrollarse con inversiones permanentes a su negocio.
texts.en:
Yaniris is 29 years old. Four years ago she needed an income to support herself and pay for her university studies, so she decided to embark on her business adventure in the city where she lives. That is how she turned to a friend who sold her merchandise at a price. The friend made money this way, and of course Yaniris did too. Little by little she built up her own customer base, and with her earnings she accumulated some working capital that she gradually invested, and so her business has been growing.

Currently her goals to outdo her previous income are very important for her to improve her well-being everyday. This is why Yaniris is asking for a Kiva loan, the first loan she has had from Fundación Mario Santo Domingo. She will use it to buy handmade pants and sweaters. She has many orders for these products from her most profitable customers.

Her dream is to be able to improve her business infrastructure so she can offer her buyers a comfortable environment and generate more work through this growth.

The neighborhood where Yaniris lives has many families. It is made up of hardworking independent businessmen and people working in rapid freight transport. Most of them can be found very near Yaniris' business, and these are her real customers who she could potentially develop with permanent investment in her business.

loans.use: to buy handmade sweaters and pants.

loans.name: Anauris Maria

texts.es: Anuris  de 44 años de edad se dedica a la preparación y venta de comidas, negocio que inició desde el año 1994, cuando llegó desde su pueblo a la ciudad de Cartagena; ella inició vendiendo frituras, para con ello apoyar los gastos de su hogar, con formado por su cónyuge y sus 7 hijos en las edades de 12 a 20 años. Gradualmente encontró en la diversificación de alimentos para vender una mejor oportunidad y continuar su crecimiento. En actualidad se encuentra ubicada en una de las avenidas a mas concurridas de la ciudad y tiene varios vendedores en puntos estratégicos de la ciudad que le pagan diariamente una vez venden sus productos. Con sus ganancias y el gran apoyo de su cónyuge, logró adquirir su propia casa y con ello también apoyar la educación de sus hijos.   En la actualidad planea una vez más invertirle a su negocio en la época mas comercial del año, las navidades y el año nuevo, esta es la razón por la cual acude a su credikiva, primer financiamiento que hace a ala Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, con el cual comprará materias primas e insumos para su negocio, así como también  herramientas de trabajo, para modernizarlo y aprovechar la temporada de buenas ventas y mejor aun sus ingresos.
texts.en:
Anuris, 44 years old, prepares and sells meals. She began this business in 1994 when she came to the city of Cartagena from her town. She began by selling fried foods so she could cover expenses for her household, which is made up of her husband and their seven children, aged 12 to 20. Gradually she found better opportunities and a way to grow her business by diversifying the foods she sold. Currently Anuris is located on one of the busiest streets in the city, and she has several sellers at strategic points throughout the city who pay her daily after they sell her products.

With her earnings and the wonderful support of her husband she was able to buy her own house and also support her children's education.Now Anuris is planning to invest in her business again during the most commercial time of the year, Christmas and New Year's. This is the reason Anuris is asking for this Kiva loan, the first financing she's had from Fundación Mario Santo Domingo. She will use the money to buy raw materials and supplies for her business, along with tools for work, to modernize the business and take advantage of the season of good sales, so she can improve her earnings even more.

loans.use: to buy raw materials and supplies for her business, and to buy work tools to modernize the business.

loans.name: La Esperanza 1, 3 & 4 Group

texts.en:
Rosa is one of the members of her group, La Esperanza 1, 3 & 4 (Hope). She lives in the city of La Romana, where the sugar cane harvest and tourist industry dominate the economy. Rosa has three children, two of whom live together with her and her long-term partner in one of the rural areas surrounding this tourist city. Most of this sugar town's population are Haitians who emigrated and settled in to work in the sugar cane industry.

Rosa has been running her business for around three years and this is her third loan with Esperanza Internacional. She sells miscellaneous products like clothes, bread and gasoline. She sells them in her home located on the main road in the town, where many people pass by and buy her products. She started her business with some capital she saved by working in the city. With her business profits, she will be able to expand her sales and plans to build a locale for her business.

Her most difficult challenges are to buy her house in the city and to have an improved business. She wants to be able to send her children to attend university. Thank you for your support!

loans.use: to buy different products like clothes, flour, butter and gasoline

loans.name: Sevil

texts.en:
Sevil is 56 years old and single. She is a market vendor and sells different kind of goods such as flour, beverages, macaroni, butter, and candies. She has five years of experience and a deep knowledge of the market and the demands of her clients. Her monthly profit from selling food is 250 AZN.  

Sevil's father helps her in the shop. She is a very successful entrepreneur because of the good location of her shop in the central bazaar of Agsu.

Sevil is requesting a loan for 1,200 AZN, which she will use to purchase more food products and diversify the range of goods to cover her customers' demands. Sevil is the sole income provider for her family.

loans.use: to purchase more food products and diversify her range  of goods.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase more merchandise and diversify her range of products.

loans.name: Ana Dionisia

texts.es: Ana de 46 años de edad vive en la ciudad de Cartagena y tiene un negocio a través del cual prepara la masa con maíz natural y yuca, base para la fabricación de arepas, buñuelos, bollos etc, los cuales distribuye entre vendedores directos de estos productos en cantidades pesadas desde una libra.  Ana está vinculada a la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo desde hace 5 años, a través de los cuales ha recibido 5 financiamientos y con ello ha logrado tener su fuente de ingresos y generar bienestar para proteger a su familia. Su meta es tener su propio local en un sitio diferente del de su hogar, para lograr el tan anhelado sosiego y no extender sus jornadas de trabajo y confundirlas con sus jornadas familiares. En la actualidad está aplicando a su primer credikiva, con el cual comprará materias primas e insumos para la preparación de masa, pues se acercan las fiestas de fin de año y las ventas se incrementas, por lo cual debe estar preparada con un buen surtido. Con ello continuara su proceso de fidelizar sus clientes y aumentar el numero de compradores que diariamente consumen sus productos o que los distribuyen.
texts.en:
Ana, who is 46, lives in the city of Cartagena and has a business preparing dough from corn and cassava, which is the base for making arepas [a type of traditional corn patty], buñuelos [fritters], bollos [buns or rolls], etc. She distributes the dough to people who sell these foods, and she offers weighed amounts of dough starting at one pound.

Ana has been with Fundación Mario Santo Domingo for five years. She has received five loans, and with them she has managed to have this source of income for her family's well-being and protection. Her goal is to have her own store at a site other than in her home, so she can have the calm she's wanted so much, and so she does not extend her work hours and confuse them with her family time.

At the moment Ana is asking for her first Kiva loan so she can buy raw materials and supplies for preparing the dough. Since the end-of-year holidays are coming and sales will increase, she has to be prepared with a good amount of stock. With it, Ana will continue earning customer loyalty and increasing the number of buyers who use or distribute her products.

loans.use: to buy raw materials and supplies for preparing dough.

loans.name: Gustavo

texts.es:
Gustavo, de 40 años de edad, es una hombre muy alegre, dinámico y emprendedor, es soltero, vive en su casa alquilada en compañía de sus padres y sus hermanos,  y de un sobrino a quien ayuda con sus estudiso. El trabajo de Gustavo consiste en la venta de pollos a la brasa, ésta  actividad lo realiza en un local alquilado, el cual lo abrió ya hace seis meses tiempo en el cual le valió para hacerse conocido en la zona, por  la buena atención que brinda a sus clientes, contando con la apoyo de tres ayudantes  que le ayudan  en la labores de la cocina y atención al público. Lo que le gusta de su trabajo es que le genera un ingreso económico, que le permite pagar los gastos del alquiler, apoyar  a sus hermanos, y darle una buena educación a su sobrino, por lo contrario comenta que no le agrada que su local es muy pequeño y no esta muy bien ubicado por eso tienes la intención de cambiar de local con uno mas espacioso donde puedan estar mas cómodos sus clientes, además  nos  comenta que adicionalmente tiene planes de abrir un restaurante. Este sería el primer préstamo con la institución MFP, se siente muy contento con la oportunidad brindada de poder contar con un préstamo, para lo cual se compromete a ser puntual en sus pagos. Por tanto espera de un pequeño préstamo para que pueda cumplir con sus objetivos.
Con el dinero solicitado de 1000 nuevos soles comprará mesas, sillas, para  implementar su negocio, y chifles, camotes  fritos, para  que abra un nuevo negocio.
texts.en:
Gustavo, 40 years old, is a very happy man, dynamic and enterprising. He is single and lives in a rented house with his parents and his siblings, and a nephew whom he helps with his studies. Gustavo sells grilled chicken. He is renting a facility that he opened six months ago and in this time he became valued and known in the area for the good attention that he gives to his customers, with the support of three assistants that help him with the cooking and serving the public.

What he likes about his work is that he earns income which permits him to pay the expenses of renting, to help his siblings, and give a good education to his nephew. On the other hand, he says that he does not like his facility which is very small and is not well situated and this is why he has the intention of changing the facility with one more spacious where he can make his clients more comfortable. Moreover, he says that in addition he has plans to open a restaurant.

This will be his first loan with MFP. He feels very content with the opportunity provided to be able to have a loan, and he promises to be on time with his payments. So he is waiting for a small loan so he can fulfill his objective.

With the money from the loan, 1000 soles, he will buy tables and chairs for his business, and plantain chips and fried sweet potatoes, in order to open a new business.

loans.use: to buy tables and chairs, and snacks for his business

loans.name: Elnur

texts.en: Elnur is 30 and married with two children. He breeds cattle and sells them for meat. He also has [dairy] cows and sells milk and milk products. He has six years of experience, which qualifies him as a knowledgeable and skilled person. He usually buys small calves, raises and fattens them and resells them in the livestock bazaar for meat. Looking after cattle is hard and requires spending a lot of time in the open air. The climate is very severe; it is very hot in the summer and very cold in winter. However, Elnur is not alone in his business; his wife helps to pasture and feed the animals. Meat and milk products are popular products in Azerbaijan. People drink fresh milk and home-made yogurt everyday and consider it very healthy. Every national dish consists of meat like pilau and dolma. Elnur's monthly profit is 250 Azerbaijani manats (AZN). He wishes to expand his business to improve life for his family. For this purpose, he applied for a 800 AZN loan. He will use this loan to purchase one milk cow and fodder. This will be his fourth loan and he has a good credit history.

loans.use: to purchase one milk cow and fodder

loans.name: Sehrana

texts.en:
Sehrana is 47 years old, married, and has three children. She breeds poultry such as turkey, chicken, and goose. She has nine years of experience in this field. Her monthly profit is 250 AZN.

Sehrana usually buys small nestlings, raises them, and sells them at a profitable price to neighbors and in the central bazaar.  Poultry is very popular in Azerbaijan and people eat particular poultry in a particular season. For instance, chicken is popular during the year, goose in winter, and turkey in autumn and winter. Many national dishes are made of chicken. Her husband helps Sehrana to look after poultry and raise them.

Sehrana is requesting a loan for 1,200 AZN, which she will use to purchase more poultry. With an increased monthly profit, she will be able to reinvest in her business. She has already demonstrated herself as a good client with a positive credit history.

loans.use: to purchase more poultry and increase monthly profit?

loans.name: Gustavo Adolfo

texts.es:
Gustavo a sus 37 años de edad, trabajador y luchador hasta el cansancio, con el objetivo de sacar adelante a su esposa y sus dos pequeños hijos de tan solo 4 y 2 años de edad comenzó con el negocio de la gricultura y ganadería en la vereda San Agustín.

Su labor consiste en el engorde de ganado, como terneros, y en la producción y elaboración de productos lácteos. De igual manera dedica parte de su tiempo a la labor de la agricultura desde la cual genera ingresos adicionales para el sostenimiento de su hogar.

El sueña con tener una mayor cantidad de ganado que le permita generar ingresos más estables en el tiempo, al igual que brindarle educación de calidad a sus dos pequeños hijos, ya que es conciente de la importancia que esta tiene para su futuro.
texts.en:
Gustavo at 37 years old is hard working and and struggles until exhaustion, with the aim of providing more for his wife and two little children who are only 4 and 2 years of age. He began with the business of agriculture and livestock in an area of San Agustín.

His work consists of fattening livestock, such as calves, and in the production and making of dairy products. He also dedicates part of his time to working in agriculture to generate additional income for maintaining his home.

His dream is to have more livestock which would allow him to have a steady income over time, and also provide a quality education to his two little children, as he is aware of the importance that this has for their future.

loans.use: to buy calves for fattening

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase more merchandise and diversify her range of products.

loans.name: Elizabeth

texts.es: Elizabeth tiene 36 años de edad, su actividad económica a la que se dedica es a la venta de mercadería en general, ya tiene 7 años de experiencia en el negocio lo cual esto le ha permitido que muchos de sus clientes la visiten. Esta emprendedora es muy  exitosa que debido al poco capital que tenia dio inicio a su propio negocio que hoy en día es un ejemplo para toda su familia, ya que ha luchado por seguir sus sueños de poseer su propio negocio. Elizabeth está solicitando financiamiento para poder invertir en su negocio en la compra de ropa para niño, adultos, sandalias, cosméticos entre otros productos que según lo que demandan  sus clientes, además esta emprendedora es muy creativa ya que sabe costura también hace su propios diseños según los que sus clientes le soliciten.
texts.en: Elizabeth is 36 years old. The economic activity to which she dedicates herself is the sale of general merchandise. She already has 7 years of experience in this business which has allowed many customers to visit her. This entrepreneur is very successful. Due to the small capital that she had to start her own business, today she is an example for her own family as she already fought to pursue her dreams to own her own business.  Elizabeth is seeking financing to be able to invest in her business through the purchase of clothes for children and adults, sandals and cosmetics among other products that are in accordance with what her customers demand. Moreover, this entrepreneur is very creative and she also already knows how sew according to her own designs to match the requests of her customers.

loans.use: to buy clothes for children and adults, sandals and cosmetics, among other products.

loans.name: Oswaldo

texts.es:
Oswaldo, de 26 años de edad, es un hombre muy alegre, dinámico y emprendedor, es conviviente con Silvia quien es comerciante, vive en compañía de su pareja, sus tres hijos menores, su casa es propia, la cual logró construir con el apoyo de su pareja. El trabajo que realiza Oswaldo es la venta de golosinas, la cual lo realiza en la puerta de un colegio ubicado cerca a su domicilio, la cual  viene funcionando desde hace 03 años, siendo muy concurrido por los jóvenes estudiantes de este colegio y por los que pasan por la zona, a los cuales atiende de manera amable y con alegría, para esto cuenta con la ayuda de una  señorita, en la atención al público.  Lo que le gusta de su actividad es que le permite tener un ingreso económico que le permite pagar los gastos de la casa,  y le da tiempo de ver a sus hijos, nos comenta que debido a que la actividad realizada es rentable, tiene planes de abrir una tienda de golosinas en la zona comercial ya que en ese distrito no hay siendo pionera y brindar esa facilidad a residentes de contar con una tienda de este giro de negocio, y además  así poder tener más ingresos. Este será su primer préstamo con la institución MFP, le gusta mucho su grupo por que siente que son responsables, está agradecido con la institución por la confianza brindada, por lo cual se compromete a ser puntual en sus pagos. Además espera de su colaboración para que pueda concretar sus planes.
Con el préstamo de 1000 nuevos soles, comprará golosinas en general a precio por mayor para surtir su negocio, considera que a mayor variedad más acogida tendrá su negocio y obtendrá mayores márgenes de ganancias.
texts.en: Oswaldo, who is 26 years old, is a very happy, dynamic and entrepreneurial man. He lives with Silvia, who is a merchant. He lives with his partner and his three young children in his own house which he was successful in constructing with the support of his partner. The work performed by Oswaldo is the sale of candies, which he does at the door of a school located near his home which has been operating for 3 years. He is still very popular with the young students from the school and those who pass through this area to whom he serves in a friendly manner and with joy, with the help of a young lady in the front office regarding customer service. What he likes about his work is that it permits him to make an income that allows him to pay the expenses of the home, and which gives him time to see his children. He told us that because the activity is profitable, he has plans to open a candy store in the commercial district, where there currently is none. He will be a pioneer and bring this facility to residents who will have a store in this line of business, and moreover, this way he can make more revenue. This will be his first loan with the institution MFP, he likes the group very much because he feels that they are responsible. He is grateful for the trust given by the institution, in exchange for which he agrees to be punctual in his payments. Moreover, he awaits your collaboration so that he can nail down his plans. With the loan of 1,000 nuevos soles he will buy candies generally at the best price to supply his business, he believes that the greater variety will increase his business and he will obtain larger profit margins.

loans.use: To buy more candies to supply his business.

loans.name: Guillermo De Jesus

texts.es: El señor Guillermo de Jesús se dedica a la venta de bananos en el municipio de Bello, ubicado al Norte de la ciudad de Medellín. Posee una bodega en la plaza de mercado donde almacena los bananos verdes cuando los compra y los deja madurar para luego distribuirlo a restaurantes, cafeterías y por algunas de las calles de bello. El señor Guillermo tiene 53 años, es casado y tiene 4 hijos a los que le debe brindar el sustento. Aspira con el crédito, a aumentar su inventario y por ende su ganancia, pues se espera que este producto aumente su precio en los próximos años. Con el crecimiento de su negocio, planea brindarles una mejor calidad de vida a sus hijos y esposa y cumplir el sueño de conseguirse un carro para poder desplazarse con mayor facilidad.
texts.en: Guillermo de Jesús is dedicated to the sale of bananas in the town of Bello, located to the north of the city of Medellín. He has a bodega in the market plaza where he stores the green bananas when he buys them and he lets them mature to later distribute them to restaurants, cafes, and in some of the streets of Bello. Guillermo is 53 years old, he is married and he has 4 children to whom he must provide support. He aims with the loan to increase his inventory and therefore his profits, since he believes that this product will increase in price in the next few years. With the growth of his business, he plans to provide a better quality of life for his children and wife and to complete his dream of buying a car to be able to travel with greater ease.

loans.use: To buy green bananas and to increase his inventory.

loans.name: Diro Enrique

texts.es: Diro con su credikiva, adecuó su local y compró una mesa de billar , ahora hay mas comodidad para sus clientes y él está mas satisfecho con su inversión. Su meta mas adelante es cambiar el piso del local y hacer una segunda planta para hacer un apartamento y tener una vejéz tranquila. En la actualidad está aplicando a un nuevo credikiva, con el cual comprará bebidas al por mayor, para tener su negocio bien surtido y responder a su clientela, en las fiestas de fin de año, que es el mes donde mas se consumen cervezas, gaseosas y demás redrescos y licores.Su mensaje a los finaciadores de Kiva es el siguiente: " Que continuen con las proyecciones sociales para ayudar a los microemrpesarios. "
texts.en: With his Kiva loan Diro modified his place of business and bought a pool table.  Now his customers are more comfortable and he is more satisfied with his investment.  His future goal is to change the floor of his place, add a second floor for an apartment, and have peace in his old age.  Currently, he is applying for a new Kiva loan with which he will buy beverages so his business will be well-stocked.   This way he will be able to serve his customers for New Year's celebrations as this is when the most beer, soda and other refreshments and liquor are consumed.  His message to Kiva lenders is he hopes that "you continue with the social projects to help small businesses."

loans.use: purchase beverages wholesale.

loans.name: Lucia

texts.es: Lucia, de 36 años de edad, es una mujer alegre y emprendedora, es conviviente con Esteban quien es taxista, vive con su pareja y sus dos  menores hijos de 13 y 7 años de edad, por los cuales se esfuerza en salir adelante. Tiene su casa propia la cual compró con el apoyo de su pareja. El trabajo de Lucia consiste en la venta de plátanos y bebidas, la cual está implementada en un espacio muy bien acondicionado en su puesto ubicado en el mercado, el cual lo abrió ya hace 02  años,  tiempo que le valió para hacerse conocida en la zona. Esta  actividad lo realiza sola como siempre con mucho entusiasmo. Lo que le gusta de su trabajo es que le permite tener un ingreso económico que le da la tranquilidad de poder brindarle lo mejor a sus hijos, es  rentable, y le gusta socializarse: Ella sigue esforzándose  gracias a que su puesto es muy concurrido teniendo todas la ganas de ampliar su negocio y en un futuro desea abrir un restaurante ya que le gusta la cocina. Este sería su préstamo número 03 con la institución MFP, está agradecida por el apoyo financiero para avanzar con su negocio, con el grupo se siente muy cómoda pues los conoce muy bien por el tiempo que viene trabajando con ellos, considera que son personas responsables con sus pagos, lo que le anima a seguir en el grupo. Con el préstamo de 1000 nuevos soles, comprara productos para ampliar su negocio, buscando comprar en mayor volumen y tener más acogida y mejores ganancias.
texts.en:
Lucia, 36 years old, is a happy and enterprising woman. She has a common-law relationship with Esteban who is a taxi driver. She lives with her partner and her two young children who are 13 and 7 years old, which is why she tries to get ahead. She has her own house which she bought with the help of her partner. 

Her work is selling bananas and drinks, which she started in a space that is very well equipped in a stall located in the market, which she opened 2 years ago. She has become valued and known in the area. She works alone and always with a lot of enthusiasm. What she likes most about her work is that it permits her to have financial income giving her peace of mind about being able to provide the best for her children, it is profitable, and she likes to socialize. She continues pushing herself and thanks to this her stand is very busy and she wants to expand her business and in the future she hopes to open a restaurant because she likes the kitchen.

This will be her third loan with MFP, and she is grateful for the financial support in order to go forward with her business. She feels very comfortable with the communal bank because she knows them very well because of the time she has been working with them. She considers them to be responsible with their payments, which encourages her to continue in the group. With the loan of 1000 soles she will buy products to expand her business, searching to buy in larger amounts and have greater response and better earnings.

loans.use: to buy more bananas and drinks

loans.name: Fuente De Amor 1, 2 & 3 Group

texts.en:
Marie is one of the members of the “Fuente de amor” (Source of love) 1, 2 & 3 group which has 15 micro-businesswomen. They are involved in clothing sales, natural products sales, shoe sales, food sales, etc. Marie lives in the city of La Romana. Its economy depends on tourism and the sugarcane industry. This group, where more than 50% are Haitian, moved to this town pursuing a prosperous life by working in the sugarcane industry. 

Marie is very excited to receive her third loan from Esperanza Internacional, having satisfactorily repaid her previous loan and taken an important step in her business growth. She has had her business for about three and a half years; she started it with a loan she took. She is running a clothing sales business, and she is planning on investing the new loan in clothes like pants, blouses, shirts, and shoes for women and men, etc. She sells them by walking around and from her house.

Marie’s family is made up of herself, her long-term partner and their five children; three of them live in her house. She tells us that her greatest dream is to have her own house. She will use her profits to invest in her business and to save because she wants to make her dream come true, the one to own a house to share with her family.

loans.use: to buy clothes, shoes, etc.

loans.name: Juan Camilo

texts.es:
Juan Camilo a sus 23 años de edad sueña con terminar sus estudios en Tecnología Electrónica, ya que sabe que esta es la herramienta que le permitirá salir adelante,  y superar la difícil situación económica con la que ha crecido.

El trabaja actualmente en el área de mantenimiento en la empresa Ferrinvernaderos en el Carmen de Viboral, y desea mejorar sus ingresos para continuar con sus estudios y más adelante poderse profesionalizar, por lo cual tiene como proyecto comprar una vaca lechera con el préstamo solicitado y sus ahorros personales.

Se destaca por ser una persona muy responsable y emprendedora.
texts.en:
Juan Camilo, who is 23 years old, dreams of finishing his studies in Electronic Technology because he knows this is the tool that will allow him to get ahead and overcome the difficult economic situation in which he has grown up.

He currently works in maintenance for a company called Ferrinvernaderos in Carmen de Viboral, and he wants to increase his income so he can continue his studies and later become a professional. To do this, he will buy a dairy cow with the loan he's asked for and with his personal savings.

Juan Camilo stands out as a very responsible and enterprising person.

loans.use: to buy a dairy cow.

loans.name: Nelson Javier

texts.es: El señor Nelson Javier a sus 36 años de edad se dedica a la compra y distribución de huevos a tiendas y mini mercados de un barrio localizado al norte de la ciudad de Medellín.  Gracias a esta actividad, consigue el sustento para suplir sus necesidades y apoyar económicamente a sus padres. Con el ánimo de ampliar su mercado y mejorar sus ventas, el señor Nelson Javier necesita pagar tres facturas a sus proveedores para que le puedan seguir suministrando los huevos para su venta y distribución y así poder abrir nuevos mercados y aumentar el número de clientes. El sueño del señor Nelson Javier es ver crecer su negocio y brindarle una mejor calidad de vida a sus padres.
texts.en:
Nelson Javier, who is 36 years old, buys eggs and distributes them to stores and markets in a neighborhood north of the city of Medellín. Thanks to this activity, he is able to meet his needs and support his parents.

Wanting to expand his market and improve his sales, Nelson Javier needs to pay three bills from his suppliers so they can continue supplying him with eggs to sell and distribute so he can open new markets and increase the number of customers he has.

Nelson Javier's dream is to see his business grow and give his parents a better quality of life.

loans.use: to pay bills from his suppliers.

loans.name: Eliza

texts.es: Eliza, de 36 años de edad, es una mujer alegre, emprendedora con ganas de superación. Es separada, pero vive con su hijo de 10 años de edad y su familia, por los cuales se esfuerza en salir adelante,  habitando cómodamente en la casa de sus padres. El trabajo que realiza Eliza, es la compra y venta de ropa y zapatos para damas, caballeros  y niños de diversas modelos, los cuales los distribuye a crédito, entre sus vecinas y amistades, contando con muchos clientes. Esta actividad la realiza en la puerta de su casa, entrega a domicilio y en ocasiones de manera ambulante. Ya lleva como 8 años en este negocio, tiempo  en lo cual se hizo conocida por la calidad de prendas que vende, y lo realiza sola. Lo que le gusta de esta actividad es que le genera un ingreso económico, pues no tienen competencia por su zona y eso le da más ganancias. Se siente contenta  ya que le ha traído muchas satisfacciones y le ha sacado de muchos apuros económicos, tiene las ganas de seguir trabajando y poder ampliar su negocio. Este sería el préstamo número 10 con la institución MFP, se siente muy contenta con la oportunidad brindada de poder contar con un préstamo, para lo cual se compromete a ser puntual en sus pagos. Además de sentirse a gusto con su banco comunal pues  considera a sus miembros ser personas responsable y solidaria. Con el dinero solicitado de 1000 nuevos soles comprará mayor cantidad de ropa femenina, y masculina, en diversos modelos  que están a la  moda.
texts.en: Eliza, 36 years old, is a happy woman, an entrepreneur wanting to excel. She is separated but living with her 10 year old son and her family, which is why she strives to move forward, living comfortably in the home of her parents. Eliza buys and sells clothes and shoes for ladies, gentlemen and children from various models, which she distributes on credit amongst her neighbors and friends, counting many customers. This activity is carried out from her home, home delivery and sometimes walking. She's been in the business for 8 years, time in which she has become known for the quality of garments sold and that it is performed alone. What she likes about this activity is that it generates income and she does not have competition in the area, giving her more profit. She is happy because it has brought her much satisfaction and has taken her from many economic hardships; she has the desire to continue working and to expand her business. This would be the 10th loan with the MFP institution; she is very pleased with the opportunity afforded to her, for which she agrees to be punctual with her payments. Also, she feels comfortable with her communal bank because its members are considered to be responsible and caring people. With the money requested of 1000 nuevos soles, she will buy a larger quantity of feminine and masculine, in various models that are in style.

loans.use: to purchase more women's and men's clothing.

loans.name: Jose Mario

texts.es:
José, vive con tres hijos en casa propia, el se dedica a vender ropa de marca en muchas ciudades, donde es el día de comercio, el negocio lo inicio hace varios años por iniciativa propia, todos los días trabaja de lunes a domingo.
El préstamo lo utilizara para invertirlo en comprar pantalones y camisas al por mayor para hombre y aprovechando la época que es cuando más se vende y de esa forma podrá mejorar en sus ingresos.
El sueño de José es tener un puesto en el mercado,  tener variedad, tener clientes y los ingresos mejoren cada día para que su familia tenga lo necesario para vivir.
texts.en: José lives with three children in his own home.  He sells branded clothing in many cities, where day trading is the business he started several years ago on his own initiative, working daily from Monday to Sunday.  The loan will be invested in buying men’s pants and shirts wholesale, taking advantage of the time when they are most sold and able to improve his income. José’s dream is to have a place in the market, have variety, have customers and improved revenue every day so that his family has enough to live.

loans.use: to purchase pants and shirts.

loans.name: Elva

texts.es:
Elva, de 36 años de edad, es una mujer luchadora con ganas de superación, es madre soltera y vive en compañía de sus 04 hijos de 14, 12, 10 y 7 años de edad, a quienes quiere mucho y se esfuerza por darles lo mejor y no les falte nada en esta vida. Vive en su casa propia. El trabajo de Elva, consiste en la venta de pollos, en su local propia ubicado en el mercado, el cual lo abrió ya hace 02 año tiempo y que le valió para hacerse conocida en la zona. Impulsada por la necesidad de contar con un ingreso económico pues la pensión que le pasa el padre de sus hijos no les alcanzaba, ahora  contando con la apoyo de su hija que le ayuda  en la labores de la venta en sus ratos libres. Lo que le gusta de su trabajo es que le permite tener un ingreso económico que le da la tranquilidad de poder brindarle una mejor calidad de vida  a sus hijos, y le ha permitido darles la mejor educación ya que ellos son su inspiración para seguir progresando. Asimismo nos comenta que tiene planes de ampliar su negocio y poner una tienda de venta de verduras. Este sería su 03 préstamo con la institución MFP, se siente muy contenta y agradecida con el apoyo que viene recibiendo, para lo cual se compromete a ser puntual en sus pagos. 
Con el préstamo solicitado de 1000 nuevos soles comprará un puesto para su hija para la venta de verduras además  de implementarla con productos para la venta.
texts.en: Elva, 36 years old, is a woman struggling with desire to excel.  She is a single mother and lives with her 4 children, aged 14, 12, 10 and 7, whom she loves very much and strives to give them the best and that they lack nothing in this life. She lives in her own home. Elva's work consists of selling chickens in her own place in the local market, which she opened 2 years ago and has become known in the area. Driven by the need for income as the pension that the father of her children has did not reach them, she now has the support of her daughter who helps with the work in her spare time. What she likes about her work is that it allows her to have an income that gives her peace of mind in providing a better quality of life for her children, and it has allowed her to give them the best education because they are the inspiration for further progress. She also tells us that she plans to expand her business and put in a shop to sell vegetables. This would be her 3rd loan with the MFP institution. She feels very happy and thankful for the support she has received, for which she agrees to be punctual with her payments.  With the loan requested of 1000 nuevos soles she will buy a place for her daughter for the sale of vegetables and also starting her off with products for sale.

loans.use: to buy a stall to sell vegetables and also buy vegetables.

loans.name: Las Moradoras Group

texts.en:
Dilcia is the coordinator of her group named Las Moradoras 1, 2 & 3 (Inhabitant). She has a long term partner and is a mother of 6 children. Four of her children are living with her in a simple structured home, in the rural villa of San Pedro de Macoris - a city famous for baseball players and sugar cane industries. The main economic activity here is the free trading zone, a cement factory, and other businesses.

Dilcia has been operating a second hand sales business for aproximately 8 years. She started her business after she saved enough money to buy her first bag of used clothes. She plans to use this loan to buy two bags of these clothes which she sells by piece in a flea market and at her home. She will use the profits to reinvest in her business.

Dilcia's plans are to save enough money to buy some land and build her house. Also she is dreaming to help her children to attend school and university. She thanks you all for your support of their dreams.

loans.use: to buy bags of used clothes to sell

loans.name: Maria Ursula

texts.es:
María, vive en casa propia, con su esposo y tiene tres hijos mayores de edad; María se dedica a la venta de tostadas de plántanos, tiene 4 años en el negocio, surgió por iniciativa propia, trabaja de lunes a sábado.
Ella está solicitando un préstamo para la compra de aceite por mayor cantidad y plátanos verdes, para tener abastecido el negocio, esto le ayudara para mejorar  y aumentar la producción.
Su aspiración es que su negocio sea cada vez más prospero, para mejorar las situación de su familia.
texts.en: María lives in her own home with her husband and has three older adult children.  María sells roasted plantains and has 4 years in the business, which she started on her own initiative, working Monday to Saturday.  She is requesting a loan to buy a large quantity of oil and green plantains to supply the business.  This will help to improve and increase production.  Her hope is that her business is more prosperous to improve the situation of her family.

loans.use: to purchase a large quantity of oil and green plantains.

loans.name: Maria Sonia

texts.es: La señora Maria Sonia a sus 55 años de edad se dedica desde su propio taller adecuado en la sala de su casa a confeccionar principalmente cortinas, manteles y acolchados, esta actividad la ha realizado durante toda su vida y con la cual ha generado sus propios ingresos para su sostenimiento y apoyo económico en su hogar. Debido al invierno, la señora Maria Sonia ha pasado por dificultades puesto que sus pedidos disminuyen drásticamente, por lo cual requiere de la compra de nuevas telas e insumos que le permitan realizar sus productos, poderlos vender, así reactivar su negocio y mejorar su calidad de vida y la de sus padres.
texts.en: Señora Maria Sonia, who is 55 years old, works in her own workshop, set up in the living room of her home, where she principally makes curtains, tablecloths, and quilts. She has been doing this work her entire life, and with it she has generated her own income to sustain herself and to help with the household finances.  She had some difficult times because of the winter, since her orders diminished drastically, so now she needs to buy new fabrics and other items that will allow her to make her products to sell. Thus she will reactivate her business and improve her quality of life and that of her parents.

loans.use: to buy items such as fabric and thread

loans.name: Maria

texts.es: María, de 48 años de edad, es una mujer luchadora con ganas de superación, es madre soltera, vive en casa propia, con  su pequeña hija a la cual quiere mucho y se esfuerza siempre  por darle lo mejor y no le falte nada en esta  vida. María se dedica a la venta de maíz en su local, la cual está instalada en su propia casa, siendo muy concurrida por los vecinos y extraños que pasa por la zona, a todos atiende con amabilidad y alegría pues que el buen trato hace que sus clientes vuelvan a comprarle. Su local lleva ya 15 años de funcionamiento tiempo en el cual a llegado a ser muy conocida y concurrida. Lo que le gusta de su trabajo es que es rentable, le da un buen ingreso económico para poder mantener la economía de su casa y brindarles a su hija una mejor calidad de vida. Sin embargo, en ocasiones le falta capital para invertir cuando se presenta una oportunidad de una buena compra, por tanto tiene muchas ganas de seguir creciendo, ampliar su negocio y mejorar la infraestructura de su casa, para habilitar más espacios donde pueda guardar mayor volumen de mercadería. Este sería el primer préstamo con la institución MFP, se siente muy contenta con la oportunidad brindada de poder contar con un préstamo. Con el monto solicitado 1000 nuevos  soles comprará productos para ampliar su negocio y material para el arreglo de su local como listones, clavos y madera.
texts.en:
María, who is 48, is a determined woman who wants to excel. She is a single mother who lives in her own house with her small daughter. María loves her daughter very much and always tries to give her the best and make sure that she is missing nothing in this life.

María sells corn at her store, which is set up in her house and is very popular with the neighbors and others who pass through the area. María serves them all with kindness and happiness because good treatment makes her customers come back to buy from her again. Her store has been in operation for 15 years and has become well-known and busy. What María likes about her work is that it is profitable and gives her a good income so she can keep her household going and give her child a better quality of life. However, on occasion she does not have the capital to invest when she has the opportunity to make a good purchase. This is why she really wants to keep growing, expand her business and improve the infrastructure in her house to have more spaces so she can store a larger volume of merchandise.

This will be María's first loan with MFP. She is very happy about the opportunity she has been given to have a loan. With the 1000 new soles she is asking for, María will buy products to expand her business and materials like battens, nails and wood for repairs to her house.

loans.use: to buy corn, and also to buy wood for improving the infrastructure of her business.

loans.name: Odalma Lisseth

texts.es:
Odalma, es madre soltera, vive con su madre, ella es empleada desde hace 4 años en la alcaldía municipal, este trabajo le permite generar los ingresos para cubrir los gastos familiares y los de ella.
Actualmente solicita un préstamo para la compra de repuestos para su vehículo, ya que presenta  unos problemas mecánicos, para lo cual debe cancelar la mano de obra y comprar los repuestos que necesite, pues quiere tener en buenas condiciones el vehiculo, para transportarse con mayor seguridad.
El propósito de Odalma es, cuidar primeramente su empleo, ya que de el dependen sus ingresos, también con el crédito quiere ser responsable y puntual en sus pagos.
texts.en: Odalma is a single mother and lives with her mother. She has worked for some 4 years in the municipal mayor’s office; this job has allowed her to have enough income to cover her family’s expenses. At present, Odalma needs the loan to buy spare parts for her car since it has some mechanical problems and needs to pay labor and the spare parts that are needed since she needs her car to be in good condition to be able to move around safely. Odalma’s goal is to first of all take care of her job since she depends on that income, and second regarding the loan, to be responsible and punctual in her payments.

loans.use: buy spare parts for her vehicle.

loans.name: Maria Asuncion

texts.es:
Maria Asunción tiene 60 años de edad y vive con su familia en una comunidad llamada Brasilia, en la provincia de Alajuela. Por esa área se da mucho el turismo por motivo del Volcán Arenal ubicado en sus cercanías, con el bosque nubloso de Monteverde y las tierras bajas del norte del país. En Alajuela existen cinco parques nacionales, una reserva nacional de fauna silvestre, cinco zonas protectoras y varias reservas forestales. También en la provincia se ubica el Museo Juan Santamaría, el cual exhibe artesanías producidas localmente. Esta zona ocupa el primer lugar nacional en la producción de café y azúcar de caña.
 
Desde hace varios meses Maria Asunción se dedica al comercio y a las costuras. Ella brinda sus servicios a los vecinos de la comunidad, quienes se muestran muy satisfechos por la calidad.

Actualmente Maria Asunción está solicitando un microcrédito de 600,000.00 (seiscientos mil colones), para la compra de una máquina de coser, telas e hilos para continuar con su sastrería en línea recta, ya que necesita solventar y tener otro ingreso económico para su hogar. 

Ella es miembro de la Empresa de Crédito Comunal de Brasilia S.A, razón por la cual está  muy agradecida por las oportunidades  de acceso al crédito que esta le brinda y poder llevar a cabo sus proyectos de vida.
texts.en:
Maria Asunción is 60 years old and lives with her family in the Brasilia neighborhood, province of Alajuela. This area has a lot of tourism because of the proximity to the Arenal Volcano, as well as the cloudy Monteverde woods and low land in the northern part of the country. In Alajuela there are five national parks, a national reserve of wild fauna, five protected areas and several forest reserves. There is also the Juan Santamaría Museum which houses crafts that are produced locally. This area is the first national place in the production of coffee and sugarcane.

For some months, Maria Asunción has worked in sewing and selling her items, she provides her services to neighbors in the community who are very happy with the quality of her products.

At present Maria Asunción needs a loan of 600,000.00 (six hundred thousand colones) to buy a sewing machine, fabrics and threads to continue her tailoring business since she needs the income and another revenue for her home.

Maria Asunción is a member of the Communal Credit Corporation of Brasilia S.A. which is why she is very grateful for the opportunities and access to credit that they offer and to be able to follow her life projects.

loans.use: buy a sewing machine, fabrics and threads.

loans.name: Nubis

texts.es: Nubis vive en la cauda de Cartagena con su esposo y sus dos hijos en las edades de 10 y 18 años. Ella tiene un negocio que inició hace 10 años, cuando viajaba con su esposo a Maicao, un municipio fronterizo con Venezuela, desde allí traían mercancías que vendían a buen precio. Gradualmente fue construyendo su propia clientela y surtiendo muy bien su negocio,  así como también adicionándole una buena infraestructura para exhibir sus producto. En la actualidad posee su propio capital de trabajo e invierte sus utilidades y compra en la misma ciudad de Cartagena,  pero en épocas como las de fin de año, este recurso se hace insuficiente para poder dar respuesta a su clientela que cada día crece. Esta es la razón por la cual acude a su credikiva, primer financiamiento que hace a la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, con el cual comprará mercancía, especialmente la que tiene en sus catálogos, ya que vienen con muchos descuentos, pues planea impactar con precios a sus clientes y lograr su plena fidelización. Con su credikiva comprará electrodompesticos menores, ropa,cosméticos y accesorios que desde ya tiene encargados.
texts.en: Nubis lives in the Cartagena area with her husband and two children of 10 and 18 years of age. Nubis has a business that she started 10 years ago when she traveled with her husband to Maicao, a municipality that borders Venezuela, from there they bought merchandize at very good prices. Gradually she started building her own customer base and stocking her business as well as adding a good display to show off her products. At present, Nubis has her own work capital, invests her earnings and buys her items in Cartagena but during the end of the year she does not have enough to be able to meet her customers’ needs that grow each day. This is why she needs a credikiva, her first loan with the Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, Nubis will buy merchandize especially those from her catalogues since they are on sale and plans to impress her customers with her low prices and gain their loyalty. With the loan, Nubis will buy small electronics, clothing, makeup, and accessories since she already has orders for those items.

loans.use: buy small electronics, clothing, makeup, and accessories.

loans.name: Lesbia Maria

texts.es: Lesbia Maria tiene 59 años de edad, su actividad económica es una pulpería el negocio lo tiene ubicado en su casa de habitación donde atiende a sus clientes que la visitan ofreciéndole variedad de productos para el hogar. Esta  actividad lo aprendió de forma  empírica por la necesidad de generar ingresos para la familia y salir adelante. Lesbia Maria está solicitando crédito para invertir en el negocio comprando variedad de producto como granos básicos, jabones, azúcar, entre otros productos para el hogar que los clientes solicitan.
texts.en: Lesbia Maria is 59 years old, she has a small grocery store located in her home, and she takes care of her customers by offering them a variety of products for the home. She began working by her need to have income for her family and to get ahead in life. Lesbia Maria will use the loan money to invest in her business by buying a variety of products like basic grains, soaps, sugar and other items for the home that her customers need.

loans.use: buy basic grains, soaps, sugar and other items.

loans.name: Kay

texts.es:
Kay, de 44 años de edad, es una mujer alegre y luchadora, es casada con Alfonso, vive con su esposo y sus  03 hijos, por los cuales se esfuerza en salir adelante,  tiene su casa propia la cual compró con el apoyo de su esposo. Kay se dedica a la venta de abarrotes en su bodega, la cual está instalada en su propia casa, siendo muy concurrida por los vecinos y extraños que pasan por la zona, por lo que a todos atiende con amabilidad. Su bodega lleva ya 02 años de funcionamiento tiempo en el cual ha llegado a ser muy conocida y concurrida, contando con el apoyo de su esposo para la atención al público. Lo que le gusta de su trabajo es que se hizo muy conocida en la zona, ya que la mayoría de sus clientes son sus vecinos la quienes les da una buena atención, ya que sabe que con sus compras a ella le brinda un ingreso económico, la cual le da la tranquilidad de darles lo mejor a sus hijos, tiene muchas ganas de seguir creciendo en su rubro y surtir  su negocio con más productos. Este será su préstamo numero 06 con la institución MFP, le gusta mucho su grupo por que siente que son responsables, está agradecida con la institución por la oportunidad y el apoyo que le brinda.
Con el monto solicitado 1500 nuevos  soles comprará abarrotes  en general al por mayor a menor  costo para  surtir su bodega, ya que así podrá tener mayores ganancias.
texts.en:
Kay is 44 years old; she is a happy and hardworking woman, and is married to Alfonso. Kay lives with her husband and 3 children for whom she works very hard to give them a good start in life, she has her own home that she bought with the help of her husband. Kay sells groceries in her home; she is visited often by neighbors and strangers that pass through the area which is why she treats each person with kindness. Her store has been open for 2 years and is well known and frequented. Kay has her husband’s support when taking care of the customers. What Kay enjoys about her work is that she is well recognized in the area since the majority of her customers are her neighbors and she takes good care of them since she knows that with their purchases she is able to have an income which gives her the piece of mind to provide the best for her children. Kay has a lot of motivation to keep growing in her field and to stock her business with more merchandize. This will be Kay’s sixth loan with MFP and likes her group very much since she feels they are responsible and is grateful with the institution for the opportunity and the support that they provide.

With the amount of 1500 nuevos soles, Kay will buy mostly groceries wholesale, at a lesser cost to stock her business since this will allow her to have greater earnings.

loans.use: buy basic household goods to stock her store.

loans.name: Dolores Armida

texts.es:
Dolores, se dedica a la venta de verduras, pescado y granos básicos, es madre soltera de dos niños, ella tiene mucha experiencia en el negocio, son 12 años los que lleva trabajando.
Actualmente está solicitando un préstamo para la compra de verdura fresca, como papas, yuca, güisquiles, repollo, zanahoria, ya que esta teniendo demanda por lo que considera que este préstamo le ayude a mejorar el servicio.
Su aspiración es mantener una buena estabilidad en el comercio, que su negocio sea prospero para cubrir las necesidades de su familia, apoyando siempre a sus hijos.
texts.en:
Dolores sells vegetables, fish and basic grains; she is a single mother to two children. Dolores has a lot of experience in her business since she has worked in her field for 12 years.

At present, Dolores needs a loan to buy fresh vegetables like potatoes, yucca, chayotes, cabbage, and carrots since she has a demand for these products and considers that this loan will help her improve her services.

Dolores’ dream is to keep good stability with her trade, that her business will thrive, meet all of her families’ needs and to always care for her children.

loans.use: buy potatoes, yucca, chayotes, cabbage and carrots.

loans.name: Leonardo Antonio

texts.es:
Leonardo a sus 45 años de edad es responsable de generar los ingresos necesarios para el sostenimiento de su esposa y su hijo de 14 años de edad, el cual desea continuar sus estudios hasta hacerse profesional.

El dedica desde hace varios años a la reparación de bicicletas desde su casa, pero ya lleva dos años en un pequeño local, independiente de su vivienda, desde el cual no solo se dedica a prestar dicho servicio, sino también a la venta de bicicletas.

Con el crédito el quiere adquirir más insumos para la reparación de bicicletas, para poder atender las diversas necesidades de su clientela.

Sueña con tener un negocio más grande, con mayor y mejor surtido, que le permita llegar a un mayor número de clientes, y a la vez mejorar sus ingresos y la calidad de vida de su familia.
texts.en:
Leonardo, 45 years old, is responsible for generating the income necessary for the support of his wife and 14 year old son, who wants to continue his schooling to become a professional.

He has been repairing bicycles from his home for several years.  For the last two years he has been doing this in a small shop, away from his home, where he not only provides repair service but also sells bicycles.

With this loan, he wants to acquire supplies for the repair of bicycles and be able to meet the varied needs of his customers.

He dreams of having a larger business, with more and a better selection, which will allow him to reach a greater number of customers.  This will both increase his income and improve the quality of life of his family.

loans.use: to purchase supplies for his bicycle shop.

loans.name: Juan Bautista

texts.es: El señor Juan Bautista con 60 años, se dedica a la agricultura y a la ganadería, actividad que heredó de su padre y de la cual se ha ganado el sustento para vivir junto con su esposa y sus seis hijos. Ubicado en el corregimiento de La Chapa – Rionegro, al oriente de Antioquia, ha tenido la dificultad de los fuertes cambios climáticos, por lo que sus ingresos mensuales son muy inestables. El señor Juan Bautista busca comprar una vaca lechera que le produzca ingresos extras en el futuro, de modo que pueda brindarles a su esposa y sus seis hijos una mayor calidad de vida.
texts.en: Juan Bautista, at 60 years old, works in agriculture and raising cattle, a trade he inherited from his father and from which he has earned a living, allowing him to live together with his wife and six children.  Located in the small town of La Chapa - Rionegro to the east of Antioquia, he has had difficulty with the strong climate changes, and for this reason, his monthly income is very unstable.  Juan Bautista is looking to purchase a dairy cow that will produce extra income in the future, so that he can provide his wife and six children with a better quality of life.

loans.use: to purchase a dairy cow.

loans.name: Yolanda De Jesús

texts.es: A sus 46 años de edad, la señora Yolanda se dedica a la atención y administración de una tienda en la cual trabaja desde las 8:00 a.m hasta las 10:00 p.m, esta labor la realiza desde hace poco puesto que anteriormente su hermana era quien estaba responsable de la tienda, pero debido a dificultades de salud no pudo continuar, por lo cual la señora Yolanda tuvo que hacerse cargo del negocio. Con los ingresos que la tienda genera puede pagar el arriendo de esta y suplir los gastos de su hogar y su única hija. Con el ánimo de mejorar el surtido de su tienda que se encuentra bajo, la señora Yolanda necesita de la compra de gaseosas, snacks y licor para poder aumentarlo y generar mayores ventas y así mejorar su calidad de vida y la de su hija.
texts.en:
Yolanda, 46, works managing a store where she works from 8:00am until 10:00pm.  She started doing this work a little while ago because her sister, who was responsible for the store previously, had health problems and could not continue working there, so Yolanda had to take over the store.

The income from the store pays the rent for the space and her household expenses for herself and her only daughter.  In order to improve the stock of merchandise at the store, which is low, Yolanda needs to purchase sodas, snacks, and liquor in order to increase the stock and generate more sales so that she can improve the quality of life of herself and her daughter.

loans.use: to stock up on sodas, snacks, personal products, and cleaning products.

loans.name: Anicia

texts.es: Anicia, de 53 años de edad, es una mujer muy alegre, dinámica y emprendedora, es casada con Arnaldo, vive en compañía de su esposo, sus dos hijos mayores y un menor, su casa es propia, la cual logró construir con el apoyo de su esposo. El trabajo de Anicia, consiste en la venta de comidas y bebidas, lo cual lo realiza todos los sábados y domingos y feriados en su local  ubicado en su propia casa, el cual lo abrió ya hace 05 años  tiempo que le valió para hacerse conocida en la zona y por las personas que pasan por el lugar, contando con la apoyo de sus hijas que le ayudan en la  preparación y atención al publico. Paralelo a esta actividad también se dedica a la venta de bebidas gaseosas durante los días de la semana contando con una refrigeradora que compró con sus ahorros. Lo que le gusta de su trabajo es que le permite tener un ingreso económico, lo que no le gusta es que los precios de los productos para la elaboración de sus comidas están que suben lo cual hace variar sus ganancias. Ella sigue esforzándose  gracias a que su puesto es muy concurrido  teniendo todas la ganas de ampliar su negocio. Este sería su préstamo número 03 con la institución MFP, con el grupo que trabaja  se siente muy cómoda pues los conoce muy bien por el tiempo que viene trabajando, lo que le anima a seguir en el grupo. Con el préstamo de 1000 nuevos soles, comprará materiales para arreglar su negocio como calaminas y listones para arreglar el techado y con el saldo lo invertirá en la compra de los ingredientes necesarios para la preparación de parrilladas.
texts.en: Anicia is 53 years old; she is a very happy, vibrant and enterprising woman. She is married to Arnaldo, with whom she lives as well as her two adult children and a small child. She lives in her own home which she was able to build with her husband’s aid. Anicia works selling food and beverages that every Saturday and Sunday as well as holidays in her stall located in her own home that she opened 5 years ago, time that has allowed her to be well known in the area and for the people that pass through. She has help from her daughters who help her prepare and take care of the customers. Besides selling food, Anicia also sells soft drinks during the week as she has a refrigerator that she bought with her savings. What she enjoys about her jobs is that she is able to have an income, what she doesn’t like are the prices of the products for the preparation of the food which are rising and make her profits fluctuate. She keeps working hard thanks to her customers who frequent her business and Anicia wants to expand her business. This will be Anicia’s loan number 3 with MFP, she is very comfortable with the group that she works with since she knows them very well for the time they’ve spent together and is encouraged to continue with the group. With the loan of 1000 nuevos soles, Anicia will buy materials to make improvements to her business like calamines and timber to fix the roof and with what’s left Anicia will buy the necessary ingredients to prepare her grill.

loans.use: buy timber and calamines to fix the infrastructure of her business as well as ingredients to prepare the grill.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: buy a screen and music mixer for his karaoke business

loans.name: Deyssin Barinea

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “SEÑOR DE CCOYLLORTY CACHIMAYO”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cachimayo, perteneciente a la provincia de Anta y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Deyssin Barinea; ella tiene 20 años de edad y es soltera; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de venta de controles y cds, la socia vende en forma ambulatoria ella reparte en las diferentes tiendas que vende estos accesorios, la socia trabaja desde las 7:00 a.m hasta las 6:00 p.m, por medio de este trabajo la socia quiere salir adelante, el sueño de la socia es tener un local donde pueda vender los accesorios. La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar accesorios como cds y controles.

   La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota
texts.en:
Deyssin Barinea is a member of the community bank "Señor de Ccoyllorty Cachimayo", located in the Cachimayo district in the Anta province in the department of Cusco.

Deyssin Barinea is 20 years old and single.  She balances her daily activities with a business selling remote controls and CDs.  She sells by walking around to different stores that sell these accessories.  She works from 7:00am until 6:00pm.  She does this work so she can get ahead.  

Her dream is to have her own store where she can sell these accessories.  She is asking for this loan to purchase accessories such as CDs and remote controls.

She is happy to receive this loan and promises to make her payments on time.

loans.use: to purchase accessories such as CDs and remote controls.

loans.name: Yesica Pola

texts.es: Yesica de 22 años, vive en la ciudad de Cartagena y es la propietaria de un negocio donde vende refrescos, meriendas, pañales etc. Su negocio está ubicado frente  a un hospital y es un kiosco, con el cual quiere seguir creciendo como empresario de la microempresa. Es producto de una tradición familiar de hace 30 años cuando fue propietario su padre y hace dos años se lo entregó a Yesica para que generara sus propios ingresos. Desarrollar su potencial de crecimiento es el objetivo de Yesica y esta es justamente la razón por la cual acude a su credikiva, primer financiamiento que hace a la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, con el cual comprará, productos de aseo personal pues planea comprar refrescos y tambien diversificar  e incluir en su oferta,  pañales desechables, toallas sanitarias, champoo para niños, lociones, etc. Con las utilidades producidas por este negocio, Yesica ha logrado pagar sus estudios universitarios de psicología, de allí se deriva el aprecio que ella tiene por desarrollarlo y aumentar sus utilidades para continuar fortaleciendo su bienestar personal. Ella sueña con tener varios locales comerciales en diferentes puntos comerciales de la ciudad, porque manifiesta ser muy emprendedora y capaz de  lograrlo.
texts.en: Yesica is 22 years old and lives in the city of Cartagena, she is the owner of a business where she sells refreshments, lunches, diapers, etc. Her business is located in front of a hospital; it is a kiosk that she wants to see grow as she is the owner of the microenterprise. Yesica is a product of family tradition since her father was the owner for 30 years and 2 years ago he gave it to her so that she would have her own income. Developing her potential growth is Yesica’s objective and this is exactly the reason why she wants her credikiva. This is her first loan provided through the Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, she will buy personal sanitary products, and refreshments as well as diversify her stock and include diapers, sanitary pads, children's shampoo, lotions, etc. With the profits, Yesica has been able to pay her education, she studies psychology at the university, and from the former she has the encouragement to develop her business and increase her earnings as well as continue to improve her personal wellbeing. She dreams of having various kiosks in different parts of the city as she declares herself to be very enterprising and capable of achieving her goals.

loans.use: buy personal sanitary products, refreshments as well as diversify her stock and include diapers, sanitary pads, children's shampoo, lotions, etc.

loans.name: Napoleon

texts.es:
Napoleón, de 35  años de edad, es un hombre  luchador, carismático, es conviviente con Zoila quien es ama de casa, vive con su pareja ya varios años y fruto de ésta unión  tiene 4 hijos, vive en su casa propia, la cual construyó con mucho esfuerzo. El trabajo que realiza Napoleón, es medio de trasporte que lo realiza en su mototaxi, dedicándose a ésta actividad desde hace 07 años, cuando compró su primer mototaxi con un crédito privado. Y todo ese tiempo le ha permitido hacerse muy conocido por la calidad del servicio que brinda, recorriendo por todas la calles de la ciudad. Lo que le gusta de su trabajo es que es independiente, no  tiene un horario de trabajo, así recibe un ingreso económico, y con ello puede apoyar en la economía de su hogar, y ver que a sus hijos no les falte nada. Sin embargo, comenta que no le gusta cuando llueve muy seguido pues le dificulta el trabajo y su mototaxi se llega a malograr más rápido. Tiene muchas ganas de seguir progresando y con esfuerzo lograr abrir una tienda de repuestos de mototaxi. Este será el préstamo numero 06 con la institución MFP, está agradecido, por  el apoyo financiero, que le permitirá avanzar en su negocio. 
Con el monto solicitado 1000 nuevos soles, comprará repuestos para arreglar su mototaxi, pues comenta le faltan llantas y amortiguadores y con el saldo mandar a pinta toda la estructura de su mototaxi.
texts.en:
Napoleón is 35 years old; he is a hardworking man, charismatic and lives with Zoila who is a housewife. He has lived with his partner for several years and out of their relationship they have 4 children, they live in their own home, which Napoleón build with a lot of hard work. Napoleón works in transportation with his motorcycle taxi which he has done for 7 years when he bought his first motorcycle taxi in a private loan. All of that time has allowed him to be very well known by the quality of the service that he provides by going through the city streets. What Napoleón enjoys of his work is that he is independent, he has no work schedule, he has an income that allows him to support his family and see that his children don’t lack in anything. Although he comments that he does not like when it rains a lot since it makes his job harder and his motorcycle taxi breaks down quicker. Napoleón has a lot of drive to keep progressing and wants to open a spare parts store for motorcycle taxis.
